151.plot: After news about Jay is Jun Kai broke out, everyone forms their own opinions about the situation, and all is especially concerned for Diana. At KS Foods, Jay makes his presence felt. He gets all business-like, questioning the accounts and business decisions, causing Xue Ling and Kwong San to wonder at his motives. Meantime, drama unfolds when Eddie and Shruti discover Michael's ran away to Hong Kong. They hatch a plan to get Michael back without letting the adults know.

152.title: Episode #1.152
152.plot: Panic breaks out when the adults discover Eddie and Shruti's plans to track Michael down in Hong Kong as Adam blames Xue Ling for Michael's decision to run away from home. Meanwhile in Hong Kong, Shruti and Eddie manage to find Michael but Michael doesn't want to go home. And the truth is out after Arjun confesses to Bhaskar that Ann and him are on a fake date just to keep Ann's parents happy and cover up for her real date with Ryan the Surfer. Arjun promised he will find a way to end it but Bhaskar is concerned how that would impact Arjun's career.

153.title: Episode #1.153
153.plot: Eddie, Shruti and Pam come up with an idea to keep Michael in Hong Kong Disneyland until Adam's arrival. But the plan backfires after Michael spots Adam and runs away again. When father and son finally reunite, things take a turn for the worse when Michael blows his tops at Adam. Hoping to mend things between Jay and Diana, Christopher and Suzanne arrange for them to meet and patch things up. But the meeting falls flat after Jay walks out on them.

154.title: Episode #1.154
154.plot: Diana gets really angry with Chris and Suzanne for arranging that awkward lunch date with Jay. In Hong Kong, Adam finally reconciles with Michael with help from an unexpected source in Eddie, while Li Yan confronts a long buried secret from her past after a meeting with a long-lost sister. Meanwhile, Pam and Shruti finally bury the hatchet and become friends. Diana, however, has no such luck as she struggles to cope after her ill-fated meeting with Jay.

155.title: Episode #1.155
155.plot: Adam and Li Yan return to Singapore without Michael, much to Xue Ling's annoyance. When Adam reveals that he allowed Michael to go backpacking in China, Xue Ling hits the roof. More troubles at the Lims when Jay tries to have dinner with Kwong San and both end of having a big argument over Kwong San being controlling of his life. Chris and Suzanne, together with Sulaiman and Norleena try to set Ben up with a date with Gina. And Arjun's relationship with Ann comes to a very abrupt and shocking end when Ann runs away from home, leaving a note saying that she has eloped ...

156.title: Episode #1.156
156.plot: Suzanne is now not too sure about getting engaged with Chris. The truth is that she still hasn't gotten over Chris's infidelity but Ben reassures her that everything will be fine. Nadiah has another blind date set up by Wafiq that leads to an unexpected consequence. She is beginning to question Wafiq's motive to set her up with those 'strange' guys. While over at the Bhaskars, Arjun's fake relationship with Ann comes to a head when Dr Krishna shows up at his house unannounced with photos of Ann and Ryan and demands answers. Things get worst for Arjun when Ann admits ...

157.title: Episode #1.157
157.plot: The fallout from Arjun's phoney relationship with Ann continues as Bhaskar suffers the silent treatment from Meera while Krishna finds fault with Arjun at work. Kwong San is on the warpath when he learns that Jay told Wafiq about his heart attack. He worries that he will lose the control and confidence of the directors and staff if news of his illness leaks. And still mulling over what Juliana said about having her own children, Zul and Mrs Pereira start to bond over the parental issue of having children.

158.title: Episode #1.158
158.plot: Still unhappy with Arjun's decision to open an aesthetics clinic, the cold war between Arjun and Bhaskar escalates. A major showdown looms when Kwong San springs a surprise on everyone by inviting the Tongs over to his house for dinner on the pretext that they are celebrating Adam's birthday. But he has something up his sleeves as he prepares to make an announcement that will shock everyone. Meantime, Ah Biao is panicky when his envelope of new notes for Chinese New Year goes missing. As Ben and Diana help look for it, Diana realizes that Ah Biao could be starting to ...

159.title: Episode #1.159
159.plot: After two failed attempts, Salmah bugs Wafiq to set Nadiah up on a third date with one of his friends. To help Nadiah get around it, Wafiq hatches a plan. Pam and Shruti are starting to find the extended holiday break boring, and they set out to find some part-time work. Jay, hoping to regain his father's trust, finally comes clean with Kwong San about why he chose to come back to KS Foods while Xue Ling finds out more about Jay's life in the US from Shelia.

160.title: Episode #1.160
160.plot: Ben and Gina are meant to have a date but Gina offers to take Ben to see a doctor instead as his sprain hasn't healed. Nadiah goes for her 'arranged' date but unknown to Salmah, she has lunch with Wafiq. Could they both be starting to warm up to each other? Shruti is planning to apply for a job at the Digital Media Agency but she is afraid to offend Pam in case she gets the job. Her worries, however, are unfounded when Pam is supportive of her job hunt. Kwong San, meanwhile, has decided to give Jay bigger responsibilities in KS Foods, and Xue Ling is starting to feel ...

161.title: Episode #1.161
161.plot: Tension between Adam and Xue Ling worsens with little things grating them, culminating to a huge fight over at the Tongs during reunion dinner. But after hearing Li Yan's little insight on Adam, Xue Ling seeks out Adam to make peace and agrees to give him the space that he needs. Salmah tries to find out Nadiah's third mystery date and is disappointed to be told by Nadiah that the date did not turn up. And based on the deal struck between Nadiah and Salmah, Salmah cannot introduce any more guys to her. Meanwhile, Jay brings Sheila over to the Lims for reunion dinner. ...

162.title: Episode #1.162
162.plot: It's the Lunar New Year and the Lims and Tongs celebrate. While over at the Rahmans, Norleena observes the interaction between Nadiah and Wafiq and let Sulaiman on about the possible romance between them. Despite his initial skepticism, Sulaiman confirms it when he sees that Nadiah and Wafiq are really comfortable with each other. Sheila, meanwhile, makes a nice impression on everyone except Bee Li, who is skeptical about her because she dumped Jay before. Kwong San, on the other hand, is even more impressed with Sheila when she seeks business advice from him. And ...

163.title: Episode #1.163
163.plot: When Norleena implies that Wafiq and Nadiah may have feelings for one another, it is met with strong disapproval from Salmah, who deems a divorced, single father to be unsuitable for Nadiah. This makes Nadiah ponder if she really might have feelings for Wafiq after how Salmah reacted. Jay's involvement in the family business puts a damper on Xue Ling's morale. She begins to wonder if all the years she had worked in KS Foods would go to waste if her brother takes over and throws her into the sidelines. Chris, meanwhile, is excited about his back-up plan in the form of ...

164.title: Episode #1.164
164.plot: Eddie goes for the trial session for the Relief PE Teacher job. However, he gets a reality check when he discovers that Mrs Pereira had Michael in mind for the job instead. During the trial, Mrs Pereira is hovering over him and nit-picking, Eddie is determined to prove her wrong and get the job. Facing a dead-end in search for funding for his aesthetic clinic venture with Arjun, Chris tries his luck with Meera in hope that she will invest in the business. Meera seems to go along with it but she has other ideas. And when Jay comes up with a suggestion to change their ...

165.title: Episode #1.165
165.plot: Eddie is late for his first day of work as a Relief Teacher in Tanglin JC. His troubles don't end there as he also gets a harsh reality check on handling those students who, not so long ago, were his schoolmates. The presence of Sheila continues to threaten Xue Ling and it all comes to a head when Kwong San hints to Jay that Sheila and him should start planning to get hitched. While at the Bhaskars, Shruti's part-time job as a Personal Shopper is met by strong objection from Meera, who thinks the job title is just a classy name for a Salesgirl.

166.title: Episode #1.166
166.plot: It's Valentine's Day, and Bee Li tries to get Kwong San out of the house for a romantic stroll. After much persuasion, Kwong San agrees but to add to Bee Li's frustration, he invites Sheila and Jay along. Shruti, meantime, starts her first day of work as a personal shopper, but will she be able to survive under her tyrant of a boss? And while Tanglin Coffee House organises a singles event for Valentine's Day, Norleena uses the event as a way for Nadiah and Wafiq to spend some time together. However, Salmah smells a rat and starts spying on them. Over at the Lims, ...

167.title: Episode #1.167
167.plot: An upbeat Kwong San looks forward to starting the Lunar New Year on the right foot with a lion dance performance at KS Foods but things go badly wrong for him. Chris tries to be more gung ho at work and might have taken on more than he can handle, while Xue Ling lets on that she knows Wafiq and Nadiah are now an item. Pam visits Shruti at the boutique to help her out from her the clutches of Kingsley but Shruti ends up embarrassing Pam.

168.title: Episode #1.168
168.plot: Kalila throws a tantrum at TCH when she reveals she doesn't want Nadiah to be her new mother. This opens up a can of worms that leads to a showdown between Wafiq and Salmah. Chris goes all out to prove he should be hired full-time at KS Foods while Jay goes head to head with Wafiq on a work matter. Lauren meanwhile, visits the boutique that Shruti's working in, starts trying almost every single piece of garment, making a mess, and making things really difficult for Shruti.

169.title: Episode #1.169
169.plot: Chris's excitement at being made full-time staff is cut short when Nadiah asks him for a copy of his university transcript. He asks Suzanne for help to fake a transcript, but she's swamped with work and meetings. At the last resort, Chris tries to sweet-talk Felicia to cover for him. Eddie finds it hard going trying to get the FAN Club students to follow his instructions with Lauren pushes his buttons, sorely testing his patience. Nadiah and Salmah's cold war over Wafiq continues while Shruti gets accused of stealing the limited edition necklace from the boutique.

170.title: Episode #1.170
170.plot: When Felicia realizes that Chris has been manipulating her, she is devastated. Desperate to win her back to his side so that she will not tell on him, Chris shows up at her home and begs for forgiveness. However, her protective father is there to thwart him. Eddie uses Encik Chua's name to scare the students into cooperation but Lauren is not fooled. Encik Chua tells him he has to get tough on her or he will lose control of the class. Zul's relationship with Juliana seems to be going smoothly but for some reasons, he's troubled by their age difference and something ...

171.title: Episode #1.171
171.plot: Norleena signs up for antenatal classes for first-time mothers at the hospital but Salmah, having raised her children based on traditional methods, is not really keen on those Western ways, nor those 'modern' baby care gadgets that the excited parents-to-be bought. At work, Chris struggles with the consequences of misleading Felicia as Suzanne pushes on with plans for them to apply for their own BTO flat. And at school, Lauren plots to get back at Eddie for humiliating her in class the previous week, while Eddie thinks he has taught Lauren a lesson when he catches her...

172.title: Episode #1.172
172.plot: The Tongs, together with Shruti and Pam, rally behind Eddie after Lauren accused him of molesting her. Norleena has a health scare and on the advice of Bhaskar's advice, goes for a checkup with her gynecologist as a panicky Sulaiman freaks out. At KS Foods, Peter Tay assigns Xue Ling to work with him on a new marketing plan, much to her surprise, while Adam meets with a potential landlord on Chris's recommendation as he continues to look for a permanent space to run his MMA classes.

173.title: Episode #1.173
173.plot: Sulaiman and Norleena are conflicted about what to do now that they know about Vanessa's pregnancy and whether they should tell Ben or not. But a chance meeting with Vanessa at Norleena's first antenatal class changes their take on the situation. Xue Ling and Adam's constant arguing spills over to their family when they both forgot to attend Melissa's school's Sports Day, much to Melissa's disappointment. Meantime, Meera helps out at Bhaskar's clinic while Norleena takes some time off. How will she balance being Bhaskar's employee with being his wife?

174.title: Episode #1.174
174.plot: Old wounds from Diana's and Arjun's break up are reopened when Li Yan finds out that it was Meera who told Diana to leave Arjun. Ben and Gina go on a mani-pedi double date with Sulaiman and Norleena, who are uneasy throughout the session when they thought that Ben was already aware of Vanessa's pregnancy. Over at the Rahmans, Nadiah teaches Wafiq how to cook, and Salmah is furious when she learns about that arrangement.

175.title: Episode #1.175
175.plot: Adam has his suspicion that Xue Ling is behind the 'too-good-to-be-true' rental deal for the new MMA gym. He confronts Chris about it and under pressure, Chris blurts out that it is indeed Xue Ling's arrangement and Adam makes things worst by questioning Xue Ling at the office in front of everyone. Meera, still helping out at the clinic, continues to disrupt operations much to Bhaskar's frustration. He knows he can't make the hard decision to fire her so he devised a plan to get Norleena back to work. And as part of his grand plans to prove that Xue Ling is the better...

176.title: Episode #1.176
176.plot: The investigation into Lauren's allegations that Eddie molested her is completed as Ah Biao and Zul plead with Mrs Pereira on about Eddie's innocence. But Mrs Pereira is sticking by the rules on this one. Will Eddie get to keep his job after this? The fallout between Xue Ling and Adam continues. They are not on speaking terms anymore, resulting in her unintentionally seeking solace from Peter Tay and divulging more personal information than she should. And Chris is still determined to see through the aesthetic clinic plan and his enthusiasm seems to have rubbed onto ...

177.title: Episode #1.177
177.plot: Xue Ling is feeling the pressure from her strained relationship with Adam and work, only for Peter Tay to offer some support. Meantime, Nadiah's and Wafiq's deepening relationship meets with even stronger disapproval from Zul and Salmah. At school, Eddie forms a friendship with his student Hakim, and in turn, Hakim helps Eddie pulls a stunt on the troublemaker Lauren to get back at her. While at TCH, Diana and Arjun bond over the unlikeliest situation - giving tuition to a needy child.

178.title: Episode #1.178
178.plot: Zul confronts Wafiq and Kwong San with a dark buried secret from their past, which forces Wafiq break things off with Nadiah. While in school, Eddie and Hakim start to bond further when they engage in a prank war at school and at TCH. A resolute Christopher targets a potential investor for Arjun's future aesthetic clinic, and this person happens to be a good friend of Meera.

179.title: Episode #1.179
179.plot: Hakim's prank by stealing Atiqah's inhaler nearly turn fatal when Atiqah has an asthma attack at that moment. Fortunately, Suzanne was there to offer a spare inhaler. Nadiah thinks that Salmah was the driving force behind Wafiq's decision to break off with her, but Kwong San's shifty action when he is around her makes Nadiah think otherwise. And Li Yan finds out about Vanessa's return but she decides to keep the news of Vanessa's pregnancy from Ben.

180.title: Episode #1.180
180.plot: Eddie, while concerned about Hakim for pulling that inhaler prank on Atiqah, is determined to set Hakim the right path. However, Hakim proves to be a tough challenge for him when he damages Diana's van tyres in a fit of anger. Li Yan, meanwhile, is worried that Vanessa will make things difficult for Ben like before. She arranges to meet up with Vanessa to talk about her baby, her plans and having a future with Ben. Meantime, to keep the act going, Chris arranges for a dinner date with Felicia and it is making Suzanne all uncomfortable.

181.title: Episode #1.181
181.plot: It is A-Level results day and there's tension and high expectations for the likes of Michael, Shruti, Eddie and Pam. Eddie surprised everyone with better than expected results but Michael's results are not that great as expected. Ben is knocked out by the return of a pregnant Vanessa. To make matters worse, he feels betrayed that everyone knew of her pregnancy before he did. More revelations to come when Li Yan tells Salmah about a big secret she has been harbouring for years.

182.title: Episode #1.182
182.plot: Sulaiman is torn between applying for a university course in either Engineering or Sports Science. And the application process is not helped by Norleena's meddling and Salmah's advices. Meantime, Ben struggles to tell Gina that Vanessa is back and carrying his baby. And to make matters worse for Ben, Li Yan forces him to take a more active role in shepherding Vanessa through her pregnancy, something that he's not really keen on, as the whole issue had taken him by surprise.

183.title: Episode #1.183
183.plot: Sulaiman's attempts to write a personal statement on why he thinks he's suitable for sports science continues hitting a roadblock in the shape of Norleena. More on Vanessa's pregnancy saga when Ben incurs the wrath of Li Yan after he refuses to believe he is the father of Vanessa's child when he sees a recent photo of Vanessa with her ex-boyfriend. Meantime, Pam is caught shoplifting and Shruti is forced to come to her rescue.

184.title: Episode #1.184
184.plot: Li Yan's unresolved feelings over her illegitimate daughter with Bhaskar lead to a big bust up with Ben who refuses to be more supportive of a vulnerable Vanessa. Pam comes over to stay at the Bhaskars when she got kick out from her home, and her presence in the household leads to an embarrassing situation when she catches Arjun's with his pants down in the toilet. Over at KS Foods, Chris and Felicia flirt a little too openly for Suzanne's liking.

185.title: Episode #1.185
185.plot: Ben is conflicted whether he should tell Gina about Vanessa. After mustering up much courage to speak to Vanessa about this issue, he panics when Gina shows up at TCH at the same time. Things start to look really tricky when Gina introduces herself to Vanessa and both girls start to get friendly with each other. Chris feels the pressure when both Felicia and Suzanne compete for his attention. Things come to a head when Suzanne accuses Felicia of sabotaging her work. Meanwhile, Salmah encourages Li Yan to look for the daughter she gave up for adoption years back.

186.title: Episode #1.186
186.plot: After boasting to Arjun that he can come up with the killer aesthetic business proposal to impress their potential investors, Chris pleads with Suzanne to help him with it but she refuses and warns him to stop flirting with Felicia. Bhaskar is furious with Arjun for exploring the aesthetics business with Nadine behind his back, and the defiant Arjun makes things worst. Li Yan, meantime, is quietly making plans for a trip to Hong Kong, but when Ben finds out about the trip and starts questioning Li Yan, Salmah jumps to her rescue.

187.title: Episode #1.187
187.plot: Without giving too much away, Li Yan announces her decision to leave for Hong Kong that same day, and no one knows that she is there to find her long lost daughter except for Salmah. The Lims are still sore over Michael's dismal A-level result. Feeling bad and eager to please, Michael agrees to try his best to make it for Officer Cadet School when he gets enlisted to National Service. Meanwhile, competition arises between Felicia and Suzanne as they try to outdo each other to gain Chris's favour. Little did they realise that they have been played by Chris. And tension...

188.title: Episode #1.188
188.plot: Despite her efforts to be on her best behavior, Pam's extended stay with the Bhaskars has taken a toll on her relationship with Shruti. Meera offers to let Pam stay on longer after meeting Pam's difficult mother, but Pam declines the kind offer and leaves. When Michael made a blunder at KS Foods and was reprimanded by Xue Ling, Peter Tay steps in to help. However, Peter Tay intentionally lets slip of Xue Ling's past secrets to Michael instead. Adam gets upset when Xue Ling suggests Michael to take the SAT for a shot at a good college in US. He thinks that she is up to...

189.title: Episode #1.189
189.plot: With Adam's absence, Xue Ling has no choice but to admit to her parents about her tiff with Adam. Both Bee Li and Kwong San are concerned as Bee Li urges Xue Ling to settle any differences with Adam. Over at KS Foods, Jay signs off a work process without consulting Kwong San, leaving Kwong San fuming and a sense of not being in control. And tension arises between Shruti and Pam when Shruti becomes jealous of Pam's closeness with Meera. Meanwhile, Xue Ling confronts Peter Tay for divulging her planned pregnancy. Peter makes it up to her by sending her home only to bump...

190.title: Episode #1.190
190.plot: Adam spends another night at the Tongs but he's starting to feel out of place there, as the rest of the family are concerned about what happened between Xue Ling and him. Jay's plans to make Kwong San lose confidence in him backfires when Kwong San puts more of Xue Ling's responsibilities in his hands. Meanwhile, Wafiq is devastated when Yasmine announces her decision to remarry and wants Kalila to join her and her new husband in Nepal.

191.title: Episode #1.191
191.plot: Misunderstanding between the siblings as Melissa thinks that Michael's poor A-Level result is the main cause of the constant argument between Xue Ling and Adam, but Michael thinks it is her eating disorder that started it all. With fear that Wafiq could actually send her to live with her mother Yasmine and her new husband, Kalila tries to get into Wafiq's good books by being the good and obedient daughter. Over at the Lims, Kwong San and Bee Li are not happy that Adam and Melissa are staying with the Tongs. They want Xue Ling to get them to come back home. Xue Ling ...

192.title: Episode #1.192
192.plot: After Melissa and Adam fail to return home, Kwong San takes it out on Xue Ling, chiding her for not making her marriage and family a priority. He goes one step further and gets Xue Ling to hand over all the work stuff to Jay. And as part of his elaborate plan to break up Xue Ling and Adam, Peter Tay introduces to divorce lawyer to Xue Ling. Nadiah thinks the reason why Wafiq broke up with her is because of Yasmine, and a guilty conscious Wafiq is somewhat 'happy' that Nadiah feels that way.

193.title: Episode #1.193
193.plot: After learning of Xue Ling's resignation from KS Foods, Peter Tay pays her a visit at home and gets her out of the house to have some fun on the pretext of helping her to relax, while over at KS Foods, a fuming Kwong San cancels a meeting because he couldn't get in touch with Peter Tay. Nadiah continues pressing Wafiq for the reason why he broke up with her, but Wafiq is still not telling. And more troubles ahead for Xue Ling and Adam when Adam comes across the name card of the divorce lawyer in Melissa's schoolbag.

194.title: Episode #1.194
194.plot: Adam and Melissa start to get used to living with the Tongs as Ah Biao attempts to convince Adam to work things out with Xue Ling, but his advice falls on deaf ears. Meanwhile, a devastated Xue Ling thinks that Adam is really having an affair when she spots a photo of Adam and Kelly in Adam's phone. She ends up confiding in Peter Tay about her and Adam's relationship woes. Wafiq decides to quit his job because of Nadiah, much to Kwong San's shock and disappointment.

195.title: Episode #1.195
195.plot: As Xue Ling reels from the guilt of her actions, Adam makes things worse for her by making an effort to save the marriage and promising to be always faithful to her. Nadiah is shocked when she learns of Wafiq's resignation from KS Foods, but when she asks Kwong San, he reveals nothing to her about Wafiq's reasons for leaving. Lauren shows Peter Tay the photo of a teenage Xue Ling she got from his wallet and forces him to reveal what happened to them in the past. The wistful Peter Tay starts to pour his heart out to her.

196.title: Episode #1.196
196.plot: Kalila notices how Wafiq is affected by his breakup with Nadiah and decides to intervene by trying to persuade Salmah to accept her father. Xue Ling ponders about what she should do as she is conflicted about Adam wanting to return home and Peter wanting her to be with him. Meantime, Chris gets into deeper trouble when Felicia's father Chin Huat spots Suzanne and him holding hands and behaving like a couple. And while the relationship between Peter Tay and Lauren warms, Lauren finds out more about Adam's and Xue Ling's past from Michael.

197.title: Episode #1.197
197.plot: Xue Ling tries to ignore Peter Tay who keeps hounding her to get together with him after their one night of passion the week before. Kwong San then decides to give Xue Ling an ultimatum to solve this issue with Peter Tay once and for all for the sake of her marriage. Felicia starts to get cold towards Chris when she finds out that he is still seeing Suzanne. Feeling uneasy about this, Chris tries to pacify her, ends up kissing her and is caught red-handed by Suzanne, who refuses to believe Chris's lies anymore. And after a big fight with Peter Tay, Lauren takes his ...

198.title: Episode #1.198
198.plot: In the aftermath of the car accident, Lauren panics when she realizes that Michael is unconscious and unresponsive. Scared, she calls up Peter Tay, who gives her instructions on what to do next. When the Lims finally finds out what happened to Michael, the devastated Xue Ling and Adam lash out at Peter Tay, blaming Lauren for the accident. The mood, meanwhile, is light over at the Rahmans as Salmah bonds with Wafiq over a cooking and eating session. And Chris lands himself in hot soup when Ben finds out about his fake degree and his forced resignation from KS Foods. ...

199.title: Episode #1.199
199.plot: Michael's accident has left Kwong San much to reflect about what he did in his life. He decides it's time to right the wrongs as he makes a big confession to the Rahmans. Chris is taken away by the police for questioning regarding his fake degree, and Arjun reveals to Diana that he wasn't really interested in the aesthetic clinic venture in the very first place. Meantime, Xue Ling and the whole family continue keeping vigil at the hospital with hope that Michael would regain conscious.

200.title: Episode #1.200
200.plot: With Michael still in comatose and seeing Adam so angry with Peter Tay, Xue Ling is wrecked with guilt over her affair with Peter. But Kwong San advises her against letting Adam know. And as Chris goes missing, Arjun puts Diana straight for writing Chris off. Diana manages to locate Chris and convinces him to come home and admit everything to Li Yan. But the confession backfires and Li Yan is livid with the family for keeping the matter from her. Old wounds are opened when Norleena and Zul discuss about Nasir's death. However, Zul put things in perspective for ...

201.title: Episode #1.201
201.plot: Xue Ling and Adam are worried about Michael's short term amnesia. But Michael is more concerned about trying to recall his conversation with Lauren in the car and how it will affect his parents' marriage. Back home, Kwong San puts up an upbeat front about his retirement. But he is confronted with the loss after Vijesh visited him. Arjun announces that he will not be going ahead with the aesthetic clinic business much to Bhaskar's delight. But Meera suspects that the decision to quit the project is because of Diana.

202.title: Episode #1.202
202.plot: Chris' woes over the fake certificate is far from over when Suzanne tells him that she's been questioned by the police too. Seeing Suzanne so upset, Chris goes to find Felicia to trash things out, only to find out that it was Felicia's father who made the police report against him. The Lims get a surprise visit from Jay after a call from Bee Li the day before. Jay finally makes peace with Li Yan and finds out that Diana had lied about being together with Arjun. Will he go after Diana then? Meantime, Salmah plans a surprise baby shower for Norleena in her bid to cheer ...

203.title: Episode #1.203
203.plot: After his retirement, Kwong San is bored stiff at home and tries to engage Bee Li to join him at some classes at the community club he is planning to sign up. But Bee Li tries to avoid them at all cost. Over at TCH, Chris and Suzanne decide to come clean and explain the whole fake degree situation to Li Yan, but they are interrupted by a furious Chin Huat who blames Chris and Suzanne for Felicia's plight. More woes for Wafiq when Yasmine decides to move back to Singapore and wants the custody of Kalila. But Wafiq is not going to give her up without a fight. Bee Li, ...

204.title: Episode #1.204
204.plot: After Chin Huat's outburst, Chris and Suzanne get the cold shoulder from everyone at TCH. Chris then decides to be honest with Felicia about making use of her and taking advantage of her feelings for him. Upset over having to choose between with her parents, Kalila runs away. Wafiq goes into a panic when he can't locate Kalila. He's relieved when he learns that Kalila is at Salmah's house. Meanwhile, Michael finds that that Xue Ling and Adam have plans to seek NS deferment for him after they felt that he will not be fit enough as he is still recovering from the ...

205.title: Episode #1.205
205.plot: Concerned and a little guilty over Pam's current plight, Shruti wants to make things easier for Pam by getting her to move in with the Bhaskars again. Meanwhile, Wafiq and Yasmine meet to discuss about Kalila's living arrangements and he is thrown into a fix when he keeps getting countered by Yasmine's tough lawyer Zainudin. However, Salmah steps in and helps him out. Michael, discharged and resting at home, gets messages and calls from an unknown number. Knowing it's from Lauren, he chooses to ignore it.

206.title: Episode #1.206
206.plot: Li Yan and the Tongs discuss how they can pool their resources when Suzanne informs them that Chris would most likely be charged. However, they get a surprise when Arjun bails Chris out. As Pam plans for a gathering with their ex-JC mates, Shruti is concerned about the alcohol but Pam tells her she needs to toughen up. Things didn't go too well when Shruti is caught by the police with a beer in her possession after the alcohol restriction hours. And while studying for his SATs, Michael puts himself under a lot of pressure when he feels that he is not as sharp as he ...

207.title: Episode #1.207
207.plot: Salmah, Li Yan and Diana have planned a surprise baby shower for Norleena at the Tongs' place, but Salmah panics when Norleena decides to take the day off and rest at home. Kwong San tries to find ways to busy himself with his newfound hobby but ends up messing up the house, much to Bee Li's chagrin. After what Mark told her about Pam, Shruti thinks that Pam stole some alcohol from Bhaskar's cabinet. She takes the rap for the missing alcohol and expects Pam to be thankful that she stood up for her. But Pam is oblivious to what's going on. Meantime, Vanessa runs into ...

208.title: Episode #1.208
208.plot: Li Yan and Diana decide to invite Vanessa over for lunch, hoping to connect better with her and to make up for what happened at Norleena's baby shower yesterday. Feeling bad for staying at the Bhaskars for free, Pam decides to cook for the entire family as a show of her appreciation. At school, Eddie doesn't believe Hakim when he constantly makes excuses about his mother being unwell, and treats him harshly. But is Hakim really lying? Li Yan receives a surprise visit from her sister Li Ting, who comes bearing life-changing news for her.

209.title: Episode #1.209
209.plot: Eddie feels bad for doubting Hakim when the truth about Hakim's mother surfaces. He tries to make up to him but Hakim is not receptive towards his gesture. Vanessa gets warded when her water broke. Tension between Li Yan and Ben when Li Yan feels that Ben is not caring toward Vanessa enough. Vanessa, on the other hand, freaks out over everything from suggested induce labour to doing the sonography scan. Meantime, Li Ting creates a huge impression on Diana and Chris, and the twins start to bond with her.

210.title: Episode #1.210
210.plot: Adam decides it is time to seriously kick off his plan for his MMA School and gets Xue Ling involved, much to Xue Ling's surprise. Over at the Rahmans, Sulaiman continues to fret over Norleena, much to Norleena's annoyance. Sulaiman then get some advice from Wafiq to enjoy the peace around the house while he can, before all will be disrupted when the baby arrives. While Li Yan continues to put up a brave front after getting the news from Li Ting that her daughter whom she had with Bhaskar has passed on.

211.title: Episode #1.211
211.plot: Li Yan is still not talking to Chris and Chris is hoping that he can make it up to her. But little does he know that Li Yan is actually distracted with the sad news of her daughter's passing. Lathika, meanwhile has just completed a massage course and bitten by the 'course-bug', goes on the lookout for more enrichment courses to take. As she tries to share the good news with Wati, she feels left out when she finds Wati spending more time with Fitri. Eddie has been getting phone messages from a mysterious sender. As he tries to keep it a secret, it only pips Shruti's ...

212.title: Episode #1.212
212.plot: Those mysterious messages turn out to be a call for help as Eddie mulls over it authenticity. To ease his conscience, he then decides to help the sender but not before roping Michael in, much to Michael's annoyance. And after their chance meeting at TCH the day before where she was very affected by what he said to her, Li Ting decides to talk it out with Bhaskar regarding what happened some thirty years ago. Over at the Lims, Kwong San finally signs off his shares of KS Foods to Peter Tay with much mixed feelings.

213.title: Episode #1.213
213.plot: As Li Ting get ready to return to Hong Kong, she gets a reassurance from Bhaskar that he will let the past stays in the past and not tell Li Yan anything. Li Ting is relieved and grateful. Kwong San, still trying to adjust to retirement, is feeling a little helpless and left out as he sees everyone around him going about their daily lives. As Bee Li confides with Meera, Meera offers advice and suggestions on how important it is for Kwong San be kept occupied otherwise he might sink into depression. Eddie is now caught in the middle of a potential extortion case from ...

214.title: Episode #1.214
214.plot: Xue Ling, still feeling guilty for being the cause of Kwong San's early retirement, tries to get Bee Li to accommodate and cut down on her own activities to spend more time with Kwong San. But Bee Li thinks it's not fair to impose this request on her. Michael, meanwhile, struggles with post-concussion syndrome, and it is affecting his studies, concentration and temperament. Over at the coffee house, Juliana drops a major bombshell on an unsuspecting Zul when she brings her parents over to meet him, on the pretext of having lunch there.

215.title: Episode #1.215
215.plot: Zul is upset and moody after being coerced by Juliana into meeting her parents. Desperate, Juliana seeks out Norleena for help. After a pep talk from Norleena, Zul decides to tell Juliana that they are not right for each other. Juliana is hurt and walks out of him. Bee Li steps down as TLC Chairwoman. Drama unfolds as Bee Li tries to prevent Meera from being elected as the next Chairwoman of TLC. Michael is disappointed that he couldn't sit for his SATs this year. When he experiences some residual effects from his head injury, he tries to hide his conditions from ...

216.title: Episode #1.216
216.plot: Zul is in a funk over his relationship with Juliana. However, he is momentarily distracted when Norleena experiences labour pains at TCH and he has to send her to the hospital. In the end, he makes the difficult decision to break up with Juliana. Meantime, after learning that Vanessa's mother is unable to care for her, Li Yan insists that Vanessa move in with them after she gets discharge from the hospital, much to Ben's shock and disappointment. Gina finally pours out her unhappiness to Ben when she learns that Vanessa has moved in with the Tongs. A torn Ben give his...

217.title: Episode #1.217
217.plot: Ben isn't happy with Vanessa staying with them and is constantly irritated with Li Yan taking her side and attending to her every need. Things get worse when she tells him to massage Vanessa's swollen and sore feet and before long both of them get into a heated argument. Meanwhile, Chris is on edge about his impending court sentence and when Suzanne unprecedentedly makes a joke relating to prison life, he takes it personally and lashes out at her. It is Shruti's first attempt at working for Diana, and Diana is a little doubtful if Shruti will be able to pull off the ...

218.title: Episode #1.218
218.plot: Determined to save Chris from going into prison, Li Yan decides to use up whatever savings she has to pay the fine for Chris, only to meet with strong objections from Ben and Diana as they both feel that Chris has been given way too many chances and doesn't deserve to be bailed out every single time. After making Lathika upset with her belittling comment about maids, Shruti tries to make amends. They have a chat and Lathika shares her life story and struggles with Shruti. Gina finally admits to Ben that she is really uncomfortable seeing Ben getting 'close' to Vanessa...

219.title: Episode #1.219
219.plot: As the Tongs prepares to go to court in the afternoon for Chris sentencing, Li Yan is upset that Ben is still not willing to fork out the money to pay the fine. Pam decides to go ahead and work for Mr Pang, much to Shruti's frustration. As Shruti helps Pam to cover up, she feels really bad lying to Diana. At the clinic, Bhaskar, not wanting to lose Norleena, is supportive of her and offers her a flexible working arrangement should she decide to return to work after her maternity leave.

220.title: Episode #1.220
220.plot: Bhaskar and Salmah start to interview candidates for Norleena's temporary replacement at the clinic. A Jared Toh comes for an interview and Salmah is set on hiring him. But Bhaskar has his reservations when he feels that Salmah's decision is all based on looks. Over at TCH, Ben feels bad about not having been more forgiving towards Chris, and as a result, clashes with Li Yan. Kwong San meets up with Boon Ping, the son of one of his old business associate for coffee, and jumps at the chance to offer him some business advice. Meanwhile, Eddie discovers that Michael has ...

221.title: Episode #1.221
221.plot: Its NS enlistment day for Eddie and Michael and the likes of Kwong San, Xue Ling and Li Yan are anxious. Meanwhile, Eddie worries that Michael may still be feeing the after-effects of his recent car accident and suggests that he try to get downgraded. An excited Kwong San works hard on a business plan not knowing it's a phantom project conceived by Xue Ling. And Adam's desire to open a gym hits a snag as he struggles to balance the budget.

222.title: Episode #1.222
222.plot: Michael is determined to do well in BMT so he can get a place in OCS but that makes him an easy target for Mark's constant sniping. Eddie's desire to protect his Michael lands him in some comical trouble. Over at the Lims, Xue Ling is in two minds about coming clean with Kwong San about the phantom project but is afraid of the consequences.

223.title: Episode #1.223
223.plot: After looking through Kwong San's proposal to Boon Ping, Xue Ling is inspired and gets an idea on how to kick start a new business. However, Kwong San is not too interested, which dampens her spirit. While Adam is busy trying to put his gym together, he finds an unlikely business partner in Wafiq as he finds himself turning to him for advice. A work emergency from Diana causes Pam to seek the help of Shruti to help her with cleaning a client's office. Shruti reluctantly agrees and to make matters worse, Shawn, one of the office staff, continues to irritate her as she ...

224.title: Episode #1.224
224.plot: Things are still a little icy between Kwong San and Xue Ling as both can't find the appropriate time to talk things through. Just when things couldn't get any more interesting, Sheila blurts out to the Lims that Jay and her are engaged. Wafiq is eager to pick Adam's brain about MMA but Adam is determined to throw Wafiq off from investing in the gym. Shruti keeps her distance from Shawn when she helps Pam clean Mr Pang's office again. As Shawn continues to hover around her and makes conversation, Shruti is drawn to him and she cannot seem to explain why.

225.title: Episode #1.225
225.plot: Bee Li is excited to celebrate Mother's Day with Jay, while Wati is sad to be away from her children on the special day. Wanting to cheer Wati up, Lathika invites Wati and Fitri for a potluck party while the Bhaskars are at a wedding dinner. But Pam returns home earlier than expected. Diana is upset to learn that Jay has been back for some time. Jay, meanwhile, wants to drop in on TCH but Sheila dissuades him.

226.title: Episode #1.226
226.plot: Jay tries hard to bridge the gulf with Kwong San and makes a decision to stay in Singapore instead of going to the US with Sheila. But Sheila gets upset and schemes to further widen the gap between father and son, and destroy any chance that Jay will reconcile with Diana. In BMT, Michael is worried about the upcoming IPPT trial but he is determined to get a gold in the test. Pam makes a lunch date with her and Shruti to meet Shawn and his friend Firdaus. During the lunch, Shruti feels uncomfortable to be attracted to the annoying Shawn.

227.title: Episode #1.227
227.plot: Shruti continues to deliberate about whether she should go on a date with Shawn. She starts to get edgy when Shawn doesn't response to her texts to him. It's Jared's first day at the clinic, and while Salmah is generally pleased with his performance, Norleena doesn't think he's cut out for the job. Meanwhile, Li Yan receives a call from a food blogger who's interested to sample the food at the coffee house and write a review.

228.title: Episode #1.228
228.plot: Eddie is worried about the rest of the platoon finding out what happened between him and PC Jonathan the previous night. Meantime, the recruits prepare for their first book-out by doing area cleaning and preparing for bunk inspection. Will their performance finally be up to standard? Shruti gears up for a date with Shawn, but Bhaskar has other plans in mind for them. The Tongs are busy preparing for Chris' return from prison by making his favourite snack. And at TCH, preparations are also made for the arrival of the food blogger, with Li Yan hoping to get some good ...

229.title: Episode #1.229
229.plot: Chris is back home after serving a two-week imprisonment. Everyone gives him a warm welcome except for Ben, who is still hasn't forgiven him for causing all the trouble. The food blogger finally turns up with a couple of friends after yesterday's no-show. But things end on a sour note when Ben and Diana insist he pays for all the food that he consumed. Norleena starts her song compilation to play as background music during her delivery while at in camp, Eddie and Mark bond over a common struggle - BMT.

230.title: Episode #1.230
230.plot: TCH got a negative review from the food blogger and the Tongs decided to spruce up the alfresco area to make it more hip and happening so as to attract a younger crowd. Meanwhile, the tension between Ben and Chris escalates when Ben feels that Chris is getting preferential treatment from Li Yan. Over at the Bhaskars, Meera reveals to Bhaskar that he is not her one and only boyfriend and the revelation somewhat makes Bhaskar really uncomfortable.

231.title: Episode #1.231
231.plot: Norleena goes into labour, but Sulaiman is well prepared for this day and thinks he has everything under control. Despite his efforts to make sure that all goes smoothly, his headstrong wife refuses to co-operate and insists on going shopping before heading to the hospital. The relationship between Ben and Vanessa continues to blow hot and cold, both finding it difficult to find a balance between friendship and a relationship. To keep herself occupied, Vanessa offers to help Ah Biao with his Tanglin Heritage Project. Chris is tasked with revamping the alfresco area of...

232.title: Episode #1.232
232.plot: The wait is finally over and Norleena is ready to give birth. She is insistent on a completely natural birth but complications arise and her birth plans may not go as she wanted. The tension between Vanessa and Ben continues to grow. Ben is frustrated with being the target of Vanessa's emotional outbursts and it doesn't help that Li Yan is always on her side. At the same time, the bickering affects Vanessa physically. She runs a fever and is rushed to the hospital. Realising that Vanessa has an infection that threatens the lives of both mother and child, the doctors ...

233.title: Episode #1.233
233.plot: After the ordeal of the day before, the Rahmans and the Tongs are thrilled with the latest additions to the family. Sulaiman is the ecstatic first time father who is determined to capture every precious moment with this son. In contrast, Ben feels nothing for little Grace. Joy quickly turns into despair when Norleena finds little spots on her baby. Unable to keep the secret of the genetic disorder to herself, Norleena breaks down and tells Salmah about NF1. Salmah is against keeping the secret from Sulaiman, but Norleena forbids her from telling him. Will Salmah ...

234.title: Episode #1.234
234.plot: After a difficult and life threatening labour, Vanessa is weaker and more vulnerable than before. Li Yan is determined that Vanessa and baby Grace stay with the Tongs, but Ben is still hesitant. He is willing to help as a friend, but he is not willing to assume the responsibilities of a father. The threat of NF1 weighs heavily on Salmah's mind. She has a million questions about the genetic disorder, but the only way she can get answers is if she swallows her pride and asks Atiqah and Hassan for help. Meanwhile, Mrs Pereira offers to help Ah Biao with the Tanglin ...

235.title: Episode #1.235
235.plot: The day that everyone has been looking forward to - the newborns are finally home from the hospital. Having spent months in preparation for this big day, Sulaiman anticipates that things will go smoothly at home. The new parents are in for a big shock. Vanessa has to decide where she will stay with her baby - at that Tongs or with a friend. Will her mother's obvious disapproval of Ben make the decision easier? And while working on the Tanglin Heritage Project with Mrs Pereira, Ah Biao is overwhelmed by nostalgia as they recount the good old days of living in Tanglin.

236.title: Episode #1.236
236.plot: Vanessa suggests to Ben that they should go for the paternity test today to settle matters once and for all. She gets upset when Ben gives her the impression that he is hoping he is not the father. Eddie starts to finally get used to BMT life, as Michael encourages him to remain positive. Over at the Rahmans, Norleena and Sulaiman have to contend with Salmah's relatively old-fashioned style of parenting. Chris, worried about the difficulty of finding a full-time job, reaches out to Hassan for advice. Salmah bumps into Hassan at TCH, and when he asks after his newborn ...

237.title: Episode #1.237
237.plot: Salmah is worried when Hassan asks her to meet up, thinking that he might ask to see Rayyan. But Hassan is meeting her for some other reasons. It's Suzanne's last day at King of Sauces, and she continues to feel guilty about how things turned out with Felicia. While in camp, Michael inadvertently gets his whole bunk involved in doing extra work, deepening the rift within the section. Sulaiman, meantime, discovers that his mother's grave has been exhumed, and that in order to find out where her remains are, he'll have to get in touch with Hassan.

238.title: Episode #1.238
238.plot: Sulaiman has a big confrontation with Hassan, and Salmah is deathly afraid Sulaiman will find out that Hassan and her had a discussion about NF1 amongst other things. Shruti freaks out when she commits a tremendous faux pas on Shawn's social media page. Can she recover from this? Meanwhile, Suzanne agrees on help Wafiq and Adam with their gym's marketing and publicity, which conditions attached. The rift between Michael and Eddie deepens in their BMT training when Eddie thinks that Michael is going over the top with the NS training.

239.plot: One of the recruits Brandon suffers an injury on a route march because of Michael's over-enthusiasm. And when Michael blacks out in the bunk later, he forces Eddie to keep it secret. Through Salmah, Hassan goes to see his grandson behind Sulaiman's back. Shruti, meantime, has her first date with Shawn, but her happiness is short-lived when she gets her university application results letter.

240.plot: Bhaskar tries to encourage Shruti to write in to appeal with regards to her university application rejection but his words fall on deaf ears. However, when Shawn suggests that she puts in an appeal, Shruti is determined to do just that. But Diana warns her that things might be different if the paternity test shows that he is not the father. Jay is trying to mend bridges with Kwong San but Kwong San ignores him, much to his frustration.

241.plot: Sheila manages to convince Kwong San to spend some quality time with Jay. Kwong San agrees to go for a fishing session with Jay but the night turns sour when father and son start to argue again. Shruti accepts Shawn's invitation to a party but is upset when Shawn didn't introduce her as his girlfriend to his friends. She starts drinking and makes a fool of herself in front of Shawn. And Bhaskar, being the traditional protective father, still can't understand Meera's nonchalant attitude towards Shruti dating Shawn.

242.plot: After his fight with Kwong San, Jay doesn't come home which worries the entire Lim family including Sheila. However, news comes to them from Diana that he has been in TCH which gives them relief and they try to get him back home. Meanwhile, Vanessa is worried about Grace not gaining any weight since birth and frantically worries about it. Even Ben's reassurance doesn't help and she's adamant to use a breast pump to express her milk for Grace even though it will exhaust her. Meera reprimands Shruti with a warning after she wakes up with a hangover from her drunken ...

243.title: Episode #1.243
243.plot: As they get closer while spending time together looking after Grace, Vanessa has the feeling that Ben and her are turning into a real family. But things change quickly when Gina comes by to spend time with Ben. To make things worse, Vanessa's ex-boyfriend comes over to inquire about Grace and the possibility of Grace being his daughter, which begins to sow doubts in Ben's already troubled mind. Having lost faith in Salmah's traditional baby care methods, Norleena is less strict about things and even gets Sulaiman to buy her extra spicy mee siam. When Salmah finds out,...

244.plot: A meltdown following a spilt milk incident leaves Vanessa fearful of her emotional state which might lead her to hurt her baby without knowing it. Norleena blames herself after realising that her eating of spicy food might have caused her baby to have diarrhea. 245.plot: Ben and Vanessa receive the DNA results, confirming Ben is Grace's father. Vanessa gives Ben an ultimatum - give up Gina or she'll move out with Grace. Li Yan is devastated after failing to dissuade Vanessa from going ahead with the ultimatum, and Salmah highlights to Li Yan about her pining for her late daughter on Grace - wanting Grace to stay for her own sake rather than Ben's. Adam offers Chris a job at his gym. Chris is proud and happy and tells Li Yan the news. However, Li Yan has other pressing issues in mind and she appears to brush him off, leaving him ...

246.plot: Ben is conflicted, and struggles with being a father to Grace while being apart from Gina. Shruti similarly deals with being apart from Shawn, and devises ways to get him to communicate with her. Chris is eager to shoulder more responsibility and share in the family's workload. Everyone's impressed by his work when he reveals the revamped alfresco area at TCH. Xue Ling's plans to start her own skin care business gather pace and she fears it may make Kwong San feel redundant, but Kwong San has bigger worries on his mind. Meanwhile, Mrs Pereira experiences a shooting ...

247.title: Episode #1.247
247.plot: Xue Ling takes up Jay's offer to do the catering for her makeup party but when she changes the venue to TCH, tensions mount when Jay bumps into Diana there. Shruti can't take her mind off Shawn and Pam worries she might do something desperate. The time has come for Grace's registered parents' names to be indicated on her birth certificate, and Vanessa continues to harbour hopes that she and ...

248.plot: Norleena takes over the planning for Rayyan's cukur rambut (baby's first month hair-shaving ceremony) and Sulaiman is worried about the cost he might have to incur. However, he gets a pleasant surprise from Norleena. Bee Li and Meera are worried about Madam Fatimah's handling of the TLC Fund-raising event but to teach Madam Fatimah a lesson, they decide to let her mess it up instead. Vanessa, not wanting to end up in court fighting for Grace's custody, plays mind games with Ben, resulting in Ben being in yet another fix with Gina. Michael is keen to be considered for ...

249.title: Episode #1.249
249.plot: Tanglin is a daily drama that centres on the lives of multiracial and multigenerational families - mainly the Tongs, Bhaskars, Rahmans and Lims - residents of a middle income neighbourhood, in the Holland Village, Tanglin, Commonwealth area; their lives reflect the joys, trials and tribulations of everyday Singaporeans.

250.title: Episode #1.250
250.plot: Following his positive result for the COMPASS test, Michael is raring to go and eager to impress during field camp, hoping that stellar performance outfield will make him a shoo-in for an OCS posting. Meera and Bee Li find themselves in a pickle after they have to no choice but to take over the charity fundraiser organising duties from Madam Fatimah. Ben continues to blame himself for the way things turned out with Gina, and for the mess he finds himself in with Vanessa. Ah ...

Mrs Pereira is nervous about her hysterectomy procedure, but is even more concerned about being away ...

Meanwhile, Jay tries to convince Kwong San to tell about his financial situation to the family but Kwong San refuses and tells him he'll find a way to solve this on his own. When Arjun is cavalier about answering Mrs Pereira's...

253.plot: The truth is out about Michael's condition and his army superiors are livid that they weren't informed. Michael has his mind set on OCS, and tries to convince them that's he all right and shouldn't get downgraded. Norleena talks to Sulaiman about circumcising Rayyan while he's still a baby but Sulaiman disagrees and instead wants him circumcised when he's older so that the event can be celebrated. During the soft launch of the gym, Adam has to come to Chris' defence when Wafiq worries that it might not be good for business to employ ex-offenders. Meanwhile, Jay ...

254.title: Episode #1.254
254.plot: It's celebrations all around as the Tongs celebrate Grace's first month and the Rahmans celebrate Rayyan's. Ben continues to wrestle with his unresolved feelings for Gina, still reluctant to give up his relationship for his daughter. Meanwhile, Chris and Arjun head out for drinks and Arjun tries his hand at chatting up a woman at the bar after being goaded by Chris. Jay tries to convince Kwong San to come clean with the ...

Adam comes around to Wafiq's suggestions to shift the gym's focus away from MMA when they see that ...

256.plot: Jay and Kwong San continue to discuss potential business ideas, but Jay soon has to soothe a brewing disagreement between Sheila and Bee Li over their wedding dinner plans. Arjun thinks he's in Keely's bad books for sure when he gets assigned an operation by her at the eleventh hour. Sulaiman learns from Ben that ...

Li Yan believes that Jay and Diana are in denial about their feelings for each other, but is at a loss for how to help them. Salmah offers to let Faisal and Fatimah stay at her place ...

Shruti arrives at Xue Ling's photoshoot not having followed some instructions earlier sent via email, and is chided for her lack of attentiveness. Will she still be able to get the job? Keely notices that Arjun has a knack for ...

When Adam sees that Wafiq still has a way to go before trusting Chris, Adam decides to give Chris more responsibility at the gym to allow him to prove himself. Xue Ling continues to work on her new skincare business from home, but she soon realises that she can't do it alone. Sulaiman is still sore about the fact that Norleena kept the knowledge of Rayyan's potential genetic condition from him. Paranoid about Rayyan's...

When Bhaskar continues to worry about Shruti's well-being, he decides to take matters into his own hands. At the gym, Aaron Galistan deliberately gives Chris a hard time, knowing full well that there's nothing Chris can do about it...

The recruits discuss their post-BMT future as they prepare for their 24km route march. Eddie later makes a decision that will ...

Bored and with nothing to do at home, Mrs Pereira decides clean up her apartment. Ah Biao ...

Sulaiman is a bundle of nerves as he prepares to go for a genetic test to determine if he has NF1. Chris and Suzanne have their hands full with Vivian, Suzanne's needy mother. 268.plot: Vanessa is pleased when Ben agrees to attend yoga class with her, but her mood sours when they bump into a familiar face at the gym. It's Jay and Sheila's wedding day, and the families are both excited about the festivities. Jay tries yet again to get Sheila to drop the assault case against Diana, but has a hard time convincing her of his honest intentions. It's Eddie and Michael first day at their new NS unit and Michael is far from thrilled with the posting. As Pam goes over the finances, she worries about being able to afford her university education. She ...

269.plot: In the fallout of the cancelled wedding, Diana and Jay are overjoyed to be together, finally. Kwong San and Bee Li still upset over their loss of face, are shocked to discover him helping the Tongs out at TCH. Vanessa worries about whether Ben will continue to commit to choosing Grace over Gina, and goes to Suzanne for reassurance. Arjun is concerned about what he perceives to be Bhaskar's growing closeness to Pam. Meanwhile, Pam poaches another client from Help Is ...

Meanwhile, Bhaskar is keen to finish unpacking at his new clinic so that he can be ready to open the following Monday, but...

Adam decides to develop a workout program to help pre-enlistees and NSFs to pass their NAPFA and IPPT tests, hoping that it'll bring in more customers to the gym. Arjun is excited about his...

274.plot: Meera quarrels with Bhaskar, thinking he is being petty over the issue of her loan to Joel. But Bhaskar is worried about the repercussions of his patient's death the night before. Ah Biao is called in to be the replacement photographer for Shruti's video shoot for Tanglin High, and the two clash over differences of opinion. Thinking that he might have indirectly caused the death of his patient Mdm Chia, a troubled Bhaskar seeks Arjun's opinion. To ...

Over at the Rahmans, Sulaiman grows paranoid when Salmah leaves to go to Malaysia to visit relatives, and he worries about whether he can be a good father. Love continues to blossom between Diana and Jay as they enjoy being a couple. Meanwhile, Bhaskar grows ...

CPT Goh tells Mark and Michael that one of them will be sent overseas the following week to provide clerical support, and competition between the two ensues as both are keen for a trip away. Gopal gives Arjun the idea to organise a fundraising event in order to ...

CPT Goh ...

When he gives up and heads home instead, Salmah decides that she's not going to let him get away with it. Meanwhile, Gina reveals to Suzanne that she has ...

Although everyone congratulates Ben, Sulaiman knows how he really feels and calls him out on it. Meera is excited about a new project for SMW. However, her excitement is short lived when Joel tells her that they don't have the finances for funding these new programs. Amir forgets a textbook that he needs for an assignment but when Joy comes forward to lend it to him he's ungrateful and bears a grudge against her for ...

293.title: Episode #1.293
293.plot: The rift between Meera and Bhaskar grows, compounded by the harassment from the Chias and Meera's job at SMW. At TCH, Suzanne quarrels with her mother, Vivian after discovering that she had lied about the real reason behind her divorce. Amir steals Joy's USB stick but later regrets his actions after reading about her cerebral palsy condition. Adam pretends all is normal between him and Xue Ling despite knowing about of Xue Ling's infidelity, focusing his energy on the gym business. After discovering that his car has been vandalised, it's the last straw for Bhaskar. ...

294.title: Episode #1.294
294.plot: The Tongs are drained after Vivian kept them up to listen to her sob stories the night before. To stop Vivian from spending another night at the Tongs', Chris persuades Suzanne to work things out with Vivian. Peter Tay drops a bomb on Li Yan when he informs her that he plans to sell TCH and hands her an eviction notice. At the clinic, Bhaskar hires Tanya to mediate between him and the Chias, hoping to put an end to the harassment. Amir returns the USB stick to Joy pretending that he found it in TCH. But his lie falls through. Amir loses his temper at Joy after she ...

295.title: Episode #1.295
295.plot: The rift between Suzanne and Vivian grows. Suzanne's insecurities about her relationship with Chris are heightened after a talk with Felicia. At the clinic, Bhaskar gets a surprise visit from Melody Chia, as Adam meets up with Peter to have a discussion about the fate of TCH. Will they all be able to work things out amicably? Disappointed with Amir following his brush with the law, Salmah encourages Amir to work out at Adam's gym, hoping that his pent-up energies can be put to good use. Meanwhile, Bhaskar receives some intriguing information about Joel Gardner.

296.title: Episode #1.296
296.plot: As Zul prepares to go for his Hajj, he worries about helping Li Yan to find a suitable replacement chef for TCH during his time away. Li Yan finally reveals to the rest of the family that they've been served an eviction notice. They all worry about the future of TCH and whether they'll be able to find alternative premises. Hassan is ready to be discharged from the hospital, but Atiqah's children have fallen sick and Salmah worries that Atiqah wouldn't be able to cope with looking after all of them on her own. Jay and Kwong San clash as they attempt to refine their ...

297.title: Episode #1.297
297.plot: Norleena worries about being pregnant again, and decides to take a pregnancy test to be sure. Will she tell Sulaiman about it or attempt to keep this secret from him? Zul's in for a surprise when celebrity chef Adnan turns up instead of his old friend Malik, whom he originally contacted to be his replacement at TCH. Eddie feels the pressure as he's grilled by his army mates about how far he and Xiao Wei have gone in terms of their physical relationship. Sulaiman feels the strain of being Hassan's primary caregiver as he attempts to balance his university coursework ...

298.title: Episode #1.298
298.plot: Suzanne is left without a place to stay when the pipes burst in her apartment and cause flooding. Li Yan offers her a place in the shophouse, but Suzanne is reluctant to impose on the family. Mrs Pereira has arranged for her book club to meet at TCH in an effort to help drum up business at for the coffee house prior to the move. Adnan later gets on Zul's nerves when Adnan tries to put a new spin on the menu offerings. Despite Eddie's belief that his relationship with Xiao Wei has gone up a notch after kissing her the night before, his army mates continue to tease him ...

299.title: Episode #1.299
299.plot: Succumbing to the pressure from his army mates and reluctant to lose face, Eddie lies that he's succeeded in doing it with Xiao Wei, but Julius and Mark suspect otherwise. Meanwhile, a row erupts between Suzanne and Vivian after Suzanne learns that Vivian made use of Suzanne's temporary homelessness to ask Giovanni for money. Over at the Rahmans, Sulaiman panics when he realises that his essay assignment is due. To make matters worse, he's agreed to babysit Rayyan so that Norleena can go for her spa treatment. Bhaskar is relieved when it appears that Melody Chia has ...

300.title: Episode #1.300
300.plot: Eddie agonises that Xiao Wei is more experienced than him. Mark offers to take him to a place where he can learn to become a man. Shruti and Pam try to do damage control for Eddie as they persuade Xiao Wei to forgive Eddie for rushing her before she was ready. Over at TCH, the customers are impressed by Adnan's personable manner, could he be better for business than Zul is? Vivian asks Gina for help to find an apartment for herself and Suzanne, and asks Gina to keep it a surprise from Suzanne. Bhaskar continues to struggle with Meera being away, and his insecurities ...

301.title: Episode #1.301
301.plot: Shruti, Michael and Pam help Eddie to brainstorm ways to seek Xiao Wei's forgiveness over his dreadful lie. Pam struggles to pluck up the courage to send Alex, her crush from university, a message. Adnan is pleased about sending the Tongs and Salmah into a tizzy after he hints at juicy news about Zul's past. A lonely Bhaskar is upset to see that Meera has been having a good time in Manila with Joel. He takes out his frustrations on Lathika. Suzanne suggests to Gina that they share an apartment. Gina reveals Vivian's plan, which upsets Suzanne. She decides to confront ...

302.title: Episode #1.302
302.plot: Meera is still at the overseas conference in the Philippines with Joel, and Bhaskar can't help but feel insecure. Shruti is harassed by her father's disgruntled patient, Roger Chia, and it leads to an ugly showdown between him and Bhaskar. The stakes for Arjun's charity run get higher as he and Diana make a bet to see who can run faster, further and longer. At work, Arjun discovers that rumours have been spreading about his relationship with Keely. Rizman and Julius make fun of Eddie for not being able to go through with his visit to Geylang, and Mark comes to his ...

303.title: Episode #1.303
303.plot: Everyone is on Bhaskar's side after learning of the Roger Chia incident. Bhaskar seeks legal advice from Tanya and reveals more information that he should have. After their last disagreement Sulaiman tries to make amends by taking Norleena shopping but the presence of Amir complicates matters. The bet between Arjun and Diana goes up a notch when Jay is dragged into it and he playfully sabotages Arjun. Bhaskar is concerned that Arjun's pushing himself too hard training for the marathon and suspects that something might be amiss with Arjun's health. Adam and Wafiq bond ...

304.title: Episode #1.304
304.plot: Bhaskar discusses with his lawyer Tanya about his altercation with Mr. Chia and is troubled to find out that his actions could have grave consequences. Meanwhile, Jay invites Diana to come on the Taiwan trip with him but soon realizes it's a bad decision after he sees Diana and Kwong San constantly butting heads with one another. Salmah is worried about the impact that Amir's statement will have on Bhaskar's case and urges him to exercise caution and restraint, but he's intent on telling the truth about what he saw. Norleena's refusal to go on the pill aggravates ...

305.title: Episode #1.305
305.plot: When Bhaskar gets charged, Meera refuses to let this bring them down and decides to throw an extravagant dinner party to ensure that life continues as per normal. With Bee Li's injury, Jay is getting increasingly worried about having to deal with Diana and Kwong San by himself but soon comes up with a plan with Xue Ling to solve the problem. Chris is intrigued by Dhevan's fitness, and decides to give Dhevan's recommended workout supplements a try. However, Chris soon discovers that they have serious side effects. Not wanting to fight with Sulaiman anymore, Norleena ...

306.title: Episode #1.306
306.plot: Chris is discharged from hospital, but more problems await him at work. Dhevan refuses to return his money and Chris is saddled with the health supplements. To make things worse, he's defeated in the MMA ring by a most unlikely opponent. Ben and Li Yan urge Diana to make the first move and apologise to Kwong San and resolve their disagreements amicably before they leave for the trip. In Taiwan, Diana notes the tension between Adam and Xue Ling, and tries to get Adam to open up about what's been bothering him. Will it be a free and easy holiday for the Lims and Diana ...

307.title: Episode #1.307
307.plot: As Kwong San and Jay attend the cooking class that Bee Li signed them up for, Kwong San is surprised to see that the chef conducting the class is a familiar face. The tension between Adam and Xue Ling continues to escalate, and Diana is inadvertently sucked into it. When talk arises of Peter Tay, Adam reveals a little more information than he should. The situation between Adam and Xue Ling upsets Melissa and triggers old habits from her past. Back in Singapore, Chris struggles over the supplements. He knows he shouldn't sell them, but his family needs the money. Arjun...

308.title: Episode #1.308
308.plot: Despite being aware of the harmful side effects of the supplements, Chris sells them anyway. Jay learns a lot more than cooking skills at the culinary course. He sees another side of his father at Chef Liu's class. Having spent the night at the Tongs' after another night of partying, Arjun answers an incoming call from Diana on Li Yan's phone and realises how much he misses Diana. Adam and Xue Ling take a road trip to help repair the relationship. However, worries about Melissa's eating habits are not far from their mind. A terrible accident happens and Adam realises ...

309.title: Episode #1.309
309.plot: Diana tries to help Melissa off her bad eating habits by coming up with a stress-relieving activity as they explore a national park together. What does she do when Melissa bursts into tears? It's the last day of the cooking class, and Kwong San isn't in the best of moods as he is nursing a hangover. Jay does his best to get the affirmation he needs from Kwong San. What does it have to do with pancakes? Adam and Xue Ling are determined to finish their cycling trip together on a high, as a signal of their commitment to work on their relationship. Arjun is pleased when ...

310.title: Episode #1.310
310.plot: Bee Li is showered with gifts and souvenirs from everyone except Kwong San. He braces himself for the nagging to come. Jay is pleased that the trip has improved his relationship with his father. Despite the progress Adam and Xue Ling made on their trip, Adam is back to being quiet. Xue Ling is discouraged. Jay and Diana grow closer as they babysit Grace together. Pakcik Kassim and Makcik Leha turn up at the Rahmans' for a Hari Raya visit, and they are dismayed to find some unexpected guests. The tension between Chris and Arjun continues as Arjun calls him out for ...

311.title: Episode #1.311
311.plot: As Xue Ling continues tries to prioritise her relationship with Adam over all things, a last-minute surprise at work threatens to turn everything upside down. Arjun receives worrying results from his blood test, and is informed by his doctor that he needs to go for a colonoscopy for further examination. Meanwhile, his fundraiser for the TGH childrens' playroom hasn't been as successful as he hoped, but Shruti manages to clinch him an opportunity that could make all the difference. Gina and Suzanne invite Felicia over to hang out at their place, and encourage her to ...

312.title: Episode #1.312
312.plot: Following Arjun's interview on the radio, his fundraising effort has been featured in the newspaper. Will this publicity translate to a more successful campaign? As Xue Ling prepares to leave for her Korea trip, she realises that the workload would be too much for Felicia to bear on her own. Suzanne and Gina have to manage a tricky situation when they Felicia mistakenly assumes that they've invited her to move in with them. Kassim and Leha are upset with Sulaiman for getting close to Hassan, whom they refuse to believe has turned over a new leaf. Meera is sick of ...

313.title: Episode #1.313
313.plot: Felicia gets ahead of herself by bringing Chin Huat to Gina's flat, hoping to convince him to let her move in with the girls. Over at the Rahmans', Atiqah picks up on Amir's dyslexia. Sulaiman crosses a line with Atiqah after he tells her kids that Hassan has been to prison. While Salmah agrees that Atiqah has the right to decide when her children should find out about their father's past, Sulaiman is adamant that he was just stating the fact about his father's past. A troubled Meera finds an unexpected confidant in Vivian about Joel and his comment about their ...

314.title: Episode #1.314
314.plot: Salmah's plan to help Amir backfires after Amir finds out that she's told his teachers about his dyslexia. Bhaskar advises Salmah to try to help Amir by finding him a creative outlet and helping him develop his interests. A conflicted Meera worries about how her dynamic with Joel will change at work, and contemplates quitting her job. Michael is upset that Eddie and Mark are getting closer as friends. To make things worse, Mark slacks off at work, leaving Michael to cover his workload. Pam's excited for her date with Alex, but worries about being out of touch with ...

315.title: Episode #1.315
315.plot: Mark is unwell, and Michael thinks he is malingering to get out of work. A concerned Eddie works out that Mark might actually be going through a tough time, and convinces Michael to go easy on him. Jay and Kwong San have high hopes about their new business venture as they make preparations to pitch to an investor, but they soon discover that someone's out to thwart their plans. Sulaiman realises that he goofed when he told Pam that Alex was single, and apologizes to Pam for giving her the wrong information. Salmah surprises Amir by signing him up for MMA classes at ...

316.title: Episode #1.316
316.plot: Eddie desperately tries to convince Mark to go to a doctor to get tested for STDs. In a strange turn of events, Vanessa thinks that it is Eddie who has contracted the disease. Meantime, Arjun stays at home in preparation for his colonoscopy, only to be driven up the wall by Chris and Meera. Shruti has to work on an assignment, but when she turns to Shawn, he is unwilling to help. And after the failed business pitch, Kwong San and Jay mull over Diana's advice to start all over, from the very beginning.

317.title: Episode #1.317
317.plot: Michael suspects something fishy is brewing between Eddie and Mark and decides to follow them. When confronted, Eddie continues to cover up for Mark. After a discussion with Bee Li, Kwong San has a surprising announcement for Jay regarding their food business. Over at the Bhaskars, Arjun's colonoscopy takes an amusing turn and leads to some embarrassing moments for Meera.

318.title: Episode #1.318
318.plot: Arjun's charity run is just days away and he's feeling off-colour. He brushes it off only to learn of some potentially life-changing news. Eddie and Michael try to be supportive of Mark after his visit to the STD clinic but he turns his back on them. At TCH, Chris has chosen some ridiculous costumes for the charity run that no one wants to wear.

319.title: Episode #1.319
319.plot: Just before the marathon, Shruti is finding Arjun's behavior a little strange. Arjun, meantime, is focusing all his attention on the event to hide his condition from his family. While garnering donations for the fund raiser, Shawn is jealous of Shruti being close with Firdaus and their relationship is further rocked when Shruti wants to hang out with Eddie and friends instead of spending time with Shawn. Vanessa is disappointed when Ben doesn't take an interest in planning for their wedding. She thinks Ben is just cooking up excuses to avoid marrying her.

320.title: Episode #1.320
320.plot: Vanessa promises Joy to hold a spoken word event at TCH but later gets questioned by Tanya who strictly forbids Joy from doing such events. Arjun is downtrodden by his cancer diagnosis and is slowly losing hope as Chris acts as his pillar of strength and support during this tough time. Shruti tries to make peace with Shawn who is still bitter over what happened at the fundraiser. Although Shruti apologizes and assures him of his importance in her life, Shawn is still bothered by her close relationship with her male friends.

321.title: Episode #1.321
321.plot: A happy Zul returns from his Hajj, but his happiness is short-lived when he learns that Adnan has made changes to the menu at TCH. Meanwhile, Eddie's friendship with Mark puts a strain on his friendship with Michael and Pam. Arjun hides his medical condition from his family and spends most of his time with Chris, which leads to Diana suspecting that Chris is cheating on Suzanne again.

322.title: Episode #1.322
322.plot: Diana stops Jay from confronting Arjun over his outbursts at her when Arjun arrives at TCH for a takeaway. Feeling undermined, Jay leaves in a bad mood as Sheila observes everything and tries to get under his skin regarding Arjun and Diana. However, Jay puts up a front to show that he's unaffected. Salmah's surprised to hear from Li Yan that Adnan had left TCH. She then remembers that Adnan is actually Zul's brother and tries to get the siblings to reconcile. Alone in his room, Arjun confronts the truth behind his anger at Diana - he hasn't totally gotten over her.

323.title: Episode #1.323
323.plot: Eddie is worried about Pam and tries different ways to tell her to get herself checked. However Mark gets in the way.
