Still sore about Adnan, Zul bonds over a cooking session with Atiqah and playing each other's confidante, a budding friendship begins to grow between them. Arjun is stressed out by all the medical tests and appointments for his cancer. Chris tries to comfort and encourage him but Arjun breaks down as Diana walks into them.

324.title: Episode #1.324
324.plot: Bhaskar is frustrated to learn that Amir's witness statement isn't favorable to him and decides to resort to underhanded means to protect himself. Zul's frustration continues when the TCH customers are asking for Adnan's dishes and reminiscing about his jovial personality. Wafiq, who's been holding out for Nadiah all this time, is heartbroken to learn that she's getting engaged to Ashraff. And as Arjun continues to struggle with his condition, Chris too is pretty down about it. However, Diana, being practical, tells him the last thing Arjun needs is for them to fall ...

325.title: Episode #1.325
325.plot: Salmah worries that Wafiq is still hung up on Nadiah, and resolves to continue to make him feel welcome in their family no matter what has happened between the two. Arjun continues to avoid facing his family in order that they don't catch on that there's something amiss with his health, and spends time with Chris for moral support. On Tanya's advice, Bhaskar tries to find out more information about Amir's brushes with the law in Malaysia in an attempt to discredit Amir's testimony against him. Izzy starts to give Amir maths tuition, and they start to bond after ...

326.title: Episode #1.326
326.plot: Diana and Chris encourage Arjun to come clean with his family about his medical condition, seeing as Arjun's procedure is scheduled for the following week. Salmah worries that if Tanya dredges up old information about Amir's past misdemeanours, it could be very traumatising for the boy. She and Li Yan resolve to try to talk Tanya out of it. Adam pins his hopes on training up a new MMA fighter at the gym, hoping that the fighter's success would bring the gym some much-needed publicity. After the success of Wafiq and Rayyan's face swap video, Wafiq thinks that Izzy is ...

327.title: Episode #1.327
327.plot: Arjun's disclosure that he has cancer hits the Bhaskars hard and each struggle to deal with the reality. Suzanne learns that Chris has been keeping secrets from her about the health supplements issue. While at the gym, Adam is goes into serious training, hoping he will get talent spotted for a MMA fight. And over at the Rahmans, Norleena's attempts to watch an episode of her favourite K-Drama gets foiled continually.

328.title: Episode #1.328
328.plot: Arjun checks into the hospital for his surgery and finds that being a patient isn't to his liking at all. The tension between Meera and Bhaskar, and how they cope with their son's illness, reaches a boiling point. Chris declares his love for Suzanne but she has her doubts about him. Norleena attempts to watch her K drama at work, with hilarious results.

329.title: Episode #1.329
329.plot: It's the day of Arjun's operation. Bhaskar and Meera try to stay strong for him but the stress puts a strain on their relationship. Chris makes an announcement that surprises everyone at TCH. However, Suzanne is not ready for that plan but Chris manages to convince her. Meantime, Xiao Wei continues to frustrate Eddie when she starts checking on him.

330.title: Episode #1.330
330.plot: Bhaskar is unhappy that Meera isn't taking time off from work to look after Arjun. A stressed out Meera turns to Joel for emotional support. Xiao Wei makes herself an unwelcome guest when Michael, Eddie and Pam try to keep Shruti's spirits up in light of Arjun's operation. While at TCH, Ah Biao tries to help Joy make friends with her schoolmates who snub her.

331.title: Episode #1.331
331.plot: Meera has difficulty adjusting to life at home while Arjun is still in hospital and it drives a wedge between her and Bhaskar. Ah Biao joins Mrs Pereira's book club meeting and discovers he has a secret admirer. And an ugly confrontation between Eddie and Mark results in disturbing news for Pam.

332.title: Episode #1.332
332.plot: Bhaskar reaches out to Meera hoping to put some romance back in their relationship but she rejects him. Pam has to get tested for an STD but loses her nerve when she's at the clinic. Adam's pleased a fight promoter has agreed to audition his MMA students but Michael believes his father is the best boxer there. Eddie's frustrations with Xiao Wei don't let up and it finally leads to a showdown with her.

333.title: Episode #1.333
333.plot: As Eddie happily celebrates his breakup from Xiao Wei, Michael and his army pals think he's crying inside, but he assures them he is pleased to be free again. Meera gets upset when Bhaskar excludes her from the decisions on how to care for Arjun. She starts venting to Joel, who provides her a great listening ear. It is Diana's and Chris's birthdays and they spend time with Arjun at the hospital. They delay their return home to the planned birthday party when Arjun gets cramp. Jay tries not to overthink it but he can't help feeling insecure about Diana spending time ...

334.title: Episode #1.334
334.plot: Meera tells a depressed Arjun to pull himself together and not sink into despair. Bhaskar thinks she's being too tough on their son. Vanessa gets upset when Ben gives in to Chris and Suzanne on the wedding date. Li Yan steps in and gives her a stern talking to, reminding her of some hard truths. At the gym, Dhevan dislocated his kneecap and Chris doesn't know whether to tell Adam that Dhevan is taking and selling those black market energy supplements.

335.title: Episode #1.335
335.plot: Meera and Lathika fuss over Arjun as he recovers at home, but he's adamant about getting around by himself and not being waited on hand and foot. Vanessa finds an unexpected listening ear in Tanya as her worries about her marriage to Ben start to mount. Lathika has a new admirer in one of the students in her SMW English tuition group, but he is being too reserved in his approach. An MMA fight promoter is upset he wasn't informed about Dhevan's injury. Just as he's about to leave, he spots Amir training and thinks that he's got potential. Chris and Ben are concerned ...

336.title: Episode #1.336
336.plot: Meera resolves to have a big Deepavali celebration to remind the family that in times of adversity there is always hope. But Arjun isn't really up for it just yet. Bhaskar, meanwhile, confides in Li Yan about how difficult it was for him to deal with the possibility of losing Arjun to cancer, bringing up old hurts for Li Yan. On the MMA fight promoter's recommendation, Adam and Wafiq resolve train Amir up, but they first have to convince Salmah that pursuing MMA won't affect his studies.

337.title: Episode #1.337
337.plot: Michael notices that Adam is feeling a little defeated after Ali's visit to the gym. After some probing, Adam confesses to Michael that he feels washed out and doesn't think he has anything left to offer to the MMA world and ultimately his career. Shruti is disappointed when she does badly for her mid-terms but she is touched by Shawn's encouragement. Felicia and Gina are horrified to find out that Suzanne is intending to get a wedding dress from Carousell. They decide to come up with a plan to get Suzanne a brand new dress

338.title: Episode #1.338
338.plot: Jay gets increasingly worried as Diana continues to spend more time with Arjun. Although, Diana assures him that she only feels sorry for Arjun, Jay fears that the love between them could be reignited. Pam tries to tell Shruti that Shawn has been lying to her about doing school projects when in fact, he is out partying with his friends. However, when she is about to show Shruti the uploaded photo of Shawn's partying, it is removed. Bee Li overhears Kwong San's business conversation with Jay and she gets paranoid when she thinks that Kwong San is losing money. Her ...

339.title: Episode #1.339
339.plot: As TCH gets ready for the press conference for the launch of the Children's Playroom, Arjun braces himself to face the press, thinking they would focus more on his illness, rather than what he has done. Jay puts away his insecurity about Arjun to help with the launch. When he sees the way Arjun and Diana get along, his old feelings of jealousy resurface. Convinced that her family is broke, Bee Li tries to find a job. It's the finale of Norleena's favourite K-Drama series. She does everything she can to make sure she can watch the last episode in peace, but nothing ...

340.title: Episode #1.340
340.plot: With no one else to turn to, Jay goes to Kwong San for advice about Diana and Arjun. But will he take his father's advice and confess to Diana how he really feels? Norleena, meantime, is upset that she slept through the entire last episode of her favourite K-Drama. Now she needs to find a way to watch that episode before someone tells her how the series ended. Bee Li finds it very difficult to find a job. And the only person she can turn to for help is Wati.

341.title: Episode #1.341
341.plot: The sleepless nights due to Rayyan's teething takes a toll on Sulaiman and Norleena. When Sulaiman tells Norleena that he would be home late as he needs to redo his essay, Norleena gets upset and they bicker. Meanwhile, Shruti stresses over the planning for Deepavali. And as Arjun gets his central line inserted in preparation for the chemo, he avoids the topic of fertility issues much to Meera's annoyance.

342.title: Episode #1.342
342.plot: It's Deepavali. Norleena and Sulaiman make use of the public holiday to tidy up the home. However, the decluttering exercise fails to take off with Norleena's hoarding personality getting in the way. Deepavali celebration is in full swing at the Bhaskars, When the guests start asking Arjun about his condition and offer unsolicited advice, Shruti helps Arjun out. They share a warm brother-sister moment and upon Arjun's advice, Shruti meets up with Shawn and apologises for her behaviour. They patch up.

343.title: Episode #1.343
343.plot: Sulaiman sets Pam up on a blind date, unaware that she has feelings for him. Arjun undergoes his first chemo therapy treatment, and picks up a couple of tips on how to deal with the chemo from a cancer patient at the hospital. Meantime, the romantic spark between Lathika and Murugan intensifies.

344.title: Episode #1.344
344.plot: The negative side effects of the chemo start to take its toll on Arjun. Pam tries to avoid Sulaiman, as she is worried about being attracted to him. However, Sulaiman thinks it is because of the blind date that he set her up. Over at the SMW, Joel, aware of their mutual attraction, tries to play cupid to Lathika and Murugan.

345.title: Episode #1.345
345.plot: Bee Li is annoyed that her family doesn't tell her anything and leaves her out of all the discussions. Meanwhile, Kwong San is not comfortable with Jay's investment into their new business. Lathika is pretty excited about her study date with Murugan, even dressing and dolling up. But she's left disappointed when he doesn't show up. Shruti starts to get curious about Pam's secret crush, but Pam is not revealing his identity.

346.title: Episode #1.346
346.plot: Thinking that the family financial situation is in dire straits, Bee Li goes for an interview to be a beer lady. Izzy tries to get close to Wafiq, who's overseeing the gym in Adam's absence, by inviting him to practice MMA with her. But things get awkward when she ends up hitting him in the face. While in camp, Eddie, Rizman and Julius find out they will not be posted out after completing their training. They decide to celebrate. Mark, however, decides to opt out of the celebration. Eddie and Michael are relieved, but Julius and Rizman think there is something fishy ...

347.title: Episode #1.347
347.plot: Bee Li reminds Wati to keep her 'beer lady' secret from the family, especially Kwong San. Jay is all excited about his new food venture and books a commercial kitchen, but his plan is sabotaged by Sheila, who booked up all the kitchens in town. Diana offers to let Jay use the TCH kitchen. Suzanne gets irritated by Vivian's open flirtation with a new boyfriend and starts to worry if her own life and marriage will end up like hers.

348.title: Episode #1.348
348.plot: Michael continues to ignore Mark and refuses to help Mark with his work. Julius and Rizman feel that Michael should be more supportive since they all went through BMT together. Seeing Diana banter with Arjun while visiting him, Jay feels uneasy and gets upset when Diana tells Arjun about the business rivalry with Sheila. Vivian's new boyfriend, who works with a wedding magazine, offers to feature Suzanne and Chris in a sponsored wedding special. Chris is keen as everything from the venue to the décor will be paid for, but Suzanne is skeptical about the deal.

349.title: Episode #1.349
349.plot: Suzanne is still not convinced that Vivian is sincere about helping with her wedding. Just when she thinks her mother's offer might truly come from the heart, a surprise awaits her. Zul doesn't feel well and he needs help in the kitchen. Will Vanessa prove to be a capable assistant or will he be forced to turn to Adnan? Meanwhile in camp, Michael finally discover the reason behind Captain Goh's recent outbursts.

350.title: Episode #1.350
350.plot: It is the day of the photoshoot and Vanessa is looking forward to it. As the shoot will not happen if both couples are not there, Vanessa is frustrated when Chris informs her that Suzanne might not turn up. Kwong San shows Jay the way they used to get business in the good old days. Jay wonders if his father can take the stress and strain of working under the hot sun. Michael find out that good deeds don't always mean good returns when he gets into trouble for helping Captain Goh the day before.

351.title: Episode #1.351
351.plot: Tanglin Coffee House is to be featured in the Tanglin Heritage Food Fair. Just as Li Yan and Ah Biao reminisce about the time the coffee house first started, they receive disturbing news from Peter Tay. As Ben and Vanessa's wedding draws closer, Gina finds herself struggling with the fact that the man she loves will soon be somebody else's husband. Diana finds out Bee Li is a beer lady. Will she keep it a secret?

352.title: Episode #1.352
352.plot: Joy starts an online petition to prevent Peter Tay from selling off Tanglin Coffee House. Everyone thinks it's a great idea except her mother Tanya. Bee Li opens up to Diana about her job as a beer lady. The unlikely pair bond as they discuss Jay and Kwong San keeping secrets from Bee Li. Gina can't bring herself to believe that Ben is Grace's father. She is determined to find out the truth once and for all.

353.title: Episode #1.353
353.plot: The family worries about Li Yan. They think she is stressed by Peter Tay's plans to sell off TCH. Only Ben knows it is Jasmine's birthday and Li Yan misses her long-lost daughter. Zul is about to serve his Mee Siam based on his closely guarded recipe to Atiqah's students, when Adnan gently reminds him that he missed an important ingredient, leaving a paranoid Zul to think that Adnan also knows about the secret recipe. Bee Li is running out of excuses while hiding her beer lady job from Kwong San. Together with Diana and Wati, they brainstorm for the perfect reason for...

354.title: Episode #1.354
354.plot: Zul is nervous, knowing he has to do a cooking demonstration at the Heritage Food Fair alongside his celebrity brother Adnan. Gina's determination to get a DNA sample of Ben's and Grace's lands her in a tricky situation. While at TCH, Vanessa is impressed by Joy's poem to save the coffee house.

355.title: Episode 355
355.plot: Thinking that Adnan stole his secret recipe, Zul unwittingly sabotages Adnan's plan to publish a cookbook and this results in a huge bust up between the brothers. Li Yan and Ben are elated when Grace speaks her first words but it makes Vanessa question their real motives. At the gym, Suzanne learns that Izzy has a huge crush on Wafiq.

356.title: Episode #1.356
356.plot: Disaster strikes Pam's art project as some important components go missing, and she has to think of something new to submit in less than 24 hours. The Tongs hold a farewell party for Chef Adnan. Will Zul and Adnan finally reconcile? Amir brings back his school report card and Salmah is appalled.

357.title: Episode #1.357
357.plot: Shruti finds out that 'Hiro' is really Sulaiman. She confronts Pam and warns her about the consequences of getting too close to a married man. Meantime, Joy's spoken word video about saving TCH goes viral. Lathika suspects that Murugan and Bhawani are dating while Izzy tries to find out more about Wafiq's history with Nadiah.

358.title: Episode 358
358.plot: In an effort to save Tanglin Coffee House, the community comes together at TCH for Joy's spoken word event. Annoyed by the increasing negative publicity he is receiving, Peter Tay and his lawyer unexpectedly attend the event to intimidate Joy. Tanya and the community race to Joy's defense, causing a frustrated Peter Tay to eventually walk out. Afterwards, everyone wonders if the spoken word event has only made the situation worse, but Tanya is confident it was a success.

359.title: Episode 359
359.plot: Tension during breakfast at the Lims as they avoid the mention of Peter Tay while talking about the spoken word event. Much to everyone's surprise, Adam suggests Xue Ling to talk to Peter Tay about selling off TCH. The Tongs are devastated to know that the sale of TCH has been finalised. Tanya meets up with Peter Tay to dissuade him from selling TCH. However, Peter counteracts by threatening to sue her daughter Joy. At SMW, Joel and Meera's attempts to reach Bhawani were unsuccessful and decide to meet Jasveen, Bhawani's employer. Meanwhile, Lathika confronts Murugan ...

360.title: Episode #1.360
360.plot: Tanya comes over to TCH with good news for Li Yan - Peter Tay has agreed to renew the lease of TCH, much to Li Yan's relief. While discussing about Chris's and Suzanne's wedding, Ah Biao gets upset when the issue of the traditional wedding dowry gets tossed aside by Vivian. Meera drags Jasveen away to TCH so that Joel can speak to Bhawani freely about her bruises. Will Bhawani speak the truth, or falsely accuse Murugan?

361.title: Episode #1.361
361.plot: Kwong San struggles to adjust to doing business with no office and no staff. Seeing Jay smooth things over after a mistake that he made, Kwong San realises how capable his son is. Gina's heart is in her mouth as she opens the DNA paternity test on Vanessa's baby Grace. Meanwhile, Bhaskar meets with Mr Chia to try to arrive at an out-of-court settlement, but unintentionally makes things worse.

362.title: Episode #1.362
362.plot: Kwong San is furious when he discovers Bee Li is working as a beer lady. Gina has proof that Ben is not Grace's biological father and decides she must break the news to him. Vivian has a wedding dress specially made for Suzanne and knowing that Suzanne will not accept it if it comes from her, Vivian convinces Suzanne its part of the wedding package.

363.title: Episode 363
363.plot: It's the day of the double wedding. Chris suffers pain and humiliation trying to gate crash Suzanne's apartment. Vivian is on edge as she wants Suzanne to have the perfect wedding. Gina, meanwhile, is egged on by Felicia to tell Ben the truth about Grace and Vanessa but will Gina manage to do it before Ben puts the ring on Vanessa's finger?

364.title: Episode 364
364.plot: Vanessa is overwhelmed by guilt and decides to leave Ben a day after the wedding. The Tong family is thrown into a frenzy as they try every way possible to find her. Chris comes clean with Vivian about his past including his stint in prison and his bluff about being the gym owner. Anticipating a dramatic blowout from Vivian, Suzanne and Chris are surprised that Vivian is actually quite calm about the revelations. However, Vivian has something in store for Chris.

365.title: Episode 365
365.plot: Ben is distraught and is an emotional mess after finding out that he isn't Grace's biological father. Meanwhile, Li Yan blames herself for pushing Ben to accept Vanessa and Grace, and Gina can't help but feel guilty about confronting Vanessa at the wedding. She thinks that could have triggered Vanessa to run away from Ben. Pam gets angry when she runs into Eddie and Michael talking to Mark. She is disappointed that they are still hanging out. To appease her, Eddie and Michael have no choice but to come up with an explanation on why they can't totally ignore Mark.

366.title: Episode 366
366.plot: News of Vanessa's departure and Grace's paternity shocked everyone. Except for Ah Biao who sympathises with Vanessa, the rest questions the timing of her confession. Friendship blossoms between Lathika and Murugan as they message each other throughout the day, distracting Lathika from her work. As an excuse to get close to Sulaiman, Pam offers to babysit Rayyan.

367.title: Episode #1.367
367.plot: Excitement abound as Pam and Shruti head for the chalet. However, Pam's mood dips when Mark turns up at the chalet. The rift between the two deepens when Pam rejects Mark's apology. Over at the Lims, Bee Li is put in a spot when she is appointed to host this year's TLC Christmas Party and tries to rally the family to help.

368.title: Episode #1.368
368.plot: Mark and Pam get into a tiff after he accuses her of a spiteful act. Upset with Eddie and Michael for being friends with Mark, Pam complains to Sulaiman about being pranked at the chalet. Sulaiman tells Eddie and Michael off, further fuelling Pam's affection for Sulaiman. Ah Biao is unhappy that the rest of the Tongs are not looking for Vanessa. Mrs Pereira helps him initially but when he refuses to listen to her advice not to push Ben, they fall out. Murugan leaves abruptly during a date, leaving Lathika wondering what went wrong.

369.title: Episode #1.369
369.plot: Eddie and Michael discover that Pam has deleted them as friends on social media. Shruti tries to get Pam to forgive Eddie and Michael, but Pam won't change her mind. Li Yan wants Ah Biao to stop forcing Ben to look for Vanessa. When Ah Biao brings up Laura's suicide, Li Yan gets defensive. Xue Ling and Adam end up arguing over money issues when Melissa takes cash from both them to buy a dress for the Christmas party.

370.title: Episode #1.370
370.plot: Suzanne and Chris are finally moving into Gina's flat. The girls tease her about Chris's lack of romanticism and although she tries to defend him, Suzanne knows it's true and it's a matter of time before Chris really pushes her off the edge. In an effort to impress the TLC ladies, Bee Li decides to throw a European-themed Christmas party. Ben is now determined to find Vanessa and Grace which makes Gina feel a little unwanted. Although he tries to explain the reasons for his actions, she can't help but wonder if he still has feelings for Vanessa.

371.title: Episode #1.371
371.plot: The strain on their marriage is unbearable. Xue Ling and Adam have no choice but to confront their problems. Kwong San decides to do his part for Bee Li's Christmas party by teaching Diana some basic etiquette. Will Diana be ready in time for the party? Meanwhile, Chris and Suzanne adjust to married life with a little help from Gina and Felicia.

372.title: Episode #1.372
372.plot: Bee Li wants to throw the Christmas party of the year to impress the guests. However, Diana is in the spotlight as she tries to be the perfect lady. As the guests mingle and make merry, Jay and Xue Ling bicker over how she is handling her marriage. The pressure increases for Xue Ling to make a decision about her relationship with Adam. Vanessa, meantime, reaches out to Bhaskar for help. Is this another manipulative move from her or is Grace really sick?

373.title: Episode #1.373
373.plot: Bee Li and Kwong San are pleased to see Xue Ling and Adam getting closer and are glad that they are working out their differences, not suspecting that it is all a charade. Pam starts her babysitter duties with the Rahmans. However, it's clear the only reason she took up this job is to get close to Sulaiman. Ben finally meets Vanessa and Grace, and Gina is troubled when Ben is determined to separate Grace from Vanessa and raise her on his own. At home, Arjun really misses the working life and can't wait to get back to work.

374.title: Episode #1.374
374.plot: Shruti thinks she has given a tired and listless Arjun, who is still coming to terms with his chemotherapy, a shot in the arm when she shares with him the joys of blogging. But she is in for a surprise. It is Pam's second day of babysitting duty and she is left all alone with Rayyan by Salmah, who has to leave to attend to an emergency. Ben has been to see Grace again and Gina is not pleased that she wasn't informed of the visit.

375.title: Episode #1.375
375.plot: Arjun plans to go to a bar with Chris in spite of Meera's objections and his night out turns out to be both good and bad. Norleena likes how well Rayyan has taken to Pam and gives her a present that Pam thinks is a gift from Sulaiman. Salmah inadvertently upsets Amir and it results in a cold war between them.

376.title: Episode #1.376
376.plot: Shruti worries that Pam is falling for Sulaiman, and has a word with him. Joy looks forward to meeting the Christmas carollers but it turns out to be an anti-climax. Meantime, Ah Biao learns why Mrs Pereira is embarrassed to sing. Bee Li suspects Xue Ling and Adam are having marital problems and her probing only makes things worse.

377.title: Episode #1.377
377.plot: Xue Ling's business gets a welcome boost but it means she will have to be away during Christmas, causing more tension between her and her parents. A worried Sulaiman reveals to Norleena that Pam has a crush on him but her reaction surprises him. Vanessa continues to manipulate Ben in his efforts to spend time with Grace.

378.title: Episode #1.378
378.plot: Shruti apologises to Pam for telling Sulaiman about her crush on him. She promises not to let Pam down again. However, when Eddie later makes a snarky comment, Pam accuses Shruti of gossiping about her. Mrs Pereira is happy when Ah Biao invites her for Christmas Eve dinner, until he also extends the invite to Geok Chu. Ben, meanwhile, continues to worry about getting access to Grace.

379.title: Episode 379
379.plot: Arjun is desperate to impress the panel of interviewers for the hospital residency but loses his cool when they question him about his cancer. Meera and Bhaskar find out about Pam's crush on Sulaiman and ask Shruti why she didn't tell them. Shruti then becomes defensive and makes a callous remark. At her new job, Gina badmouths Peter Tay. Unfortunately, he is her new client and he has overheard what he said.

380.title: Episode 380
380.plot: A bittersweet parting at the Lims as Xue Ling leaves for her business trip to Korea. Meanwhile, Ben continues to visit Grace, making Vanessa uncomfortable. Upon learning Vanessa's desire to be independent of him, Ben fears that he will be cut off from Grace's life. Over at the Tongs, Chris and Diana team up to get Arjun and Jay to resolve their issues. However, things did not turn out as expected.

381.title: Episode 381
381.plot: Christmas spirit is in the air as the Tongs get ready for the Christmas Eve's dinner party with Joy, Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira helping to decorate TCH. After learning the reason behind her decision to join a gym, Sulaiman feels guilty for making Norleena insecure because of Pam. An incident involving Grace reinforces Ben's decision to fight for full custody of Grace.

382.title: Episode 382
382.plot: It's the Christmas Eve party at TCH. Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira bond although it gets increasingly difficult with Geok Chu flirting with Ah Biao. When she has a last minute part-time job to go for, Vanessa has no choice but to get Ben to babysit Grace. Although, she gets the cold shoulder from the Tongs, she is heartened to see that their love for Grace has not diminished. Seeing that Izzy is interested in Wafiq, Norleena plays matchmaker by arranging Izzy to give tuition to Kalila.

383.title: Episode 383
383.plot: A scratchy throat sends alarm to Meera who is worried that Arjun might not be well enough for chemo. However, Arjun reassures the doctor he is fine and goes ahead with the chemo as planned. At TCH, Eddie is freaking over the possibility that Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira could be dating. While Joy is adamant and refuses to leave Singapore until Tanya gives her an honest answer on why they need to pack up and go.

384.title: Episode 384
384.plot: Tanya is preparing to leave Singapore but Joy is determined not to budge. The women in Wafiq's life are making things difficult for him. Kalila doesn't listen to her father and Fitri nags him as well. Wafiq expects Izzy to give him a hard time too, but he's in for a surprise. After his cycle of chemo, Arjun's health rapidly deteriorates. Meera needs the assurance that her son will be well, but Bhaskar is not too hopeful.

385.title: Episode #1.385
385.plot: Wafiq gets into even more trouble with the women in his life. Everything he says and does seems to be wrong. Meera and Bhaskar worry about Arjun. It's not just his health that is deteriorating, but his morale as well. Will he harm himself further in his rush to get better? Joy sees a side of her mother that she has never seen before. She is determined to find out what is truly bothering Tanya.

386.title: Episode #1.386
386.plot: It's New Year's Eve and everyone has big plans for the night except for Li Yan. Shruti puts her birthday celebrations on hold as she's still worried about Arjun, while Joy is still frustrated by Tanya's decision to return to the UK. Norleena is excited to meet a former crush Khairul, but worries Sulaiman might get jealous.

387.title: Episode #1.387
387.plot: It's the day of Bhaskar's court case and he's feeling the pressure. The tension increases for the family when Arjun's condition deteriorates and Meera struggles to deal with the enormity of the situation. Amir is nervous about his court appearance and Salmah is on hand to reassure him. Over at the Tongs, Diana still can't get over Jay's lack of interest in social media.

388.title: Episode #1.388
388.plot: As Arjun battles for his life in the hospital, everything comes to a standstill for Meera as she waits to see if Arjun will make it through the night. Emotions run high as Chris tells Diana that Arjun still loves her. Meanwhile, Shruti thinks she found out the truth about Tanya.

389.title: Episode #1.389
389.plot: It's great news for the Bhaskars when Arjun pulls through and is on the road to recovery. Attention once again is turned to Tanya's real identity when Eddie questions Tanya about her past. Is she really the child that Li Yan gave away 30 years ago?

390.title: Episode #1.390
390.plot: Diana and Jay's relationship is strained after Chris blurted out that Arjun still loves Diana in front of Jay at the hospital. Will Jay confront their problem or will he continue to let it fester? Sulaiman and Norleena decide to go on a 'new year healthy eating' plan after Norleena thinks she is getting fat. A stunned Bhaskar finds out Tanya is his daughter. But he reacts in a way that no one anticipated the kind doctor would.

391.title: Episode #1.391
391.plot: Diana has had enough of Jay's insecurities. Is this the beginning of the end of their relationship? Norleena and Salmah fuss over what to cook after they invited Khairul for dinner, leaving Sulaiman to wonder what is the big deal. Eddie, meanwhile, grapples over Tanya being his half-sister and the ripple effect it has on the family tree.

392.title: Episode #1.392
392.plot: Khairul comes for dinner. Salmah and Norleena fawn and fuss over their handsome guest. Atiqah continues to be pushed to limit as she juggles her work, her children and her sick husband. And Sulaiman is stunned when he finds out what the solution to her problem is. At this gym, Izzy is excited to get cracking on the app to impress Wafiq.

393.title: Episode #1.393
393.plot: Ben offers to help babysit Grace when Vanessa is out looking for jobs. Seeing her struggle makes Ben happy that he will be able to successfully fight her for Grace's' custody. Tired of hearing Norleena and Salmah gushing about Khairul, Sulaiman chats with Hassan about it and they bond further. Khairul, clearly interested in Izzy, tries to pursue her but Izzy only has eyes for Wafiq.

394.title: Episode #1.394
394.plot: In his pursuit of getting full custody of Grace, Ben is disappointed to find out that it is not as straight forward as he thinks it is. Norleena helps Vanessa with some baby issues and convinces her to come for the mother-toddler meeting at TCH. However things quickly get ugly at the meeting. Yasmine visits Wafiq at the gym and relays her discomfort in having Izzy tutor Kalila, while a gym user gets injured due to Chris's negligence.

395.title: Episode #1.395
395.plot: Ben kick starts his plans to discredit Vanessa in his quest to gain full custody of Grace. Suzanne, meantime, is not too happy with Chris for not telling her that Adam docked his pay as a punishment. Khairul starts to pursue Izzy. Izzy is not interested in him but they find out they actually have something in common.

396.title: Episode #1.396
396.plot: Kwong San and Bee Li run into Peter Tay at Okinawa. The paranoid Bee Li thinks that Peter Tay is planning a trip here just to see Xue Ling but Kwong San dismisses her worries. Meanwhile, Felicia gets into trouble with a potential client Mr Higa, who happens to be Jared's uncle.

397.title: Episode #1.397
397.plot: Gina thinks that Peter Tay's presence in Okinawa has something to do with more than just wanting to discuss the beachfront property deal. Bee Li urges Felicia to get Jared to fix another meeting with his uncle Mr Higa after what happened at dinner the night before. And more trouble for Felicia when she gets into an argument with Suzanne over their conflicting ways of doing things.

398.title: Episode #1.398
398.plot: More misunderstandings between Felicia and Suzanne when Suzanne couldn't get in touch with Felicia to set up the booth at the conference. Gina's frustration grows when Peter Tay shows scant interest in the beachfront property deal. Meanwhile, Kwong San is still kicking himself over his slip-of-a-tongue to Peter Tay. He thinks he unwittingly encouraged Peter Tay by telling him that Xue Ling and Adam are having marital problems.

399.title: Episode #1.399
399.plot: After checking the photos on their phones, Felicia and Jared are convinced that they might have been mistaken for scammers. At the booth, Suzanne and Vivian fall out after Vivian confronts Suzanne about the pregnancy. Meanwhile, in an attempt to cheer him up, Gina drags Peter Tay on a sightseeing trip with her. As Peter Tay warms up to her, Gina discovers that he is not what he seems to be.

400.title: Episode #1.400
400.plot: Peter changes his mind about the resort deal and decides to go ahead with the negotiation. However, Tony Loke proves to be a tough nut to crack. Meantime, Bee Li discovers Vivian had lied to Tony Loke about being the boss of Xue Organics. Love blossoms between Felicia and Jared as they go on a fun-filled trip to the beach. However, Felicia is gutted when Jared reveals that he would need to stay in Japan for a while. Can the lovers survive a long distance relationship?

401.title: Episode #1.401
401.plot: Suzanne tells Chris that she is pregnant. Initially over the moon, Chris gets upset when he finds out that Vivian knew days ago. Tanya thinks that Bhaskar is avoiding her and approaches Li Yan to talk to him on her behalf, which incurs the wrath of Meera. Meantime, Gina offers to help Vanessa find a job.

402.title: Episode #1.402
402.plot: Suzanne and Chris try to pick up the pieces and reconcile from their fight. Ben learns that Vanessa is about to be kicked out of her flat. All the Lims are on their toes as Bee Li gets ready for Chinese New Year while Adam struggles with the awkward question of Xue Ling being away.

403.title: Episode #1.403
403.plot: Chinese New Year's Eve is a day away and everyone in the Lim household is excited that Xue Ling will be back in time for the reunion dinner. Jay is detailed to cook the dinner and he ropes in a reluctant Kwong San to help him in the kitchen. Sulaiman is surprised to learn that Ben may be hatching a plan to get full custody of Grace while Norleena worries as Vanessa's struggles as a single mum continue.

404.title: Episode 404
404.plot: The Lim household is not in a good way as their reunion dinner will take place without Xue Ling. Melissa misses her Mum and makes matters worse by throwing a tantrum. Disappointment hits the launch of the TGH playroom when the Bhaskars learn Arjun is too ill to attend it. Meanwhile, Li Yan is nervous as Tanya makes her first official appearance as a member of the Tong family at their reunion dinner.

405.title: Episode 405
405.plot: The Chinese New Year spirit is missing at the Lims with Xue Ling working overseas and Adam at his gym. On the other hand, this year's Chinese New Year is extra special for Tanya and Joy as they spend it with the Tongs. Friendship blossoms between Lathika and Murugan after they make up, having quarreled the day before. At the gym, Adam reveals to Wafiq that Xue Ling and him are separated after Wafiq questions Adam's moodiness.

406.title: Episode #1.406
406.plot: A flurry of activities at the Bhaskars as they prepare for the night's dinner with Tanya and Joy. However, Li Yan feels slighted after being left out of the dinner invite. Meanwhile, Adam and Wafiq debate over how to convince Salmah after deciding to enter Amir for the MMA Competition. Over at the Rahmans, Sulaiman is in panic mode while preparing for his test tomorrow.

407.title: Episode #1.407
407.plot: The stress of studying and taking care of Hassan is getting to Sulaiman. Atiqah sits him down and tells him that it is time that they send Hassan to a nursing home. Norleena continues to encourage Wafiq to put all qualms aside and pursue Izzy now that Khairul is perceived to be a 'threat'. Meera, upset with the Bhaskar-Tanya situation, confides in Vivian and finds an unlikely ally in her.

408.title: Episode 408
408.plot: When Sulaiman brings up the decision to send Hassan to a nursing home, it is met with objection from Salmah, who believes that it is the family's responsibility to care for a sick family member. On the other hand, Hassan decides to move to the nursing home to not be a burden to Atiqah and Sulaiman. Seeing that Felicia is still hung up on Jared, Suzanne and Gina decide to go on a girls' night out where they will party and get to meet hot guys, something that doesn't sit very well with Chris.

409.title: Episode 409
409.plot: It's the day of Hassan's funeral and everyone rallies around Atiqah to give her support. Vivian is disappointed when she has to hear from Felicia that Suzanne is going for her ultrasound scan. Meanwhile, Adam makes a deal with the fight promotor Mr Ali to take part in the MMA Championship.

410.title: Episode #1.410
410.plot: Kwong San and Bee Li are worried to learn that Adam is going to fight in the MMA Championship. But there's a bigger surprise in store for them. Chris goes for a job interview and is stunned when he finds out who the interviewer is. Melissa, meantime, struggles with her studies in the absence of Xue Ling.

411.title: Episode #1.411
411.plot: While the Bhaskars get the house ready for Arjun's return from the hospital, the issue of how to tell him about Tanya looms. Meanwhile Suzanne's morning sickness kicks in while Chris gets a job offer but finds himself in a dilemma. Over at the Lims, Bee Li and Kwong San are dismayed to learn of Xue Ling's and Adam's decision to separate. Just when Adam thinks the worse is over, Xue Ling drops another bombshell on him.

412.title: Episode 412
412.plot: Shruti bumps into Pam in the campus and is surprised to see her hanging out with a mystery man. Tension rises between Bhaskar and Meera over the issue of Tanya. When Arjun finally returns home, he questions the family's secretive behaviour. Xue Ling and Adam bring their kids out for an outing. Everything seems to be going well until Xue Ling and Adam break the news of their separation to them.

413.title: Episode #1.413
413.plot: Kwong San and Bee Li are disappointed when Xue Ling decides to move out of their condo and to a hotel after her separation from Adam. Tanya thinks that Meera is not happy with her around so she decides to invite Meera for lunch in hope that they will get to know each other better. The fragile relationship between Shruti and Shawn continues to be tested when Shruti decides she doesn't want to go to a party with Shawn.

414.title: Episode #1.414
414.plot: It's Valentine's Day. Chris has plans for Suzanne but things didn't turn out the way he wanted. Atiqah is still coping with the loss of Hassan, and things come to a head when Faisal and Fatimah become uncooperative. Meanwhile, Shruti and Shawn decide to give their relationship one more chance. But will they last?

415.title: Episode #1.415
415.plot: Shruti tries to work things out with Shawn. However when he continues to humiliate her, she decides that enough is enough. At the Lims, Bee Li and Kwong San are not happy about Xue Ling coming in and out of their home, treating it like a hotel and want her to move back. Still grieving over Hassan, Atiqah brings the kids to TCH and is glad to have an understanding and helpful friend in Zul.

416.title: Episode #1.416
416.plot: At Chris's insistence, Suzanne tries to make amends with Vivian after being rude to her. Shruti is at an all-time low after Shawn accused her of plagiarism and is in the process of being investigated by the university. Mark and Michael are tasked to help CPT Goh with the army recruitment drive. Mark is excited as he knows doing a good job will enable to get his promotion faster and get that extra bit of money. However, Michael isn't interested as he is more worried about his parents' separation and how it is affecting Melissa and himself.

417.title: Episode #1.417
417.plot: The miscarriage affects Chris and Suzanne in different ways. Suzanne refuses to accept it as Chris struggles to support her through the loss. Jared returns to Singapore, and Felicia tries not to fall for him again. Norleena feels that Ben is being too critical of Vanessa. She is sure Vanessa has changed and is trying her best to be a good mum.

418.title: Episode #1.418
418.plot: Life is not the same without Xue Ling. Adam misses her and finds ways to stay connected. Vanessa continues to be clueless about Ben's attempt to gain custody of Grace. It is harder to keep it under wraps as both Tanya and Norleena are tempted to tell Vanessa. Meantime, Jared tries to get Felicia to like him.

419.title: Episode #1.419
419.plot: Ben's attempts to derail Vanessa's new plans for Grace turn ugly when Sulaiman and Norleena get dragged into it. Peter Tay tricks Adam into thinking he's been sleeping with Xue Ling. Wafiq gives Chris advice that helps him and Suzanne get over the miscarriage, while Shruti has to re-examine her friendship with Pam.

420.title: Episode #1.420
420.plot: Melissa gets upset when she sees Adam hanging out with Sandra. Shruti wants to be friends with Pam again but the latter keeps avoiding her. Gina is upset with Vanessa for being too dependent on Ben all the time, until she hears differently from Norleena. And sensing Xue Ling is vulnerable after the split with Adam, Peter Tay makes a move for her.

421.title: Episode #1.421
421.plot: Adam and Xue Ling sign the separation papers and in the aftermath, they react in very different ways. At TCH, Felicia gets jealous when Jared flirts with a female colleague. Meantime, Gina, Sulaiman and Norleena intervene to get Ben to lay off Vanessa.

422.title: Episode #1.422
422.plot: Peter Tay, upset that Xue Ling has refused his advances, finds a willing listener in Gina. Vivian gives advice to Felicia on how to handle Jared but it only leaves her even more confused. Shruti is pleased that she and Pam are buddies again, not knowing that Pam is still not being entirely honest with her.

423.title: Episode #1.423
423.plot: Wafiq, already jealous when he sees Izzy hanging out with Khairul, get even more upset when the gym app that Izzy uploaded to his phone crashed. Shruti's finally cleared of plagiarism and she has plans to celebrate at Pam's new place. Meantime, the on-off relationship between Felicia and Jared continues.

424.title: Episode #1.424
424.plot: Pam confesses to Shruti that Wayne and her are together. Shruti, not knowing Wayne's background, gives Pam her blessings. It is recess week at the university and Norleena drags Sulaiman to the gym for some much needed exercise. Ben brings up the subject of adopting Grace but Vanessa is not comfortable with the idea.

425.title: Episode #1.425
425.plot: After discovering that Pam is going out with Wayne, Shruti shares her reservations about him to Pam. But Pam brushes it off. Over at the Tongs, Ben is going full speed ahead with the adoption process. Meanwhile, competition heats up between Wafiq and Khairul over Izzy. After seeing how Chris is being put down time and time again, Suzanne tells him to take up Life Feed's offer.

426.title: Episode #1.426
426.plot: Chris is conflicted about accepting the Life Feed offer and hesitant about telling the Tongs about it. However Suzanne reminds him that he needs that job. When Sheila gloats to Jay about her one-upmanship and drops the bombshell, everyone is shocked and disappointed to learn that Chris is working for her. Vanessa stands her ground on not going ahead with Ben's adoption of Grace. Suspecting that Tanya was the one behind Vanessa's change of mind, Ben confronts Tanya.

427.title: Episode #1.427
427.plot: Ben continues to manipulate Vanessa by making her feel that she is incapable and useless without him. But Tanya is able to see through his ploy. Meanwhile, Diana's dislike for Tanya grows and she is not happy to see Li Yan supporting Tanya all the time. Mark is irritated with CPT Goh treating Michael a lot better than him and even insinuates that there is something going on between them.

428.title: Episode #1.428
428.plot: Li Yan tries to talk to Diana, who is still angry with Chris for taking the job at Life Feed. But Diana is upset that Li Yan is on Chris's side once again and refuses to listen to what she has to say. Mark thinks that he will be at the losing end at work if CPT Goh and Michael are together. But Eddie is determined that Mark not spread any rumours about them. Kalila notices that Wafiq looks a little down when he sees Izzy and Khairul together at TCH. She tries to cheer him up.

429.title: Episode #1.429
429.plot: Ben continues to resort to unscrupulous means in his quest to get full custody of Grace. Michael is excused from extra cleaning duty by CPT Goh, and rumours start spreading around the camp about CPT Goh and him. The school holidays are coming and Atiqah remembers how Hassan used to look forward to spending time with Faisal and Fatimah.

430.title: Episode #1.430
430.plot: Tanya is determined to get to the truth. When she confronts Ben about the phone call from Vanessa, Li Yan is caught between them. After the cold treatment from CPT Goh, Michael suspects that Mark lodged the complaint about the preferential treatment and confronts him. Zul and Sulaiman have a misunderstanding with Atiqah, while Khairul continues to pursue Izzy.

431.title: Episode #1.431
431.plot: It is the day of the court hearing on who gets custody of baby Grace, and neither Ben nor Vanessa is willing to back down. Salmah is delighted to see Izzy and Khairul getting along and thinks they will be a good match. However, when she chances upon a tabloid article, it makes her reevaluate her impression of Khairul. Eddie, meantime, is stunned when Michael left for a posting to Brunei without informing him.

432.title: Episode #1.432
432.plot: It is the day of the court hearing on who gets custody of baby Grace, and neither Ben nor Vanessa is willing to back down. Salmah is delighted to see Izzy and Khairul getting along and thinks they will be a good match. However, when she chances upon a tabloid article, it makes her reevaluate her impression of Khairul. Eddie, meantime, is stunned when Michael left for a posting to Brunei without informing him.

433.title: Episode #1.433
433.plot: Xue Ling moots the idea of Melissa sleeping over at the hotel with her since it is the school holidays. However, Adam is not happy with it. Over at the Bhaskars, Meera, Arjun and Lathika are busy packing for their Chiang Mai trip while Shruti is trying to persuade Pam to come along. Faisal bonds with Zul when Zul helps him to rehearse for the role of the Big Bad Wolf in his school play.

434.title: Episode #1.434
434.plot: Eddie is trying to get even with Mark but is caught out by CPT Goh, who gives him a piece of advice on dealing with people like Mark. Norleena is trying to come to terms with leaving Rayyan behind as Sulaiman and her go on a holiday to Chiang Mai. And while in Chiang Mai, Shruti and Pam meets a couple of backpackers and they bond almost immediately.

435.title: Episode #1.435
435.plot: Bhaskar and Meera look forward to their family holiday in Chiang Mai but Shruti and Pam make plans to hang out with their new friends Betye and Anj. Meanwhile, Norleena spends more time worrying how Rayyan is doing back home than enjoying Chiang Mai with Sulaiman and Salmah. And a slip up from Salmah reopens an old wound of Meera's about Bhaskar's past with Li Yan.

436.title: Episode #1.436
436.plot: Back home after the holiday, Norleena is worried that Sulaiman is serious about his plans to adopt a child. Pam thinks it's over between her and Wayne and reluctantly decides to move out of his apartment. Zul helps Faisal rehearse for a play and Salmah is concerned about his developing closeness with the recently widowed Atiqah.

438.title: Episode #1.438
438.plot: Faisal gets into a scuffle with his tormentor Tommy at TCH and Atiqah is furious. Jay and Kwong San decide to set up a booth at a food fair to showcase Tapao Fitness products. Meantime, Felicia and Jared's blossoming romance hits a roadblock when they negotiate a business deal.

439.title: Episode #1.439
439.plot: After that disastrous second date, Felicia is worried about the third date with Jared. Her fear comes true when Vivian invites herself to their dinner. At the 'Made In Singapore' Food Festival, there is a big surprise in store when Jay and Kwong San run into the occupants of the booth next to them. Over at TCH, Atiqah finds out there is a gossip going on about Zul and her.

440.title: Episode #1.440
440.plot: Tanya continues to avoid Li Yan following their disagreement over Vanessa. But Li Yan is desperate to reach out to her. Felicia relishes being able to spend more time with Jared at work, but Xue Ling warns her against getting her personal and professional lives mixed up. Atiqah is concerned about the rumours surrounding Zul and her, while Zul is upset with Salmah for inadvertently making the rumours worse for them.

441.title: Episode #1.441
441.plot: Kwong San and Jay, eager to make up for the embarrassment from the previous day's cooking fiasco, are raring to go on Day Two of the 'Made in Singapore' Food Festival. As Suzanne continues to come to grips with her hormonal changes following her miscarriage, something happens that threatens to throw everything off-balance once again. Meanwhile, Vanessa continues to struggle to get her life back on track, while attempting to manage Grace on her own.

442.title: Episode #1.442
442.plot: Chris and Suzanne's relationship is put to the test after Jay insinuated Chris and Sheila are having an affair. Salmah confronts Khairul about the sabotage of Tapao Fitness and is rocked when Khairul dropped a bombshell. At the Tongs, Ben's critical attitude towards Vanessa worsens, forcing Li Yan to step in as she warns Ben that his fight with Vanessa for Grace might be at the expense of his future with Gina.

443.title: Episode #1.443
443.plot: Gina accidentally leaks the news of a property sale to a group of residents at an old housing estate, incurring the wrath of Peter Tay. Over at TCH, Joy tries her hand at working the till at TCH and excels at it. In his bid to win Grace back, Ben spikes Vanessa's glass of juice with liquor, hoping an intoxicated Vanessa would look like she is breaking custody order.

444.title: Episode #1.444
444.plot: The Tongs are in disbelief after learning that Vanessa drank alcohol despite knowing that it is against custody order. While Gina is starting to hang out with Peter Tay and ignoring Ben's phone calls. And more troubles for Ben when he learns that Vanessa could have died from lithium toxicity as a result of his actions.

445.title: Episode #1.445
445.plot: Vanessa pays a visit to Grace to say goodbye to her at the Tongs when she discharges herself from hospital. At TCH, Ah Biao and Uncle Richard battle for the title of the biggest brain. And while searching for Grace's toy to pacify her, Gina stumbles upon Vanessa's mobile phone in Ben's room.

446.title: Episode #1.446
446.plot: While Ben enjoys time with Grace, Gina and Peter Tay work together to convince Vanessa not to end her life. Thinking that Joy is neglecting her school work, Tanya is against her working at TCH but Joy is defiant. Gina, meantime, continues probing into Vanessa's mobile phone and finds out something she wished she didn't.

447.title: Episode #1.447
447.plot: Gina, who now knows the truth about what happened, struggles to believe the gentle and kind Ben she loved would have done such terrible things to Vanessa. While Vanessa has to stay at the hospital and undergo counselling. It is going to take a while for her to get better. In camp, Eddie is not happy when Encik Rohan punished him for taking an extra-long lunch. He suspects Mark is the one who ratted on him after he ignored Mark earlier in the day.

448.title: Episode #1.448
448.plot: Eddie, still smarting over Mark making the report against Michael and CPT Goh, tries to get Mark into trouble by pulling a stunt on Encik Rohan. But it backfires and Rizman bears the brunt of it. Over at the Rahmans, Norleena is upset with Sulaiman for discussing the issue of adoption with strangers in an online chat rather than with her. While Li Yan is surprised when Gina starts acting cold towards her.

449.title: Episode #1.449
449.plot: Ben is not keen to attend a group therapy session with Vanessa's parents but out of guilt, he obliged. The issue of adoption continues in the Rahmans household and this time, Sulaiman is upset with Salmah for shutting down the discussion. Peter Tay invites Xue Ling for dinner and is surprised how everything turned out fine.

450.title: Episode #1.450
450.plot: Ben attends the therapy session with Vanessa and learns about an incident that happened when Vanessa was young. However, both Mr and Mrs Kwok refuse to admit to anything. Sulaiman ropes in Mak Leha and Pak Kassim to convince Salmah about adopting. But their plan backfires badly. In camp, the NS boys make fun of Rizman and his fear of ghosts after a warning from Encik Rohan.

451.title: Episode #1.451
451.plot: Pam tries to help Shruti as she struggles to prepare for her examinations. Meanwhile, the tension between Sulaiman and Norleena increases. Both want to expand the family, but they cannot agree on how to go about it. Ben is overwhelmed with guilt when he learns the root cause of Vanessa's illness.

452.title: Episode #1.452
452.plot: Ben and Li Yan decide to reveal the truth about everything Ben did to Vanessa, but will he be able to go through with his confession? Murugan tries his hand at mediating when he learns from Lathika that Wati and Fitri have fallen out. As Shruti continues to spend more and more time with Firdaus, Eddie starts to wonder if Firdaus might be starting to develop feelings for Shruti.

453.title: Episode #1.453
453.plot: Atiqah mulls over her sister's advice to move to KL so that she can receive more support from her extended family. Shruti organises a pre-exam party for her friends to chill out before the exams begin, but she continues to worry about whether Firdaus indeed has feelings for her. Ben continues to deal with the aftermath of coming clean with Vanessa, and has no choice but to accept the fact that he will be separated from Grace.

454.title: Episode #1.454
454.plot: Zul is concerned about the possibility of Atiqah moving to KL and he is hoping that Salmah will persuade her to stay. Meanwhile, Amir overhears a conversation about Diana having feelings for Arjun and unwittingly starts a chain of rumours when he relays what he heard to Joy. When Felicia denies about dating Jared, Chris and Suzanne devise a plan to help Jared make their relationship official.

455.title: Episode #1.455
455.plot: In an effort to make Atiqah stay, Zul gets the whole Rahman family to go to Faisal's school play. Jared is a little bummed out because of his unsuccessful job hunt. To cheer him up, Felicia brings him to the gym but a near altercation there reveals a side of Jared that Felicia has never seen before. Meantime, Kwong San warns Jay to not divulge any of their business discussion to Diana because of Chris's link to Life Feed, and this results in an argument between Diana and Jay.

456.title: Episode #1.456
456.plot: Arjun has Diana for company during his chemotherapy but her constant complaints about Jay upsets him and he tells her to leave. Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira mock Joy for getting caught up in an online game, not expecting that they will get sucked into it as well. While in camp, Encik Rohan wants the boys to score Gold in the upcoming IPPT and puts them through a tough training programme.

457.title: Episode #1.457
457.plot: A frustrated Diana wants to know who told Arjun she still has feelings for him, not realizing that Jay will eventually get dragged into it. At TCH, Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira have a spat whilst playing the online Easter Egg game. Mark, meanwhile, tries to tempt Eddie, Rizman and Julius into taking part in a gruelling Ninja Challenge obstacle course competition that offers an attractive grand prize.

458.title: Episode #1.458
458.plot: Norleena and Sulaiman come to a compromise to consult Bhaskar on IVF and PGD testing. While at TCH, an opportunity arises for Norleena and she scores a part time job there. Over at the Lims, the rift between Diana and Jay deepens. Worried that Jay might leave Singapore if he breaks up with Diana, Bee Li hatches a plan to help them reconcile. Shruti discovers that Pam is learning driving and wants to learn too, but faces objections from her parents.

459.title: Episode #1.459
459.plot: Tension mounts between Norleena and Sulaiman after a consultation with Bhaskar over the PGD testing ends on a sour note. At TCH, Bee Li's plan to reconcile Jay and Diana backfires, leaving Diana devastated. Shruti, meanwhile, is not comfortable to see the intimacy between Pam and Wayne. Xue Ling and Peter Tay go into a business partnership much to Kwong San's wrath. More woes for Xue Ling when Adam confronts her about Peter Tay's presence at her hotel room on that particular night.

460.title: Episode #1.460
460.plot: Bee Li, still worried that Jay will leave home if he breaks up with Diana, makes one more attempt to get the couple to patch up their differences. Over at the Rahmans, Salmah had to play mediator when Norleena and Sulaiman couldn't agree on the PGD testing and the IVF process. While Pam's world comes crashing down when she runs into Wayne's wife.

461.title: Episode #1.461
461.plot: Pam is still reeling after breaking up with Wayne but little does she know that Shruti is indirectly behind Wayne's decision to dump her. Sheila, meantime, makes yet another attempt to discredit Jay. At TCH, Salmah is pleasantly surprised to see Amir bonding with Joy through school work.

462.title: Episode #1.462
462.plot: Bee Li decides to send some snacks over to Michael in Brunei for his upcoming birthday. However, she feels threatened when Wati seems to be more aware of what Michael likes than she does. With the competition for Everyday Wellness's business heating up, a desperate Chris decides to spy on Jay's laptop for more information on Tapao Fitness's marketing strategy. Bhaskar finds out about Joy's upcoming birthday and manages to convince Joy to let him throw her a birthday party.

463.title: Episode #1.463
463.plot: Seeing that Jay's meeting with Everyday Wellness has gone seemingly well, Chris realizes he has been tricked by Jay. As the Bhaskars prep for Joy's birthday, Shruti suggests that they invite the Tongs. However, Bhaskar and Meera are not keen on that idea. Joy has her eye on a tablet for a birthday gift but when Tanya doesn't want to buy it for her, she tries to find a way to get it.

464.title: Episode #1.464
464.plot: It is Joy's birthday and she is late for the elaborate party that Bhaskar planned for her while Meera blames Li Yan for it. Chris is still sore over what Jay did to him and he feels even more betrayed when he thinks that Diana is on Jay's side. Felicia thinks Jared is too possessive but Vivian convinces her it is a good thing.

465.title: Episode #1.465
465.plot: Meera finds it increasingly difficult to accept Tanya as part of her family. Vivian offers her advice on how to deal with step-children. Joy is still upset about her disastrous birthday party as Amir tries his best to cheer her up. Meanwhile, Eddie and the army boys day-dream and talk of winning the Ninja Challenge and the prize money that comes with it.

466.title: Episode #1.466
466.plot: Kwong San realises that Adam isn't about to come clean about his plans to move out, and tries to devise a way to persuade Adam to continue living with them. Bhaskar feels caught in between Arjun and Tanya as his family continues to try to get used to the idea that they have a new sibling in Tanya. Eddie and his army buddies start their training regime for the upcoming Ninja Challenge, but Eddie finds it difficult to motivate his lazy teammates.

467.title: Episode #1.467
467.plot: It is Arjun's first day at work in Bhaskar's clinic, and he is eager to show how he can shake things up to bring in more business, much to Bhaskar's chagrin. Meanwhile, Kwong San continues to engage Adam, resulting in Adam getting increasingly suspicious of him. Li Yan is concerned when she learns that Joy and Amir have been spending a lot of time with each other.

468.title: Episode 468
468.plot: Li Yan sees Joy sporting a new bracelet and wonders if it is a gift from Amir. Bhaskar gets a shock when Arjun goes behind his back to buy a self-service check-in machine for the clinic. Sulaiman and Norleena are excited about their pre-adoption briefing but look set to miss it when Salmah is caught up with an emergency at the clinic.

469.title: Episode #1.469
469.plot: When Tanya learns that Joy lied about her spoken word event, she suspects her daughter is with Amir. Bhaskar has had enough of the check-in machine and sets Arjun an ultimatum, while Salmah is offered a mid-career boost by Arjun and Bhaskar. Meantime, Xue Ling and Adam learn that they've been manipulated by Peter Tay once again.

470.title: Episode #1.470
470.plot: Tanya is determined to put a stop to Joy meeting her father Jamie and she is incensed when Li Yan tries to intervene. Wafiq tries to encourage Salmah to go for skill upgrading by introducing a gym member to talk her into going back to school. Meanwhile, Gina accompanies Peter Tay to a business gala event and is more convinced than ever that something is going on between Peter Tay and Xue Ling.

471.title: Episode #1.471
471.plot: Norleena suspects that Salmah is dating and she decides to spy on her. Melissa is worried when she gets back her 'less-than-desirable' mid-year exams results. Jay, meantime, finds out about Xue Ling's plans to lead Peter Tay on and warns her of the consequences.

472.title: Episode #1.472
472.plot: When Salmah is reminded of Sulaiman and Norleena's continued dependence on her for babysitting duties, she finds herself further motivated to explore her options for retraining. Having missed each other over the crunch of the exam period, Pam and Shruti enjoy catching up with each other as Firdaus feels daunted by the prospect of looking for a job. Gina decides to offer Peter Tay some much-needed advice when she realises that he's distracted at work by thoughts of Xue Ling.

473.title: Episode #1.473
473.plot: Dr Safinah notices that Vanessa isn't enthusiastic about her group therapy sessions, and encourages Vanessa to find a way to confront her emotions head-on. Peter Tay is discouraged that Xue Ling still hasn't returned any of his calls, as Gina tries to reassure him that he just needs to be patient. Pam meets up with Shruti and Firdaus to celebrate their newfound freedom now that the academic year is over. But as they discuss their plans, none of them are aware that someone is watching them.

474.title: Episode #1.474
474.plot: Things seem to look up between Ben and Vanessa as he brings Grace to visit Vanessa. However, Ben is dejected to learn that he has lost Vanessa's trust. At the Lims, Melissa is excited as she and Wati plan a Mother's Day surprise for Xue Ling. But Xue Ling's last minute business trip leaves Melissa very disappointed. Pam meanwhile, is shocked to learn that Celine thinks Shruti is The Other Woman.

475.title: Episode #1.475
475.plot: With Rayyan and Grace's birthday coming up, Sulaiman and Ben team up to do something special. Tension is high during an internal meeting between Kwong San, Suzanne and Felicia. Suzanne is conflicted when Kwong San shares his thoughts about promoting her instead of Felicia. Things take an ugly turn between Pam and Celine. Pam then decides to do the right thing and ends it with Wayne.

476.title: Episode #1.476
476.plot: A misunderstanding occurs when Suzanne assumes that Felicia had passed off work she had done as her own to Xue Ling to get credit. Hence with the job promotion up for grabs, both Suzanne and Felicia are determined to go for it. After being mocked by Salmah and Norleena over his party planning ability, Sulaiman is determined to prove them wrong. Meanwhile, Ali drops by the gym and after seeing Adam train, he is convinced that Adam is ready to compete. Melissa overhears and get worried.

477.title: Episode #1.477
477.plot: After their tiff yesterday, Suzanne and Felicia seemingly make up and get on with work. However, when Felicia messes up an order, Kwong San had enough and decides to promote Suzanne instead. Adam is thrilled after being given the go ahead by Ali to compete in an upcoming MMA competition. But Melissa is not comfortable with the whole idea. Ben and Sulaiman proceed with their plan for that birthday party surprise - the photo shoot with Grace and Rayyan. But they quickly rue their decision when they find out the shoot is not as easy as they thought.

478.title: Episode #1.478
478.plot: It is Rayyan and Grace's first birthday party as Sulaiman contemplates showcasing the disastrous baby photos that Ben and him took. Tension mounts between Felicia and Suzanne as Felicia gets increasingly resentful of Suzanne's promotion. Through Jared's encouragement, Felicia decides to talk to Xue Ling to overturn Suzanne's promotion. Li Yan gets upset when Tanya continues avoiding the Tongs while Melissa hides her report card from her parents and forges Adam's signature.

479.title: Episode #1.479
479.plot: As the rift between Felicia and Suzanne deepens, Chris toys with the idea of moving back home if the situation doesn't improve. Adam is disappointed to find out that Melissa has been lying about her report card and informs Xue Ling. Over at the Rahmans, Norleena and Sulaiman get busy preparing the house and the paperwork for the Child Welfare Officer's visit. Upon Jared's urging, Felicia meets up with Xue Ling to convince her that Suzanne is underserving of the promotion. However, Xue Ling delivers some harsh truth to Felicia.

480.title: Episode #1.480
480.plot: Norleena and Sulaiman are less than enthusiastic about their chances for adoption after the meeting with the Child Welfare Officer didn't go well. Li Yan is uneasy as she continues to act as the go-between for Joy and her father. While at the Tongs, planning for Li Yan's surprise birthday party gets underway.

481.title: Episode #1.481
481.plot: The excited but nervous Li Yan goes for her first outing with Tanya and Joy. And while Li Yan is out, the Tongs get together for a secret meeting to discuss and plan her birthday party. Peter Tay is crushed when he finds out that Xue Ling had attended that meeting. At the Rahmans, Sulaiman is left disappointed again by the second Child Welfare Officer.

482.title: Episode #1.482
482.plot: Norleena thinks she messed up when she reveals how unfairly she was treated as a child during the interview with the Child Welfare Officer. Whilst cleaning Tanya's house, Diana sees Jamie's photograph and Joy begins to open up about her parents' tumultuous relationship. Meanwhile just before the Charity Ball, Peter Tay surprises Xue Ling with an unexpected gift.

483.title: Episode #1.483
483.plot: It is Arjun's final chemo session. Everyone is happy for him but Arjun is uncertain whether his treatment worked and if he is really out of the woods. Norleena is feeling troubled after hearing about Tanya's past and shares it with Salmah, hoping that she can relay it to Li Yan. However, Salmah doesn't want to get involved. Tanya finds out about Li Yan's surprise birthday party by accident and she wonders why Diana had not told her despite spending the whole day together.

484.title: Episode #1.484
484.plot: As Adam and Amir prepare for their respective MMA fights, Adam is troubled to learn that one of Ali's investors is none other than Peter Tay. Over at the Rahmans, Norleena and Salmah debate about whether to tell Li Yan what they found out about Tanya's difficult childhood. Diana, meantime, gets annoyed when Tanya starts to get more involved in the planning for Li Yan's surprise birthday party.

485.title: Episode #1.485
485.plot: It is the day of Adam's MMA competition. Will he be able to steel his nerves and focus on winning the match, or will his anger at Peter Tay get the better of him? Arjun finishes up his chemotherapy and gets his central line removed as the rest of the family prepare to surprise him at home with his favourite foods. And for Li Yan's sake, Diana decides to continue helping Tanya clean up her house, not anticipating a misunderstanding that is about to surface.

486.title: Episode #1.486
486.plot: Diana is angry with Tanya for accusing her of leaving a puddle on the floor that caused Joy to slip and fall. She is even more hurt when she thinks that Li Yan is on Tanya's side. At the Bhaskars, Arjun is raring to get back to work. He can hardly wait to get his life back on track again. Meanwhile, Wafiq and Adam continue to have differences about how to run the gym.

487.title: Episode #1.487
487.plot: Trouble between Diana and Tanya continues to escalate and Li Yan is caught between them. The disagreement over the running of the gym drags on as Peter Tay pays a visit and makes Wafiq an offer that is hard to refuse. A miscommunication between Jay and Kwong San over a dinner arrangement leads the Lims to worry and think that Kwong San's hearing and memory are failing him.

488.title: Episode #1.488
488.plot: There are plenty of new sign-ups at Adam's gym thanks to his title-winning fight but things turn sour when his knee injury worsens. Jared encourages Felicia to look for a new job even though she wishes she was back at Xue Organics. At the Lims, Jay and Bee Li worry that Kwong San's apparent forgetfulness is getting worse when he messes up a box delivery order.

489.title: Episode #1.489
489.plot: Adam suffers a big blow when accusations that he fixed the MMA championship fight go public. Felicia is heartened when she thinks Xue Ling wants her back at Xue Organics. However, she gets a surprise when she turns up at the office. An upset Li Yan, meanwhile, leaves Chris with no choice but to approach Jay for help to get Diana to move back home.

490.title: Episode #1.490
490.plot: Diana finally makes peace with Li Yan but decides to continue staying with Gina and Felicia. Meantime, Felicia takes up Diana's offer to work for her a cleaner but Jared is not happy with the arrangement. Acting on a suspicion that Peter Tay might be involved in the match rigging, Xue Ling tries to suss him out but her plan backfires.

491.title: Episode #1.491
491.plot: Bee Li, suspecting that Kwong San has dementia, puts him on a test by making him play computer games. However, Kwong San is livid when he finds out what she is up to. Sensing that Xue Ling is troubled, Adam tries to get her to open up but to no avail. Meanwhile, Gina is losing her patience with Peter Tay when she feels that he is not focused on work because his mind is on Xue Ling.

492.title: Episode #1.492
492.plot: As the argument over Kwong San's perceived dementia drags on, Kwong San agrees to an online test just to get Bee Li off his back. But he fails the test. Jared seeks help from Suzanne when he realizes that he indirectly caused Felicia to lose her job at Xue Organics. Arjun is excited about getting back to work again before starting his residency. But things are not that great on his first day at work.

493.title: Episode #1.493
493.plot: After much thought, Xue Ling decides to stop all forms of contact with her family and leave Singapore with Peter Tay in exchange for him dropping the lawsuit against Adam. Tanya feels guilty when she learns that there was a tiff between Diana and Li Yan that resulted in Diana moving out of the house. Meanwhile, good news for Felicia when she gets her job back at Xue Organics. Xue Ling, however, hints that there will be major changes to come for the company.

494.title: Episode #1.494
494.plot: Arjun is in a low mood following a mistake he made the previous day and isn't keen on going to work. But Meera isn't having him moping around. The gym hasn't been doing well financially since Adam's fight, and Wafiq is once again confronted by the Peter Tay's offer of fresh funds to keep the business running. Meanwhile, Kwong San is delighted to be nominated by the business community for the prestigious Lifetime Achievement Award.

495.title: Episode #1.495
495.plot: After clashing with Tanya over Imran's case, Meera realises that she owes Tanya an apology, and Bhaskar decides to invite Tanya and Joy over for dinner to clear the air. Xue Ling informs Suzanne and Felicia about her plans to take a long leave of absence and cites business development opportunities as the reason, but Jay doesn't take the news well. After speaking with Dr Safinah, Ben starts to look into Vanessa's living arrangement in preparation for her discharge.

496.title: Episode #1.496
496.plot: After learning what Vanessa's grandfather did to her, Ben encourages Vanessa to file a police report about the abuse. At the clinic, Bhaskar advises Salmah to consider upgrading her skills in the medical field. The planning for Li Yan's surprise birthday party falls on Eddie. He gets into an argument with Tanya when he excludes Bhaskar and Meera from the invite.

497.title: Episode #1.497
497.plot: Sulaiman accompanies Salmah to the University open house to find out more information about furthering her studies. Vanessa tries to contact a cousin who may have witnessed her grandfather's abuse. Gina, meantime, is resigned when Peter reveals to her that he is going away with Xue Ling for six months.

498.title: Episode #1.498
498.plot: Vanessa plucks up the courage to meet with her cousin Renee. When she brings up their past, what Renee reveals to her is completely unexpected. Diana is one step closer to fulfilling her dream of travelling around the world. But Jay is worried that the experience will change her. The stress of planning Li Yan's surprise birthday party is wearing Eddie out. Will he be able to keep the secret for one more day?

499.title: Episode #1.499
499.plot: It is Li Yan's birthday and Eddie cannot wait to get the surprise party going. It looks like all his effort will go to waste when Li Yan reveals that she is not feeling well. Vanessa takes the plunge and decides to talk to the police. Will she be able to face the consequences of revealing the past? Joy is delighted when Amir manages to find the lost scrapbook that she had prepared for Li Yan for her birthday.

500.title: Episode #1.500
500.plot: It is Li Yan's 50th birthday and TCH is filled with her friends and loved ones celebrating her special day. Relieved that the party is a success, Eddie celebrates with a drink. He has one too many and when he finds himself alone with Shruti, the most unexpected thing happens. Jay's plans to propose to Diana fall through when he realises he has lost the ring.

501.title: Episode #1.501
501.plot: After getting Amir to babysit Rayyan, Sulaiman gets upset when he couldn't contact Amir after that boy has forgotten to bring his phone. Shruti is still reeling from the kiss with Eddie and she avoids him at all cost. While Pam starts to recruit team members after taking up the Ninja Race challenge from Julius and the boys.

502.title: Episode #1.502
502.plot: Salmah decides to get Amir to help around the house so as to justify Amir's stay with Sulaiman and Norleena. But it is trickier than she thought. At TCH, Zul is disappointed when Atiqah hints to him that they could be just friends. Shruti decides to confront Eddie about the kiss but Eddie's response is not exactly what she expected.

503.title: Episode #1.503
503.plot: Kwong San finally confesses to Bee Li that he did not see Bhaskar about his dementia because of his fear about finding out the hard truth. Amir thinks that he is unwanted at the Rahmans' house and gets an earful from Salmah for harbouring that thought. Meanwhile, Eddie engages Adam to train and prepare his team for the Ninja Race.

504.title: Episode #1.504
504.plot: It is the day of the Ninja Race and both the girls and the boys try their best to beat each other. Mandy makes fun of Amir when he invites Joy to the prom, embarrassing Amir and causing him to shy away from the topic, much to Joy's disappointment. Suzanne thinks that Gina likes Peter Tay and she starts grilling her about it. However, Gina vehemently denies.

505.title: Episode #1.505
505.plot: It's Hari Raya and together with Khairul, the Rahmans are busy celebrating at their place. Things continue to get awkward between Shruti and Eddie since their last kiss at Li Yan's birthday party. Meanwhile, Tanya is shocked to learn that Jamie is thinking of relocating to Singapore.

506.title: Episode #1.506
506.plot: It is the start of the second half of the school year and Melissa worries for her PSLE after her bad mid-year exams results. Ah Biao finds it inconvenient living with the Tongs and Mrs Pereira suggests for him to move to her place The Lims are excited to be at the business awards ceremony where Kwong San will receive the Lifetime Achievement Award. However, things take a bizarre turn when a tipsy Kwong San makes a fool of himself on stage.

507.title: Episode #1.507
