507.plot: Melissa stresses over her poor mid-year exam results, and Bee Li is convinced that she needs to load up on tuition and enrichment classes. But Adam thinks that she can manage her studies on her own. Jay, meantime, continues to be suspicious of Khairul's motives in sabotaging Kwong San at the awards night. Ah Biao gets settled into Mrs Pereira's flat, and the two enjoy having each other for company.

508.title: Episode #1.508
508.plot: Mrs Pereira's snoring is the least of Ah Biao's worries when he starts to discover that even the smallest differences in living habits can cause conflict in the home. Izzy is excited to learn that Jay is looking for a freelance web developer for the Tapao Fitness website. Over at the Lims, Bee Li continues to fuss over Melissa, hoping to boost Melissa's PSLE chances in any way she can.

509.title: Episode #1.509
509.plot: Gina thinks she is falling for Jamie after spending time together viewing apartments. However, she is hesitant to go further as she doesn't want another complicated relationship after going through one with Ben. More frustration for Ah Biao while staying at Mrs Pereira's when he oversleeps and nearly missed a passenger taxi booking because of her snoring. Meanwhile at the hospital, Chris finds out that Arjun is no longer doing surgery for his residency.

510.title: Episode #1.510
510.plot: Joy is upset when she hears from Ben that Jamie is dating Gina. Tanya, on the other hand, is not pleased that Ben is talking about these things to Joy and confronts him about it. It is Arjun's first day at residency and he wastes no time trying to get into the good books of Dr Raja. Bee Li tries to convince her TLC members that there is nothing wrong with Kwong San's memory but they are not convinced.

511.title: Episode #1.511
511.plot: Arjun thinks he has made a major breakthrough with one of his patients only to get a dressing down from Dr Raja. Vanessa is made to feel guilty by her parents after her grandfather is arrested by the police. As part of her quest for skill upgrading, an excited Salmah shadows Bhaskar at the clinic and realizes she still has lots to learn.

512.title: Episode #1.512
512.plot: Arjun gets a surprise visit by Meera at the hospital and discovers there is some bad blood between Dr Raja and his parents. To Vanessa's dismay, the police have dropped her case and let her grandfather go free. Suzanne, meanwhile, thinks she has made progress with the Xue Organics website only to get a stern reprimand from Xue Ling.

513.title: Episode #1.513
513.plot: After learning about his parents' feud with Dr Raja, Arjun tries to get them to stay away from the hospital but his plan backfires. Shruti enlists the help of Eddie and the boys after she successfully pitched a marketing video concept to Xue Organics. At TCH, Li Yan manages to talk Salmah out of quitting the nursing course.

514.title: Episode #1.514
514.plot: Chris and Suzanne prepare to go for a business networking event and Diana is surprised that Jay is not invited to the event. Shruti vows to be financially independent after Eddie and the rest make fun of her 'rich daddy's girl' status. Arjun continues to hide from his parents, the fact that he is not in the surgery team.

515.title: Episode #1.515
515.plot: The friendship between Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira is further tested as they continue to be housemates. Kwong San is even more troubled by the dementia rumours when an old business acquaintance starts to distance himself from him. Meanwhile, Bhaskar finds out more about Tanya and Joy's past financial struggles.

516.title: Episode #1.516
516.plot: Salmah is stumped when she is asked all the unexpected questions during the interview for the nursing course. Bhaskar decides to include Tanya and Joy in his will but he struggles to find a way to tell Meera about this change. Over at the Lims, Kwong San is starting to lose confidence as he feels his business acumen slipping away.

517.title: Episode #1.517
517.plot: After much cajoling, Kwong San finally agrees to do the PR interview that will help him regain his reputation after messing up at the business awards dinner. Joy plans a surprised promposal at TCH for Amir but she is left humiliated when Amir freaks out and leaves. Feeling disappointed with her first interview, Salmah decides to ask her interviewer for a second chance.

518.title: Episode #1.518
518.plot: Suspecting that Khairul has something against his family, Jay is unhappy when he sees Khairul being so friendly with Diana. Over at the Tongs, Vanessa tries to make up for missing Grace's first birthday celebration. And at TCH, the overly enthusiastic Salmah tries to get Zul to get his ulcer treated while Mandy thinks that Joy likes Amir.

519.title: Episode #1.519
519.plot: Vanessa is adjusting well to life with the Tongs, but continues to be anxious over the outcome of the police investigation into her grandfather's case. Dr Raja has Arjun and Zara paired up for the day, and the two struggle to work together due to conflicting working styles. Amir and Joy bump into each other at TCH, and while both are initially awkward, Amir eventually takes the initiative to get their friendship back on track.

520.title: Episode #1.520
520.plot: Adam gets tipsy during a drinking session with his siblings and starts to blame Li Yan for his plight. Things gets awkward when Li Yan overhears everything. At the hospital, Arjun and Zara continue to butt heads over trivial matters. Vanessa, meanwhile, isn't taking the news well that the abuse case against her grandfather has been dropped. Things get worse when the police apprehend Ah Biao after he admits to vandalising her grandfather's flat to get even.

521.title: Episode #1.521
521.plot: Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira get into an argument after she learns about him vandalizing Vanessa's grandfather's flat. Meera strong-arms Tanya into finding out more about Arjun's love life and it escalates into a full-scale feud. Meantime, Li Yan is worried when she finds out that Melissa is using a homework app that provides answers readily.

522.title: Episode #1.522
522.plot: Arjun discovers a softer side to Dr Raja and it compels him to reveal to his family the truth about his paediatrics residency. A concerned Li Yan speaks to Adam about Melissa's use of the homework app but ends up offending him. Over at TCH, Joy is pleased to spend more time with Amir as they work on their assignments together. However, Amirs dyslexia gets in the way.

523.title: Episode #1.523
523.plot: Meera is still reeling from the revelation that Arjun is not doing surgery for his residency as Bhaskar wonders why Arjun couldn't come clean with them from the beginning. Ah Biao is not comfortable when the Tongs fusses over his police case. Amir, meanwhile, gets offended when Joy tries to correct errors in his school assignment.

524.title: Episode #1.524
524.plot: There is a gossip going around the Pediatric Department that Raja is giving preferential treatment to Arjun, much to Raja's annoyance. Bhaskar finally reveals to Tanya that he has added Joy and her into his will. At the gym, Wafiq goes into negotiation with a potential shareholder who is actually Peter Tay's business associate.

525.title: Episode #1.525
525.plot: Shruti's decision to apply for a part-time job is met by scepticism from everyone she knows. Meantime, Ben hopes to rekindle his romance with Gina by getting Suzanne to put a good word for him. Tanya's continued refusal to be part of Bhaskar's heritance leads to a showdown with Meera.

526.title: Episode #1.526
526.plot: Vanessa's mother shows up at TCH and stuns Vanessa with an unexpected confession. Meera is still angry with Bhaskar for leaving her out of the decision-making process regarding his will. Shruti fudges her CV and has to put up with some embarrassing moments during her job interview.

527.title: Episode #1.527
527.plot: After getting worked up when Vivian flirted openly with Jamie, Suzanne tries to make amends with Vivian. Eddie, worried that Ah Biao might get cheated, confronts Ah Biao to find out more about the gold necklace and the young woman he was with at the park. Meanwhile, Ben is stunned when Vanessa brings up the issue of divorce, and Bhaskar is enraged to know that Meera is trying to close their joint account and withdraw the funds.

528.title: Episode #1.528
528.plot: The saga over the will and joint-account continues at the Bhaskars and Lathika is caught in the middle. More trouble when Arjun refuses to hear Tanya's explanation over the will. Vivian finds out from Adam about Chris's womanizing days during his university time in Australia, and uses the information against Chris. Izzy is not comfortable when Khairul offers to sponsor her overseas attachment, while Li Yan gets an unexpected overseas call.

529.title: Episode #1.529
529.plot: Shruti misses Bhaskar after Bhaskar left home following a big fight with Meera. She gets Tanya to convince Bhaskar to come back. Li Yan is shaken and upset after the phone call from her mother. More family issues in store for Li Yan when Li Ting unexpectedly drops by for a visit. Salmah, meantime, is concerned about Amir's dyslexia and finds ways to encourage him.

530.title: Episode #1.530
530.plot: Peter Tay is back in town and ready to stir up more trouble for the Lims. At the Rahmans, Salmah tries to put up with Li Ting but she eventually blows her top. Amir and Joy reconcile but trouble lies ahead as Mandy develops a crush on him too after he stands up for her against a bully.

531.title: Episode #1.531
531.plot: The Lims wonder why Xue Ling hasn't returned to Singapore with Peter Tay, who is back in town alone to attend to some business matters. Norleena reveals to Vanessa that Sulaiman and her are nervous about the results of the Home Study Report from the adoption agency. And despite Meera having forbid her to meet with Bhaskar, Shruti decides to try to convince her father to move back home and work things out.

532.title: Episode #1.532
532.plot: When Sulaiman learns about a Malay tradition called 'turun tanah' where a child chooses an object that will be linked to his or her future occupation, Norleena worries that this will become Sulaiman's new obsession. Ben continues to try his luck with Gina to convince her that he is a changed man, while the rest of the Tongs rally around Li Yan and give her some much-needed support as she prepares to fly to Hong Kong to spend time with her aged parents.

533.title: Episode #1.533
533.plot: Tension between Norleena and Sulaiman rises over the adoption process. However, a meeting with the agent changed their perspectives and leads them to put aside their differences. Mrs Pereira's suspicion grows as she senses Ah Biao's avoidance of her. Eddie is put in a spot, having to cover for Ah Biao. Meanwhile, Vanessa gets a job interview but her joy turns to anxiety as self-doubt takes over.

534.title: Episode #1.534
534.plot: As the job interview draws closer, Vanessa's fears and paranoia intensify, prompting her to turn to medication. Ah Biao continues to avoid Mrs Pereira, and thinking that Ah Biao is having an affair, Mrs Pereira decides to break off with him. While at the Bhaskars, the cold war between Meera and Bhaskar wages on, leaving Lathika helpless.

535.title: Episode #1.535
535.plot: Eddie and Shruti plan a date night for Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira, hoping it will get them back together again. Zul is troubled to learn that Vanessa has not told her new employers of her medical history. Over at the Lims, Bee Li is concerned when she sees Adam adding on to Melissa's already overloaded exam preparations.

536.title: Episode #1.536
536.plot: A desperate Vanessa gets a panic attack at work and resorts to taking more medication that she should. Eddie, Julius and Rizman are excited about their overseas posting and Mark is determined to put a spanner in their works. Bee Li is relieved to get some PSLE coaching advice but it is going to spell bad news for Melissa.

537.title: Episode #1.537
537.plot: It is Tanya and Joy's very first National Day and they are in the mood to celebrate. Vanessa, however, gets fired from her job and she is determined to find out the truth behind her unfair dismissal. Meanwhile, news of Khairul's impending wedding leads Bee Li to start planning a grander one for Diana and Jay.

538.title: Episode #1.538
538.plot: Khairul evokes memories of Diana's biological mother and have the emotional Diana eating out of his hand. At the Rahmans, Sulaiman is all ready to meet the baby they might be adopting but Norleena doesn't share his excitement. At TCH, Mark runs into his estranged sister while Bee Li continues pressing Diana over the wedding preparation.

539.title: Episode #1.539
539.plot: Sulaiman is upset and disappointed when he finds out that Norleena isn't too keen on Alya and has doubts about adopting on the whole. Ah Biao finally reveals his past to Mrs Pereira but she has trouble accepting it over the fact that he has not been open with her. Vivian convinces Meera to stay distant from Bhaskar and not acknowledge their wedding anniversary, a move which angers Arjun.

540.title: Episode #1.540
540.plot: Irritated with Vivian's meddling in his parents' lives, Arjun seeks Chris's help to put an end to it. Diana's van breaks down just as she is about to go for a job. Khairul comes to the rescue by offering his company's delivery van and driver for free and Jay is not happy about it. Eddie asks Atiqah if she can talk to Mrs Pereira to change her mind about Ah Biao but Atiqah reveals that Mrs Pereira thinks Ah Biao is the one who wanted out of the relationship.

541.title: Episode #1.541
541.plot: Irritated with Vivian's meddling in his parents' lives, Arjun seeks Chris's help to put an end to it. Diana's van breaks down just as she is about to go for a job. Khairul comes to the rescue by offering his company's delivery van and driver for free and Jay is not happy about it. Eddie asks Atiqah if she can talk to Mrs Pereira to change her mind about Ah Biao but Atiqah reveals that Mrs Pereira thinks Ah Biao is the one who wanted out of the relationship.

542.title: Episode #1.542
542.plot: Chris and Suzanne get started on their plan to help fix Vivian up with a date, and Arjun manages to find a potential suitor at the hospital. Joy's persistent cough hasn't gone away, and a worried Tanya forces Joy to see Bhaskar so he can help to prescribe some medication. Bee Li, meanwhile, continues to badger Jay about setting a wedding date and venue.

543.title: Episode #1.543
543.plot: Vivian arranges for a date with Warren Liu, much to the surprise, and relief, of Suzanne. While at the hospital, Bhaskar is not happy to learn that Raja is the doctor on Joy's case. He insists on a change, making things awkward for Tanya and Arjun. Melissa is stressed over her oral exams and Kalila gets worried when Melissa starts rejecting food again.

544.title: Episode 544
544.plot: All is not well with Joy as she is rushed into an operation. The frustrated Tanya doesn't want Jamie to know about Joy's condition but Shruti takes the initiative and informs him, much to Tanya's chagrin. And while checking up on Joy's medical history, Raja stumbles upon a critical detail in Joy's file. Lathika, meantime, finds out that Murugan hasn't been paid for three months.

545.title: Episode #1.545
545.plot: Chris, who has been feeling stressed at work due to less-than-impressive sales, reaches breaking point when he finds out that even Arjun caters from rival Tapao Fitness. Joy is heartbroken when she learns that Amir and Mandy are going for a concert without her. Meanwhile at the Bhaskars, Meera is determined to stand her ground and not let Bhaskar back until he changes his mind about the will.

546.title: Episode 546
546.plot: A concerned Lathika informs Bhaskar that Meera is ill. When Bhaskar comes home to look after her, it gives them a chance to settle their differences calmly. In his efforts to increase sales for Life Feed, Chris decides to learn how to cook from Zul. After hearing from Fitri that Melissa only had water for lunch, Wati suspects Melissa might be having a relapse.

547.title: Episode 547
547.plot: When Chris hits upon a brilliant marketing strategy, Suzanne hopes his idea won't cause more strife in the family. After deciding to stay on with the Bhaskars, Lathika takes the painful step to break up with Murugan. Meera makes a complete u-turn when it comes to Tanya and Joy. From viewing them as rivals for Bhaskar's affections, she now does everything she can to help them out.

548.title: Episode #1.548
548.plot: Despite the warm invitation from Meera, Tanya still has reservations about moving in with the Bhaskars. Melissa, under stress from her family over her eating habits, runs away from home. Jay, meanwhile, is worried a demoralised Kwong San seems to be retreating from his work responsibilities.

549.title: Episode #1.549
549.plot: Jay and Kwong San are dismayed to learn that Peter Tay has ruined the quality of the famous KS Foods rempah. The excited Bhaskar gets on his family's nerves as he prepares for Tanya and Joy to move in. At the Lims, Adam's hands-off approach to tackling Melissa's anorexia suffers a setback.

550.title: Episode #1.550
550.plot: Joy is being discharged today and Raja is surprised to learn that Meera extended an invite to Tanya to stay with her. At TCH, Chris and Khairul try to persuade Zul to work with Life Feed and be the face of the company. Jay moots the idea to restart KS Foods with Kwong San, but Kwong San is hesitant about the proposal.

551.title: Episode #1.551
551.plot: Jay, with help from Diana, comes up with a brilliant plan on how to introduce KS Foods back into the market. At the Bhaskars, Meera fusses over Joy and Tanya is worried that Joy will be spoiled. Shruti thinks of a way to have Murugan and Lathika be together yet apart, but Lathika shoots down the suggestion.

552.title: Episode #1.552
552.plot: Seeing Joy struggle with her O-Levels preparation, Bhaskar wants to get her a tutor. Meera is sceptical but Bhaskar is confident he can get through to Tanya. At Ali's insistence, Wafiq talks to Salmah about stepping up Amir's MMA training. In the meantime, Khairul and Chris learn about a new menu from Tapao Fitness incorporating KS Food's famous rempah.

553.title: Episode #1.553
553.plot: The tension between Amir and Sulaiman continues to rise and Sulaiman thinks that Salmah is giving Amir too much leeway. In an effort to get Lathika to communicate and work things out with Murugan, Wati lies to her that Murugan is going back to India to get married. Eddie, Rizman and Julius are nervous when they didn't get any word on the overseas attachment and fear they might have been dropped from the list.

554.title: Episode #1.554
554.plot: The tension in the Rahman household grows as Sulaiman seems to be at odds with everyone there. Gina has to deal with an unreasonable client while Eddie is upset that he is being left out of the overseas attachment. In the meantime, Vanessa and Norleena try to find out the identity of the baby biter at the daycare centre.

555.title: Episode #1.555
555.plot: Li Yan calls to tell the family her mother has passed away. Eddie misses her and knows she will need cheering up but he gets an unexpected email. When Norleena finds out about Ah Biao's unorthodox suggestion to deal with the daycare biter, she confesses that Rayyan is responsible. Gina, meanwhile, gets some help from Ben when the tenants she has to evict turn aggressive.

556.title: Episode #1.556
556.plot: Keen to find out about SkinnyDipping's connection to Michael, Eddie continues chatting online with the mysterious stranger. The romance between Vivian and Warren continues to blossom until Warren drops a bombshell. While Ah Biao hopes to make amends with the correct Ah Ling this time round.

557.title: Episode #1.557
557.plot: Felicia feels that Jared is being clingy, and devises a plan to spend a lazy evening at home instead of meeting him. Chris and Suzanne continue to comfort a distraught Vivian, who is convinced that Warren wants nothing more to do with her. Ah Biao decides it is high time he starts exercising regularly as the mandatory physical test for the taxi licence renewal looms.

558.title: Episode #1.558
558.plot: Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira make plans to hit the gym together but they surprise each other with their own pre-gym 'secret visits'. Felicia decides to buy Jared a good dinner to make up for lying to him but something unexpected crops up. While at TCH, tension arises when Lauren bumps into Shruti and Pam.

559.title: Episode #1.559
559.plot: After taking a reflex test, Ah Biao realises he is not as nimble as he thinks he is. Lauren drops another bombshell. She tells Shruti and Pam that she is turning herself in. The Tongs, meanwhile, wait in eager anticipation for Li Yan's return together with her father Wai Meng.

560.title: Episode #1.560
560.plot: Felicia freaks out when Jared wants her to go meet his parents. She feels she needs to put an end to the relationship before it goes too deep for her comfort. At the Rahmans, Sulaiman continues finding fault with Amir and a frustrated Salmah had enough. And with the arrival of Wai Meng, Tanya advises Bhaskar to stay away from him because of the animosity between them.

561.title: Episode #1.561
561.plot: After dumping Jared, Felicia still feels lousy as Diana and Gina try to cheer her up. More troubles at the Rahmans when Sulaiman is angry with Norleena for not being upfront with him. Joy is desperate to meet Wai Meng and Amir comes up with a plan to help her out.

562.title: Episode #1.562
562.plot: Knowing that Meera is upset with Bhaskar for including them in his will, Tanya is sceptical when she is overly nice to Joy and her. It is still tense between Sulaiman and Norleena and although Norleena tries to make amends, Sulaiman is still distant. Li Yan kicks her father out of her house when things come to a head over Bhaskar and those past issues.

563.title: Episode #1.563
563.plot: Tanya is not pleased when she finds out that Bhaskar has plans to renovate Joy's room. Meanwhile Sulaiman and Pam end up going to the Comedy Night event together after everyone backs out. Vanessa is adjusting well to working at Life Feed but a small blunder earns her an earful from Sheila.

564.title: Episode #1.564
564.plot: Vanessa worries she might screw up when she gets an unreasonable last minute demand from Sheila. Bhaskar has trouble accepting Tanya's decision to move back home while Meera reveals to Arjun that she never wanted Tanya and Joy to stay with them in the first place. At TCH, Ben is concerned that Pam and Sulaiman seem to be getting close again.

565.title: Episode #1.565
565.plot: Shruti is worried to find out that Pam has financial woes as the latter considers taking on a job at a sleazy modelling agency. Vanessa upsets Sheila when she unexpectedly impresses one of Life Feed's top clients. With Deepavali around the corner, Meera insists on going saree shopping with Tanya and Joy.

566.title: Episode #1.566
566.plot: For Tanya and Joy's sake, Bhaskar decides to put an end to the years of rift by agreeing to meet Wei Meng before he returns to Hong Kong. While Li Yan regrets the way things have turned out between her and her father. At Life Feed, Chris finds it bothersome when he has to work with Vanessa on a new proposal for a client.

567.title: Episode #1.567
567.plot: Vanessa's carelessness threatens to derail the good work she has done at Life Feed so far. Li Yan is pleased that Wai Meng is settling in well, but Tanya continues to be wary about getting to know him. When Melissa learns that Bee Li doesn't pay any attention to her credit card statements, she spies an opportunity. Meanwhile, Pam is dismissive when Shruti urges her to consider Firdaus as a dating prospect.

568.title: Episode #1.568
568.plot: Li Yan forces an unsuspecting Tanya and Wai Meng to make peace. A needy Lauren makes it hard for Gina to draw the line between professionalism and doing a personal favour for Peter Tay. At Life feed, Chris is surprised to learn from Sheila that his food contest idea is a lame one.

569.title: Episode #1.569
569.plot: Tanya manages to persuade Bhaskar to forgive Li Yan but will Meera find out? Sulaiman raises the adoption issue again much to Norleena's consternation. Gina has had enough of babysitting Lauren until the latter calls her, clearly in distress.

570.title: Episode #1.570
570.plot: As Norleena and Sulaiman continue their cold war over the adoption issue, Salmah tries to encourage them to communicate better. Lauren and Gina start to bond after spending time together, much to Ben's concern. Meanwhile at the Lims, Melissa is getting hooked onto the laxatives.

571.title: Episode #1.571
571.plot: Sulaiman begs Pam not to tell Norleena about what happened between them at the Zipline Park, much to Pam's frustration. Tanya's effort to get Bhaskar to speak to Li Yan is thwarted when Meera brings Bhaskar out for lunch elsewhere. Melissa starts getting advice from an online friend when the laxative isn't working while an angry Firdaus confronts Sulaiman after he learns about what happened with Pam.

572.title: Episode #1.572
572.plot: Meera continues staying in bed and Tanya feels even worse, thinking she is the cause of Meera's distress. Shruti finds it strange that Sulaiman is not hanging around at TCH as Pam gets nervous around Norleena. Gina is stunned when she sees Lauren flirting with her new client.

573.title: Episode #1.573
573.plot: Norleena finds out from Izzy that Sulaiman and Pam were the only ones who had gone for the comedy night event. At school, the overwhelming stress from studying and the PSLE exams causes Kalila to have a panic attack. With Jay away, Khairul manipulates Chris into inviting him for the Tongs' family dinner to get close to Diana.

574.title: Episode #1.574
574.plot: Kalila is forced to miss her PSLE paper because of her panic attacks . Meanwhile , Diana starts to question Khairul's motives for opening up to her . Over at the Tongs , Wai Meng spends time with Diana and Tanya and realises they do not get along .

575.title: Episode #1.575
575.plot: Tanya cannot hold back how she truly feels about Wai Meng and lashes at him . Single and ready to mingle Felicia continues to use the dating app to improve her love life . After the panic attack scare , Wafiq tries to spend more time with Kalila while trying to keep the gym up and running .

576.title: Episode #1.576
576.plot: Jamie starts to get jealous when he sees Dr Raja and Tanya getting along well . Wafiq struggles to make Adam see his point of view about Kok Yong's proposed changes to Kickstart MMA's business model . And while Salmah is enthusiastic about starting her retraining classes , she feels uncomfortable at the prospect of being the oldest student .

577.title: Episode #1.577
577.plot: In a desperate bid for Peter Tay's attention , Lauren puts herself in a dangerous situation . Arjun's suspicions grow about Dr Raja and Tanya's closeness after he notices Dr Raja's unusually good mood at work . Wafiq has to deal with the aftermath when Adam's rants on Kickstart's Twitter account causes panic among their customers .

578.title: Episode #1.578
578.plot: Vanessa is surprised by Chris' behaviour towards her at the office and begins to wonder if he is deliberately making things difficult for her . Diana brushes off Lauren's antics as a cry for attention , but Gina is worried for Lauren's safety . And just when Salmah begins to think that she is getting on better with her classmates at her course , her efforts start to backfire .

579.title: Episode #1.579
579.plot: Gina has been identified in the viral video and it is affecting her job and her reputation . Desperate to make amends with Adam , Wafiq makes a last ditch effort to talk things out with him . Back from his work trip and feeling inspired , Jay and Kwong San start to brainstorm fresh ideas for their new business .

580.title: Episode #1.580
580.plot: Jay finds an old notebook belonging to Salmah's late husband Abdul , and is surprised to learn of its history and how it ended up with the Lims . Chris gets annoyed when Vanessa approaches Zul to reconsider the offer to work with Life Feed without his knowledge . Sulaiman and Pam continue to avoid TCH and Shruti is getting really suspicious .

581.title: Episode #1.581
581.plot: Bee Li gets upset when Jay decides to return Abdul's old notebook to Salmah instead of destroying it . The tension from work between Chris and Vanessa spills over to home as they start to avoid each other . Felicia , meanwhile , decides to go on juice diet after getting inspired by someone she met at the Singles event .

582.title: Episode #1.582
582.plot: Norleena finds the photograph of Pam on Sulaiman's phone. She doesn't know what to think and decides to confront Pam. Shruti forms a team together with Firdaus and Pam to come up with a campaign to save water. Meantime, Jay is on the search for the crucial ingredient that Abdul used in his recipes.

583.title: Episode #1.583
583.plot: As Shruti , Firdaus and Pam team up for the Dig - A - Well campaign , Shruti realises that there may be something more to Firdaus and Pam's friendship . Felicia is disappointed when Suzanne and Gina are too busy to party with her . But she realises that there is one more person she hasn't asked yet . Arjun , Tanya and Lathika are given the responsibility to plan Meera's Deepavali party . Will they be able to pull it off in time ?

584.title: Episode #1.584
584.plot: A series of events at work and at home make Arjun realise how much Meera has sacrificed for him . Playing cupid , Shruti makes Firdaus take a compatibility quiz and realises Pam and Firdaus should never be together . In the meantime , Norleena is determined to make Sulaiman suffer for his near - kiss with Pam .

585.title: Episode #1.585
585.plot: It is Deepavali and for Arjun's sake , Bhaskar and Meera are cordial with Dr Raja at the house party . Meanwhile , things are awkward between Tanya and Dr Raja as both try to hide their feelings for each other . Over at the Rahmans , Norleena's anger towards Sulaiman worsens to the point that she lost all trust in him .

586.title: Episode #1.586
586.plot: With Mark's help , Arjun finds out about Sylvia's biggest fear and manages to scare her at work . The cold war continues between Norleena and Sulaiman and Salmah decides to intervene but it only makes things worse when Norleena contemplates divorce . Shruti finds out from Firdaus that he had been fired from his job after an argument with his boss . And when Melissa stops hanging out with Kalila , she gets upset and takes out her frustrations at the gym .

587.title: Episode #1.587
587.plot: Tanya gets worried when she learns from Li Yan that Jamie hasn't even got enough cash to pay for his meal . Melissa starts confiding and pouring out her problems to her new found friend Ashley , while Fitri suspects that Kalila has a boyfriend and reports it to Wafiq . And for Salmah , everything seems to be going wrong in class .

588.title: Episode 588
588.plot: After much consideration , Norleena agrees to give Sulaiman and their marriage another chance. Over at TCH , Li Yan is delighted to have Wai Meng helping out until the customers start complaining about him. Tanya confronts Jamie about his recurring gambling habit and he crumbles when she threatens to reveal everything to Joy.

589.title: Episode 589
589.plot: More headaches for Li Yan at TCH as Wai Meng and Zul get into each other's way . Arjun unwittingly offends Zara when he gives her advice on how to better engage her young patients . Jamie's gambling debts spiral out of control and ends up being arrested for public mischief . Tanya has no choice but to turn to Bhaskar for help to bail him out .

590.title: Episode 590
590.plot: Desperate to get Wai Meng out of the house , Li Yan asks Ah Biao to take him out for a photography session . But the two old men end up going somewhere else . Meanwhile , to help Tanya out , Dr Raja meets up with Jamie and offers him a deal he cannot refuse . Over at the Lims , Bee Li get irritated when Jay experiments cooking the sambal kicap that reminds her of Abdul .

591.title: Episode 591
591.plot: Bee Li continues to get freaked out by Abdul's recipes in her handbag and Wati gets the brunt of it . Bhaskar gets a surprise visit from Dr Raja who finally apologises for wrecking the former's dream of becoming a surgeon . Meanwhile , Mandy seems to be getting closer to Amir but he is missing having Joy around .

592.title: Episode 592
592.plot: Wai Meng and Zul have a duel to see who can make the tastier laksa and a reluctant Li Yan is dragged in as the judge . Tanya and Dr Raja are in romantic mood after the night before but Meera could be tempted to burst their bubble . At the hospital , Zara is concerned when a female patient tries to get close to Arjun .

593.title: Episode #1.593
593.plot: Li Ting flies into Singapore to escort Wai Meng back to Hong Kong . Will it a happy reunion or will sparks fly when Li Ting finds out that Li Yan has been given their mother's bangle ? As Natalie gets closer to Arjun , Arjun defends her when test results show that she might be faking her symptoms . Meantime , Amir decides to be honest with his feelings for Joy .

594.title: Episode #1.594
594.plot: Wai Meng finds out about Li Yan's affair with Robert . However , the advice he gives her is totally unexpected . After confessing their feelings for each other , Amir and Joy find it difficult to keep their relationship a secret . And just when it seems that Zara and Arjun are finally able to get along , they argue over the best possible way to treat Natalie .

595.title: Episode #1.595
595.plot: Mandy suspects that Joy and Amir are dating . Diana helps out with the household chores at the Lims , leaving Wati worried for her job . And while Li Yan tries to suss out Adam's feelings about the gym , Salmah wrestles with keeping the truth about Peter Tay's involvement from her .

596.title: Episode #1.596
596.plot: Bee Li goes into panic mode when she finds out Wati has plans to seek employment elsewhere . Tanya complains about Joy to Dr Raja during lunch and the latter drops a bombshell on her . More trouble in store for Arjun when Natalie charges into his house and gets injured .

597.title: Episode #1.597
597.plot: Vanessa brings up the topic of divorce but Ben tries to avoid it . Arjun's trouble with Natalie comes to a head when Natalie makes a police report accusing him of 'inappropriate behaviour' . Joy , meanwhile , goes on her first date with Amir and keeps it from Tanya .

598.title: Episode #1.598
598.plot: Bee Li isn't pleased to see Adam lazing around but Kwong San tells her to cut him some slack . Zara helps Arjun get Natalie's test results but she is feeling guilty for defying Dr Raja . The get - together that Suzanne organized gets interesting when Gina and Arjun start bonding .

599.title: Episode #1.599
599.plot: Tanya fears that Dr Raja may end their relationship because his son has difficulty accepting her . Arjun has a casual gym date with Gina and they hit it off , much to Ben's displeasure . At the Lims , Melissa is angry with Adam for breaking a promise to her while Kalila's attempts to reconnect with her best friend fall apart .

600.title: Episode #1.600
600.plot: Bee Li pleads with Wafiq to let Adam back to coach at gym but things take an ugly turn and Wafiq ends up having a big fight with Kwong San . Salmah learns about mind mapping from Amir but when she tries to share it with her course mates , they turn her down . Meanwhile , Joy is surprised to learn that Tanya is seeing Dr Raja .

601.title: Episode #1.601
601.plot: Bee Li pleads with Wafiq to let Adam back to coach at gym but things take an ugly turn and Wafiq ends up having a big fight with Kwong San . Salmah learns about mind mapping from Amir but when she tries to share it with her course mates , they turn her down . Meanwhile , Joy is surprised to learn that Tanya is seeing Dr Raja .

602.title: Episode #1.602
602.plot: Shruti is uncomfortable when Pam starts getting comfortable with Firdaus . Norleena can't resist checking Sulaiman's phone messages when her suspicions chip away at her , but immediately regrets her decision . Lathika is excited to learn that Murugan will be back in Singapore the following week , but worries about the status of their relationship .

603.title: Episode #1.603
603.plot: After that big blow - up between Li Yan and Adam at TCH , Diana , Chris and Ben have a showdown with Adam and threaten to cut him off from the Tongs . Arjun is reminded by Dr Raja that the gift he received from Natalie could turn the case against him . Ah Biao is depressed when his earnings as a taxi driver continue to tumble .

604.title: Episode #1.604
604.plot: Meera and Bhaskar insist on preparing a legal defence for Arjun despite warnings from Tanya that it could end up undermining their son . While at the hospital , Zara takes things into her own hands and has a talk with Natalie . At TCH , Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira sign up for courses tailor - made for seniors .

605.title: Episode #1.605
605.plot: At the Rahmans , Norleena continues to be cold towards Sulaiman , while Salmah has some encouraging words for him . Although Arjun's case is finally settled and his name cleared , Dr Raja still has punishment in store for him for defying his orders . Chris has big plans for his wedding anniversary and rallies Felicia and Gina to help keep it a secret from Suzanne .

606.title: Episode #1.606
606.plot: Suzanne finds out about the wedding anniversary surprise Chris has planned for her . In her attempt to get Norleena and Sulaiman back together , Diana plans a dessert tasting session at Jay's place . At Life Feed , Chris and Vanessa start to get worried for their jobs when Khairul and Sheila have a big fight .

607.title: Episode #1.607
607.plot: Tanya decides to come clean with Joy about her relationship with Dr Raja . Wafiq lectures Kalila on the dangers of making friends online and in the process , finds out about Melissa and Ashley . Meanwhile , Chris starts getting overconfident about his plans with Khairul .

608.title: Episode #1.608
608.plot: Adam learns about Melissa's alleged online boyfriend and worries he might be an internet predator . Tanya and Dr Raja try to make amends with Bhaskar while Meera sneakily works against them . Norleena and Sulaiman continue to work on saving their marriage , while Firdaus and Felicia have an unlikely first meeting .

609.title: Episode #1.609
609.plot: Firdaus is nervous when he has to spend the day working together with Pam . Will he be able to get over his feelings for her ? Adam continues to be suspicious about Ashley's friendship with Melissa , and devises a plan to get to the bottom of it . Murugan returns from India and while Lathika is happy that he is back , she wonders if his feelings for her have changed .

610.title: Episode #1.610
610.plot: Melissa is filled with dread when Adam finds out about her taking laxative , while Adam feels guilty and responsible for her eating disorder . Pam , meanwhile , is shocked when she learns that Firdaus and Felicia are dating . Frustrated by Murugan's lack of communication , Lathika finally decides to ask him about the status of their relationship .

611.title: Episode #1.611
611.plot: The family rally around Adam to help with his depression . Meantime , Tanya finds out from Mandy about Joy and Amir's relationship . Pam decides to confess her feelings to Firdaus but Shruti tries to stop her .

612.title: Episode #1.612
612.plot: Pam gives up hope of ever being with Firdaus . But Felicia plays cupid to get them together . Amir advises Joy to make peace with Tanya but both mother and daughter refuse to compromise . Meanwhile , Salmah plans a support group to help Bee Li and Kwong San cope with Adam's depression , only to be rejected .

613.title: Episode #1.613
613.plot: It is their first wedding anniversary and Chris has a surprise for Suzanne . Feeling left out now that Firdaus and Pam are dating , Shruti finds an unexpected friend to keep her company . Bee Li takes things into her own hands and decides to set a wedding date for Jay and Diana , and Diana is not happy about it .

614.title: Episode #1.614
614.plot: Everyone is nervous as Melissa and Kalila collect their PSLE results . While the Lims celebrate , Wafiq worries about his daughter . Diana confronts Bee Li about trying to take control of the wedding . Meanwhile , Suzanne wonders where Chris is getting all that extra money from and decides to question him .

615.title: Episode #1.615
615.plot: At Life Feed , Chris continues keeping Sheila at bay while Khairul investigates her . Mrs Pereira is annoyed that Ah Biao didn't tell her about his knee injury , and nags at him to see a doctor . Mark , meantime , decides to return to his old part - time job for financial security .

616.title: Episode #1.616
616.plot: It is Adam's first day of seeking professional help from a psychiatrist and a therapist . Ah Biao finally goes to see Bhaskar about his knee, and is disappointed when he learns that he will have to stay off the roads for a while . With Sheila's help , Jay realises that Khairul appears to be bearing some kind of grudge against his family .

617.title: Episode #1.617
617.plot: Tanya finally meets Nevin , Dr Raja's son . As Tanya's relationship with Dr Raja deepens , her bond with Joy deteriorates . Diana is troubled upon learning that Jay and Sheila have teamed up to poach Life Feed's potential investor . Lathika and Murugan's love for each other is put to the test when Murugan lost his job , forcing Lathika to choose between love and her loyalty to the Bhaskars .

618.title: Episode #1.618
618.plot: Tensions run high at the Lims as Adam's erratic moods cause everyone to walk on egg shells around him . Nevin makes the first move to establish a friendship with Joy , hoping that it will make her more open to his father Dr Raja dating Tanya . Lathika falls out with Fitri when the latter takes upon herself to give Murugan some love advice .

619.title: Episode #1.619
619.plot: Joy is prepared to give Dr Raja a chance by going for an outing with him and Nevin , but Bhaskar tries to change her mind . Jay is looking for a best man for his wedding , which leads Diana and Norleena to try and change his loner ways by setting him up with Sulaiman . Meanwhile , Adam is surprised to learn of Xue Ling's plans to return home .

620.title: Episode #1.620
620.plot: Dr Raja challenges Bhaskar to a boxing match for Tanya's hand , much to everyone's disbelief . Jay and Sulaiman go on their 'friend date' , while Sheila starts warming up to Jay again . At the Lims , Bee Li convinces Kwong San to attend Salmah's support group for Adam's sake .

621.title: Episode #1.621
621.plot: Sheila's affections for Jay resurface and he feels compelled to share this revelation with Diana . Kwong San attends the support group to help manage Adam's depression but it turns out to be a humiliating experience for him . Meantime , Bhaskar seeks out Dr Raja and has a surprise in store for the latter .

622.title: Episode #1.622
622.plot: Sheila fears that Khairul's feelings for Diana are real and that it could scupper their carefully laid plans . Sulaiman drives Norleena up the wall with his worries over Rayyan's speech development . While Pam is upset to learn that Firdaus thinks of her as 'just a friend' .

623.title: Episode #1.623
623.plot: Joy is upset when her decision to skip physiotherapy provokes an unexpected response from Amir . Mark makes some unkind remarks about Pam and it results in a showdown with an incensed Firdaus . Felicia is nervous before an important business meeting and ends up having one drink too many .

624.title: Episode #1.624
624.plot: Mark is hurting from the loss of his father and finds an unexpected source of comfort in Sheila . Amir discovers Joy has an ear piercing and worries that Tanya is going to blame it on him . Felicia , meanwhile , tries to make amends after getting tipsy at the business meeting .

625.title: Episode #1.625
625.plot: Salmah and Norleena are excited about meeting Zerina , Khairul's fiancée . Amir is determined to get back into MMA training now that his exams are over , and makes plans with Ali . Bhaskar is stunned when he learns that Ah Biao didn't see the Rheumatologist that he referred him to .

626.title: Episode #1.626
626.plot: The Rahmans continue to fret over Zerina's embarrassing Instagram photo of them , as Khairul attempts to get her to take the photo down . Amir and Ian spar for the first time together , but in his zeal to get the better of Amir , Ian resorts to dirty tricks . Tensions flare when Joy thinks that Bhaskar approves of Tanya and Dr Raja's relationship .

627.title: Episode #1.627
627.plot: For Tanya's sake , Bhaskar makes an effort to get along with Dr Raja , incurring Meera's annoyance . Jay gathers Chris , Ben and Sulaiman to plan a surprise for Diana at the wedding . Diana decides to counter - surprise when she finds out about it . And when Joy goes missing , Tanya lays the blame on Amir .

628.title: Episode #1.628
628.plot: Jay is upset when Khairul accompanies Diana to pick up the wedding invite samples . Jamie lets Joy to believe that Tanya and Dr Raja's dating was the reason behind him leaving the country . At the Lims , Bee Li continues to get on Diana's case about the wedding preparation while Adam is forced to deal with his past trauma from his mother's suicide .

629.title: Episode #1.629
629.plot: While Li Yan and the Lims think of ways to help Adam cope with his depression , Adam revisits the gym to coach Amir . Lathika prepares to tell the Bhaskars she is leaving for India , but gets unexpected news . Meanwhile , Meera decides to help Tanya and Joy make peace and engineers a truce between them .

630.title: Episode #1.630
630.plot: Xue Ling suddenly returns to Singapore , but her change in personality shocks and upsets everyone . Khairul gets into big trouble with Zerina when he turns up late for an interview that she arranged with a magazine . Joy is excited preparing for Christmas , but she isn't sure whether to invite Tanya to the party .

631.title: Episode #1.631
631.plot: Adam finally finds out the real reason why Xue Ling left him . Ah Biao is being difficult about his injury and refuses to listen to the doctor's advice . Khairul tries to work hard at his relationship with Zerina while Jamie plans the perfect Christmas surprise for Joy .

632.title: Episode #1.632
632.plot: It is Christmas Eve and Ah Biao sets up a Charity Photo booth at the coffee house . Meanwhile , with both her parents around , Joy is having the best Christmas ever . But things are not looking good for Khairul when he flares up at Zerina . It is the final straw and he realises he truly doesn't want to marry her .

633.title: Episode #1.633
633.plot: After his talk with Diana , Khairul starts to reconsider his marriage with Zerina . Dr Safinah advises Vanessa to taper off on her medication , but Vanessa worries she won't be able to cope without it . Amir helps to babysit Rayyan and teaches him to throw a ball , causing Salmah to worry about the many fragile items around the house .

634.title: Episode #1.634
634.plot: The secondary school posting results are out , and Melissa and Kalila are both in for a surprise . Bee Li and Li Yan clash as they discuss plans for Jay and Diana's wedding , with both having very different ideas about how things should be . When Khairul isn't keen to help Diana find proof that Sheila was behind the attack on her , Diana takes matters into her own hands .

635.title: Episode #1.635
635.plot: Jay is worried about the escalating tension between Sheila and Diana and is desperate to stop them from fighting. Eddie is finally home from his overseas attachment and although the family is happy to see him, he is looking forward to be being reunited with someone else. Joy helps one of Dr Raja's CP patients and sees a different side to him.

636.title: Episode #1.636
636.plot: Joy realises Jamie wants to get back with Tanya and is determined to find out why they broke up in the first place. Eddie is excited about seeing Shruti again, but their reunion is nothing like he planned. Bee Li is upset when Kwong San is spending more time talking business with Pauline than helping to plan for the wedding.

637.title: Episode #1.637
637.plot: A storm is brewing at the Bhaskars when Joy finally discovers the reason behind her parents' divorce. Kwong San and Jay are introduced to a business opportunity that could change their lives forever. Meanwhile, Eddie is skeptical when Lauren starts being nice to him.

638.title: Episode #1.638
638.plot: Bee Li finds out about the Jay she never knew when she runs into Sheila while doing her own investigation on Pauline. The relationship between Joy and Tanya worsens as Joy continues hanging out with her father. Pam, meantime, continues harping about Jordan in front of Eddie, much to Shruti's annoyance.

639.title: Episode #1.639
639.plot: Eddie learns that Jordan is interested in Shruti. Amir's hopes of taking part in the MMA competition are thwarted by Salmah. Kwong San and Jay have reservations about the Renton System and things get complicated when Bee Li shows her displeasure with Pauline during a business meeting.

640.title: Episode #1.640
640.plot: Shruti is delighted to receive an expensive birthday present from Eddie, only for Lauren to come between them. Jay is concerned that investing in the Renton System could put the new company in financial difficulties. Things are going well for Vanessa at work until she learns that Dr Safinah is going to take her off medication for good.

641.title: Episode #1.641
641.plot: Shruti is still reeling from the kiss between Lauren and Eddie - will Eddie be able to make amends before it is too late ? Jamie is not comfortable with Joy's cold treatment of Tanya and decides to sort it out with Meera. At the worksite, Murugan gets in trouble with his unreasonable supervisor Selvam.

642.title: Episode #1.642
642.plot: Tanya finds out that Dr Raja paid Jamie to leave the country. Vanessa decides to gradually come off her medication, while Murugan witnesses an unsavoury encounter involving Selvam. Meanwhile, Eddie and Shruti skirt around their feelings for each other.

643.title: Episode #1.643
643.plot: Joy issues an ultimatum - she is moving out of the Bhaskars and will only return if Tanya breaks up with Dr Raja. Salmah introduces her neighbor Haikal to Atiqah, and Zul is not comfortable about it. Vanessa and Ah Biao, meantime, bond over their health issues.

644.title: Episode #1.644
644.plot: The O - level results are released and Joy and Amir have to decide on what path to take next. At the Lims, Bee Li suspects Adam's depression has hit again. Lauren is unhappy when she feels that Peter Tay is neglecting her.

645.title: Episode #1.645
645.plot: Tanya and Salmah get into a big argument over Joy and Amir. To get Peter Tay's attention, Lauren starts spreading rumours on social media to hurt his business reputation. Murugan unknowingly offends Selvam and gets more work assigned to him.

646.title: Episode #1.646
646.plot: As Selvam's bullying gets out of hand, Murugan decides to stand up to him. Suzanne reluctantly helps out at Kickstart as the new gym manager while Felicia takes over her duties at Xue Organics. Xue Ling finally meets with Melissa, only to find her cold and distant.

647.title: Episode #1.647
647.plot: Xue Ling discovers that Peter Tay has been substituting natural ingredients with artificial seasonings and flavouring in King of Sauces products. Hurt by Xue Ling's attitude towards her, Bee Li decides to seek her out and speak to her. Mark is devastated to learn that his mother now owns the flat, meaning he will be homeless soon if she sells it.

648.title: Episode #1.648
648.plot: As the probe into Peter Tay continues, Xue Ling discovers that he has been using company funds to make huge donations to a nursing home. Suzanne worries that Felicia is outshining her at Xue Organics now that she is working at the gym. Mark is furious with Sylvia over the sale of the flat while Joy continues to give Tanya the cold shoulder.

649.title: Episode #1.649
649.plot: Joy and Amir are miserable being kept apart, and Mandy offers to help for her own agenda. Mark is being kicked out of his flat, and Sheila helps him get sweet revenge. Meanwhile, Bee Li goes into spy mode to find out how Peter Tay is linked to the nursing home.

650.title: Episode #1.650
650.plot: Eddie and the gang find out that Mark is escorting Sheila, but Mark begs to differ. Mandy continues coming in between Joy and Amir, and is peeved that Amir is not paying attention to her. Arjun is reminded of his time with Diana when Shruti mentions about an old photo.

651.title: Episode #1.651
651.plot: Melissa is enthusiastic about being in the same secondary school as Kalila, but Kalila feels guilty knowing she might transfer out. After a talk with Gina about unrequited love, Arjun decides to make a drastic move. Meera, meanwhile, gets Amir to help out for a fundraising event at SMW.

652.title: Episode #1.652
652.plot: Tensions remain between the Bhaskars, Lims and the Tongs following the aftermath of Arjun's confession. Bee Li pays another visit to Kheng Hwa at the home, and discovers some interesting information. Tanya frets over Joy's insistence on staying with the Tongs, and she seeks out an unlikely ally for help.

653.title: Episode #1.653
653.plot: Tanya and Meera come to blows about Joy, and Meera is shocked when Bhaskar refuses to side with her. Mark is still reeling from Sheila's rejection and doesn't report to camp. Meanwhile, Eddie and Shruti are adjusting to the previous night's decision to bury their feelings.

654.title: Episode #1.654
654.plot: Nevin nearly tempts Joy into drinking alcohol, and Tanya is livid when Li Yan informs her about it. Meera is rocked when she sees Bhaskar rushing to Li Yan's defence. Mark gets kicked out of Sheila's flat, and Lathika frets that Murugan might be unfaithful.

655.title: Episode #1.655
655.plot: Eddie and Shruti create an opportunity for Mark to reconcile with his mother, but things didn't go as planned. Lathika finally confronts Murugan about her suspicions, but the truth is not what she expects. Tanya tries to reconnect with Joy and make amends with Li Yan and Bhaskar.

656.title: Episode #1.656
656.plot: Salmah and Sanjana arrive for their first day of work as healthcare interns in the Paediatric ward. Mark continues in his self - destructive ways as Eddie tries his best to help. Tanya, meantime, makes a surprising discovery about Nevin.

657.title: Episode #1.657
657.plot: Tanya learns that Nevin went to a bar with his cousins and Dr Raja knew about it all along. Kwong San feels guilty that no one remembers the role Abdul played in the success of KS Foods. Salmah gives Zara advice on how to deal with her stubborn father.

658.title: Episode #1.658
658.plot: Salmah loses it when Kwong San apologizes to her for wronging Abdul in the past. Tanya is upset that the drinking issue involving Nevin is swept under the carpet by Dr Raja. Mark shocks Eddie by announcing he wants to join the army full - time.

659.title: Episode #1.659
659.plot: Kwong San discovers disturbing news about Pauline on the eve of the contract signing with her company. Sheila is humiliated by a drunk Felicia in front of Diana and her bridesmaids. Wai Meng gets impatient with Bee Li and hijacks the planning for Diana's wedding dinner.

660.title: Episode #1.660
660.plot: In a bold move, Kwong San and Jay sign the deal with Renton Systems. Joy is sad to learn that Amir has to go back to KL. Wai Meng nitpicks at Bee Li's decisions regarding wedding preparations. Meanwhile, Mark helps Sheila to gather information on Jay and Diana's wedding.

661.title: Episode #1.661
661.plot: The Lims deal with the fallout following Kwong San's public apology. Khairul puts a secret recording online that has serious implications for Jay. Preparations for the wedding start to fall apart when Diana loses the hotel booking.

662.title: Episode #1.662
662.plot: Tensions rise between Jay and Kwong San over Abdul's recipes. Diana confronts Khairul about his betrayal of her trust. More trouble for Diana as the fate of her wedding hangs in the balance when she makes a shocking discovery.

663.title: Episode #1.663
663.plot: Adam and Xue Ling worry about Peter Tay's impending return. Will they find the evidence they need to take him down ? Tensions between Diana and Jay continue as she tries to figure out what to make of their relationship. Meanwhile, Norleena tries her hand at cooking one of her father's old recipes.

664.title: Episode #1.664
664.plot: Xue Ling and Adam celebrate the fact that they no longer need to worry about Peter Tay meddling in their lives. Suzanne is keen to resume their search for a flat but Chris is reluctant, owing to uncertainties about his job. Worried about what Peter Tay might do to the family, Melissa seeks out Kheng Hwa for help.

665.title: Episode #1.665
665.plot: Jay and the Tongs worry about whether Diana will change her mind about calling off the wedding. Chris and Suzanne view a flat with Gina, and Suzanne is excited by the prospect of having their own space. Zerina, meanwhile, makes a disconcerting discovery about Khairul.

666.title: Episode #1.666
666.plot: Jay and the Lims wait at the ROM, hoping Diana will turn up. Khairul decides to break up his engagement with Zerina and Chris regrets making a deal with Sheila. At the Lims, Melissa comes clean about visiting Kheng Hwa at the home.

667.title: Episode #1.667
667.plot: It is all hands on deck as Felicia, Suzanne and Norleena help Diana plan her wedding celebration. Peter Tay is annoyed and worried when the staff at the nursing home seem unable to locate Kheng Hwa. At TCH, Khairul is surprised by the unexpected arrival of a familiar face.

668.title: Episode #1.668
668.plot: Ismail tries to convince Khairul that Zerina is the one for him, but Khairul is still unsure. Chris feels guilty about working with Sheila, and starts to get cold feet. Peter Tay discovers that Kheng Hwa has moved out of the home, and tries in vain to convince her to move back.

669.title: Episode #1.669
669.plot: When Jay sees that Bee Li isn't in the Chinese New Year mood, he and Diana plan a combined reunion dinner for the Tongs and the Lims. Gina forces Peter Tay to spend time with his mother, knowing that Kheng Hwa would appreciate it. Meanwhile, Sheila corners Chris with a difficult choice.

670.title: Episode #1.670
670.plot: It is the day of Diana and Jay's wedding celebration, and family and friends busy themselves with the last minute preparations. However, an uninvited guest makes an appearance at the wedding, and a shocking revelation threatens to turn Diana and Jay's lives upside down.

671.title: Episode #1.671
671.plot: As the wedding guests process the shocking discovery of Sheila's death and the police and paramedics arrive at the scene of the crime, the mood turns uneasy - everyone at the wedding is now a potential suspect.

672.title: Episode #1.672
672.plot: Everyone is still in shock over Sheila's death at the wedding the previous night. Chris, Suzanne and Mark are questioned by the police about their whereabouts and involvement with Sheila. Ben, meanwhile, confronts Peter Tay regarding his relationship with Gina.

673.title: Episode #1.673
673.plot: Chris and Suzanne are surprised when Arjun and Gina reveal where they were during the wedding. Jay feels the pressure as the police question him about his past fights with Sheila. Tanya and the Bhaskars probe Jamie to find out if he has gone back to gambling.

674.title: Episode #1.674
674.plot: Meera tries to get Joy and Tanya to convince Jamie to go for rehab. The murder investigation takes its toll on everyone, as Jay begins to unravel. Meanwhile, Kheng Hwa tries in vain to reach Bee Li, who is ignoring calls and messages after she gets flooded by questions about Sheila's death.

675.title: Episode #1.675
675.plot: Meera's insomnia gets worse, as she continues to turn to medication for help. Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira decide to compile the wedding photos of Diana and Jay to brighten everyone's mood. At the hospital, Sanjana accidentally mixes up two patients' charts, resulting in Zara to making an incorrect decision.

676.title: Episode #1.676
676.plot: Meera continues to suffer from undesirable side effects from her sleeping pill abuse. Kheng Hwa learns that Peter Tay has been lying all along about his relationship with Gina. Suzanne tells Gina that she could ruin things with Arjun as long as she continues to work for Peter Tay.

677.title: Episode #1.677
677.plot: Kheng Hua shocks Peter Tay and Gina when she reveals she wants them to get married. Dr Raja discovers Nevin played truant from school but Nevin won't admit to it. Salmah, meantime, discovers some common ground with Sanjana. While Khairul decides to take advantage of Vanessa's crush on him, much to Chris's disapproval.

678.title: Episode #1.678
678.plot: Salmah feels bad for Sanjana when she gets a poor evaluation from Dr Raja on the last day of their attachment. Arjun has to reveal that he is dating Gina when Tanya catches Gina kissing him. At work, Chris and Suzanne get lousy treatment from their respective bosses.

679.title: Episode #1.679
679.plot: Money troubles mount for Kwong San and Bee Li and they consider letting Wati go. Norleena is surprised to learn from Ismail that Khairul had given Salmah a cheque. At the Tongs, Chris and Suzanne are determined to move out and buy their own flat.

680.title: Episode #1.680
680.plot: Chris and Suzanne are disappointed to learn they cannot afford their own flat. Norleena, meanwhile, tries to convince Salmah to spend the money from Khairul's cheque on the family. Vanessa discovers that Ben is still not over Gina.

681.title: Episode #1.681
681.plot: Sulaiman counsels a moping Ben, who despite his best efforts, still can't seem to get over Gina. At the Lims, Kwong San wrestles with whether or not to accept financial help from Xue Ling and Jay. While Suzanne continues to be upset with Chris over the ill - gotten money from Life Feed.

682.title: Episode #1.682
682.plot: Wafiq gets increasingly anxious when the mysterious person continues to text him and starts making demands. Kwong San resolves to apply for a job, and the family is supportive as he tries to figure out what to do. Mark's bitterness continues to grow as he feels that justice for Sheila has not been served.

683.title: Episode #1.683
683.plot: Tensions run high as Wafiq discovers the identity of his mysterious blackmailer. Things begin to unravel as Jamie confronts Bhaskar in a desperate attempt to win Tanya back. Eddie and Shruti, meantime, try to convince Mark to go for grief counselling.

684.title: Episode #1.684
684.plot: Arjun catches Meera giving Jamie money and confronts her. Wafiq begins to crack under the pressure of the murder investigations. Ben agrees to go for the football fans' event, but ends up making an unlikely friend.

685.title: Episode #1.685
685.plot: Zul tests Norleena's cooking by getting her to cook a dish. However, Norleena messes it up. Tension between Tanya and Joy arises, when Tanya refuses to let Joy go to a class chalet. Unable to sleep all weekend, Meera resorts to stealing sleeping pills at Bhaskar's clinic.

686.title: Episode #1.686
686.plot: Sylvia offers to help Ben make Gina jealous and initiates a no - strings - attached relationship with him. Mark's idea to organise a memorial for Sheila is met with reservation from Eddie. Meanwhile, Tanya, Dr Raja and Arjun confront Jamie about his dealing with Meera and they uncover a shocking plan.

687.title: Episode #1.687
687.plot: Kwong San's first day as a Flag car driver is fraught with missteps and wrong turns. At TCH, Norleena is disappointed with the lackluster reception of her dish. Jamie turns up unannounced at the Bhaskars to ask Tanya for a reconciliation and gets a shock when he finds out that she is pregnant.

688.title: Episode #1.688
688.plot: Bhaskar files a police report after a stock check reveals some missing boxes of sleeping pills. A chance encounter with Salmah taking his Flag car gives Kwong San an opportunity to mend their friendship. Felicia gets drunk at Sheila's memorial and runs her mouth off about Sheila's obnoxious past.

689.title: Episode #1.689
689.plot: It is Felicia's turn to get interrogated by the CID after the things she said at Sheila's memorial. Gina, meanwhile, expresses her concerns over Felicia's binge drinking to Xue Ling. Salmah encourages Kwong San to try out for the hospital concierge position at Tanglin General Hospital.

690.title: Episode #1.690
690.plot: Sensing Ben's non - committal attitude, Sylvia starts to question him on their relationship status. At the Bhaskars, Meera suffers side - effects of prolonged sleeping pills consumption. Xue Ling, Suzanne and Gina confront Felicia about her binge drinking, while Mark decides to investigate Sheila's murder on his own.

691.title: Episode #1.691
691.plot: An upset Shruti gets into a fight with Eddie when she thinks that he is not taking things seriously. Salmah faces a new challenge when she gets her nursing course results. Tanya is nervous about her meeting with a potential major client and Meera hatches a plan to sabotage the deal.

692.title: Episode #1.692
692.plot: Shruti is in critical condition after the car accident and Eddie fears the worst. During his own investigation into Sheila's murder, Mark finds an unlikely suspect in Vanessa. As Zul continues imparting his culinary skills to Norleena, he feels she is trying to bite off more than she can chew.

693.title: Episode #1.693
693.plot: Zul decides to pull a prank on Norleena to teach her a lesson. Salmah continues to worry that Khairul isn't enthusiastic about his decision to marry Zerina. Meanwhile, Shruti is recovering well in the hospital, much to everyone's relief.

694.title: Episode #1.694
694.plot: Tanya reveals to the Bhaksars that she is planning to make a police report about Meera spiking her drink. Amir returns from KL, listless and unmotivated due to his knee injury. Alone with Shruti at the hospital, Eddie tries to talk about his feelings for her. However, Shruti tries to evade the topic.

695.title: Episode #1.695
695.plot: The family tries to stay strong after Shruti suffers a stroke. Ismail offers to help Amir get out of the doldrums but Salmah is hesitant. At Life Feed, the stress of keeping up with Khairul's lies gets to Vanessa.

696.title: Episode #1.696
696.plot: Vanessa finally caves in when she can't take the pressure of lying for Khairul. At the Rahmans, Salmah is shocked to learn that Ismail has taken Amir out of the country. Meanwhile, Kwong San and Bee Li start the first day of work at their respective jobs.

697.title: Episode #1.697
697.plot: Vanessa panics when the police pull her in for further questioning. Salmah is pleased that Ismail has had a positive effect on Amir. Bee Li has to fudge the truth in order to get Diana nominated as Power Woman of the Year.

698.title: Episode #1.698
698.plot: Bee Li poses as Diana so the latter can be nominated as Power Woman of the Year. Khairul is questioned by the police regarding Sheila's murder and he learns that their prime suspect is Diana. Norleena, meantime, is worried that Salmah is going to donate all the money from Khairul's cheque to charity.

699.title: Episode #1.699
699.plot: Lathika feels sorry for Meera and intends to tell the police it was her who spiked Tanya's drink. Ismail incurs the wrath of Salmah when the former is unperturbed by Khairul's no - show at the wedding. Ben is unwell but insists on helping out at TCH and it leads to an embarrassing accident for him.

700.title: Episode #1.700
700.plot: Bhaskar finally had enough of Meera and tells her he wants a separation. Chris thinks he is in line to take over at Life Feed but ends up getting a rude shock. Ben's embarrassing accident at TCH gets caught on video and it goes viral.

701.title: Episode #1.701
701.plot: Arjun tries to convince Bhaskar not to go through with the separation as he is worried Meera will fall apart. Chris is not impressed when Ismail has no clue about the food business. Eddie, meanwhile, tries in vain to reach out to Shruti.

702.title: Episode #1.702
702.plot: Salmah starts her first day as a healthcare attendant at the paediatric ward. Zara and Ali clash over hiring a nurse to care for her ailing grandfather. Bee Li feels a shift in the family dynamics when the family starts relying more on Diana for help.

703.title: Episode #1.703
703.plot: Amir makes a trip to KL after receiving news about his mother's poor health. Salmah mediates between Ali and Zara after Zara's grandfather goes missing. At the hospital, Eddie and Pam are distraught when they witness Shruti's physical and emotional change after the stroke.

704.title: Episode #1.704
704.plot: Frustrated with her limitations due to the stroke, Shruti lashes out at everyone around her. Dr Raja proposes to Tanya, and gets an unexpected response. Salmah, meanwhile, is surprised to see a softer side of Ali.

705.title: Episode #1.705
705.plot: Norleena is surprised when Zul hands her a recipe and a new task in the kitchen. Shruti's condition stabilizes and Bhaskar wants to discuss the separation deed with Meera. Mark laments the lack of progress in Sheila's murder investigation and takes matters into his own hands.

706.title: Episode #1.706
706.plot: Amir returns from KL to meet Joy but their reunion might not be for long. Felicia is meeting an important investor but her alcohol withdrawal symptoms rear up. Dr Raja is surprised when Bhasker confronts him for shirking responsibility for Tanya.

707.title: Episode #1.707
707.plot: Chris and Suzanne have to scramble for a solution when they discover that they can't afford the downpayment for the flat. Gina is concerned when Felicia discovers a plan to gradually taper her alcohol use on her own. Meanwhile, the website Mark developed as a tribute to Sheila starts to ruffle a few feathers.

708.title: Episode #1.708
708.plot: Tensions rise between Chris and Ben when Ben continues to object to lending Chris and Suzanne the money needed for their flat downpayment. Amir and Joy discuss their options and how to handle a long - distance relationship once Amir goes back to KL. Eddie, meantime, is happy to embrace his role as a caregiver to Shruti, but she continues to feel low about her limited mobility.

709.title: Episode #1.709
709.plot: Salmah is grateful when Ali promises Salmah to look out for Amir whenever he goes to KL. Arjun worries that Meera will get addicted to sleeping pills again now that Bhaskar wants a separation. To make matters worse, Bhaskar wants to speed up the process by moving out of the house.

710.title: Episode #1.710
710.plot: Meera is devastated when she learns that Bhaskar wants to move out and overdoses on sleeping pills. Gina and Arjun consider setting up rules and boundaries in their relationship. Salmah goes to the gym to work out with Ali and surprisingly, they hit it off.

711.title: Episode #1.711
711.plot: Meera lets a guilt - ridden Bhaskar think she tried to commit suicide which makes him reconsider thoughts of a separation. Gina doubts Felicia's latest attempt to go alcohol - free will work. Meanwhile, Joy is determined to keep her long distance relationship with Amir strong.

712.title: Episode #1.712
712.plot: After witnessing a death in the paediatric ward, Salmah becomes more driven to donate the money from Khairul to charity. Felicia feels left out when Suzanne excludes her from a networking event because there will be alcohol all round. Pam feels that she is losing a friend and resolves to help Shruti cope with her condition.

713.title: Episode #1.713
713.plot: Felicia decides that she can't give up drinking and knowing her friends will object, she hides it from them. Shruti mistakenly makes her personal blog post public and people come to know of her stroke. Bee Li feels unimportant when the rest of the family don't support her decision to do something about Mark's blog that is affecting Jay.

714.title: Episode #1.714
714.plot: Norleena finds herself running thin as she juggles work, family and baking lessons. Bee Li gets increasingly upset with Diana over - stepping her authority at home and complains to Jay. Meanwhile, Felicia slips back to drinking again and hides it from Suzanne and Gina.

715.title: Episode #1.715
715.plot: Rumours of the Rahmans' money spread online, and Salmah finally makes a decision on what to do with it. At the Lims, Bee Li and Diana fall out and force Jay to choose sides. Li Yan plans for Joy's coming birthday and Bhaskar thinks it is a good opportunity to bring Dr Raja and Joy closer.

716.title: Episode #1.716
716.plot: Ismail is shocked when the Life Feed board of directors investigates rumours of mismanagement against him. Amir worries that the long distance relationship will have a negative impact on Joy's life. Norleena, meanwhile, decides to start a food business with Salmah's money.

717.title: Episode #1.717
717.plot: Excited about her surprise romantic date with Amir, Joy tries to dig for clues when she stumbles on something unexpected. Norleena is unsure of her business decisions when she seeks advice from an old friend. Sheila's parents make a shock announcement and all attention are on the murder case again.

718.title: Episode #1.718
718.plot: As the police ramp up efforts to solve Sheila's murder, Chris begins to take special interest in the case. Sulaiman realises Norleena has different priorities on how to spend the money. Salmah and Ismail grow closer as they plan on ways to keep healthy.

719.title: Episode #1.719
719.plot: Ah Biao tries to hunt down the e - scooter rider who knocked down Mrs Pereira. Adam's depression returns and Xue Ling feels responsible for being the cause of it. At the Tongs, Chris is in a panic mode after discovering Suzanne's dark secret and confronts her.

720.title: Episode #1.720
720.plot: Jay loses his temper after reading Mark's blog about his troubled past in school. While Suzanne finally admits her guilt and Chris gets her to recall the events leading up to Sheila's death.

721.title: Episode #1.721
721.plot: Suzanne and Chris are shocked to find out about Suzanne's pregnancy. Xue Ling worries about drifting further away from Michael and upon Adam's encouragement, she reaches out to Michael and plans a surprise for his birthday. Meanwhile, Kwong San reprimands Jay for taking his anger out at Bee Li.

722.title: Episode #1.722
722.plot: With heavy hearts, Chris and Suzanne prepare to leave their lives behind and flee the country. The Lims worry about what might happen when the police bring Jay in for further questioning. Xue Ling is discouraged when the family is unable to contact Michael to wish him on his birthday.

723.title: Episode #1.723
723.plot: The Tongs and the Lims reel from the shock of Chris's confession and they worry about the consequences for Chris and Suzanne. Xue Ling continues to deal with the guilt that she abandoned her family at a time when they needed her most. Meantime, Chris is grilled by the CID for details on the circumstances surrounding Sheila's death.

724.title: Episode #1.724
724.plot: When everyone is devastated to learn that Chris is being charged with culpable homicide, Li Yan rallies the family to find a way to help him. Bhaskar wants to move out of the house when he learns Meera will be discharged from IMH. Norleena struggles to come up with an interesting recipe for her food business and Sulaiman proves to be of little help.

725.title: Episode #1.725
725.plot: The Tongs are shocked to learn that Chris has been stealing from Life Feed and Li Yan is angered by Ben and Diana's refusal to back Chris in light of this revelation. Meantime, Xue Ling has her whole family on tenterhooks while she prepares for Michael's return.

726.title: Episode #1.726
726.plot: When Salmah pulls her calf muscle, both Ismail and Ali turn up at her place and fuss over her. The Lims rejoices when Michael finally returns from his overseas stint, while Jay and Diana demand that Mark takes down the slanderous blog.

727.title: Episode #1.727
727.plot: Michael bears a grudge against Xue Ling when he discovers how Adam's depression was triggered by her. Meera returns from her rehab and is shocked when she witnesses Shruti's emotional outburst. At TCH, Zul enlists the help of Ismail to get Mark a job at Life Feed.

728.title: Episode #1.728
728.plot: It is Mother's Day but Michael is reluctant to celebrate for Xue Ling. Eddie tries to get the Tongs together for dinner to celebrate for Li Yan, while Norleena and Sulaiman give Salmah a pleasant surprise. Meanwhile, Shruti starts experiencing stroke - related spasticity in her leg.

729.title: Episode #1.729
729.plot: Michael gets the cold treatment from Adam during the lunch celebration for his ORD, but his pride holds him back from patching things up. When Pam doesn't visit Shruti, Shruti throws a tantrum which scares the Bhaskars. At the Rahmans, Salmah gets teased by Norleena about Ismail and Ali.

730.title: Episode #1.730
730.plot: Lauren bumps into Michael and tries to make up for her past mistakes. Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira start working on a secret photography project. A distracted Joy, meantime, is still pining over Amir despite her upcoming exams.

731.title: Episode #1.731
731.plot: When Shruti closes up and refuses to do her rehabilitative exercises, the family is at a loss. Kalila continues to be tormented by the cyber - bully, and Ah Biao's secret photography project is finally revealed. Tanya and Dr Raja decide to come clean with Joy over the pregnancy.

732.title: Episode #1.732
732.plot: It is Rayyan and Grace's birthday and their happy parents prepare for a day out at the zoo. Zara discovers that Kalila may be acting out in order to avoid going to school, but Wafiq refuses to believe her. Amir tries his best to convince Joy to speak with him, but she continues the silent treatment.

733.title: Episode #1.733
733.plot: Things seem to be going well in the Lim household following Michael's reconciliation with the family. Suzanne finds herself increasingly disgruntled slogging for Xue Organics while Xue Ling takes all the credit. Meanwhile, Joy stumbles upon a shocking discovery.

734.title: Episode #1.734
734.plot: When Joy continues to be hostile towards Tanya, Bhaskar decides to intervene. Vanessa and Ben are concerned when Grace's fever hasn't subsided, and they decide to take her to the hospital. Ismail continues to try to befriend Ali, much to Ali's chagrin.

735.title: Episode #1.735
735.plot: Tanya feels helpless when Joy gives her the cold shoulder after the revelation of her pregnancy. Norleena is keen on pursuing a decorative cake business, but has doubts about its viability. Things at Xue Organics come to a head when Suzanne tries to get close to a major potential investor.

736.title: Episode #1.736
736.plot: Arjun visits Chris in prison and offers words of encouragement. Ismail tells Ali that he's going after Salmah, much to Ali's displeasure. Sulaiman worries as Norleena flip - flops on her business ideas and Zul decides to intervene.

737.title: Episode #1.737
