737.plot: Ismail and Ali fight over Salmah's attention and get combative at the Kickstart gym party. When model turned actress Chloe Branson turns up at Life Feed to sign her endorsement contract, Vanessa becomes her glorified nanny for a day. Khairul returns and is suspicious of Ismail's motive for getting close to Salmah.

738.title: Episode #1.738
738.plot: Arjun and Chloe refuse to back down despite the growing negative publicity that threatens to hurt them both. When Grace's condition deteriorates, Ben and Vanessa are forced to consider contacting Chen. Salmah begins to lose her patience over Ali and Ismail's constant fighting while Khairul decides to make amends with the people he has hurt in the past.

739.title: Episode #1.739
739.plot: Chloe proves to be a handful on her first day of shadowing Arjun around the hospital. Norleena decides to move forward and start her food business, only to hit a series of roadblocks. Meanwhile, Ismail and Ali continues their on - off banter over Salmah.

740.title: Episode #1.740
740.plot: Arjun starts to learn there may be more to Chloe than meets the eye. After talking to Ismail, Norleena is more fired up than ever to start her new business. Gripped with fear of losing Grace, Ben is concerned when Vanessa continues keeping in touch with Chen.

741.title: Episode #1.741
741.plot: Eddie tries another way to reach out to Shruti when he get rebuffed. Ben starts to blame Chris when he lacks the funds to adopt Grace. Arjun begins to see the different side of Chloe when she makes an effort to befriend a child patient.

742.title: Episode #1.742
742.plot: Xue Ling is shocked to find out Michael has been accepted by the Queensland School of Aviation and has been keeping it from the family. Shruti thinks all her friends are abandoning her when she overhears what Pam said to Eddie over the phone. Felicia is forced to tell lie after lie as her drinking problem worsens.

743.title: Episode #1.743
743.plot: Adam and Xue Ling struggle to take Michael's gap year idea seriously when they know he's been accepted by the aviation school in Australia. Lathika feels unappreciated as she juggles housework with full - time care of Shruti. Meanwhile, Felicia's drinking problem begins to affect her work performance.

744.title: Episode #1.744
744.plot: Arjun feels guilty for kicking Chloe down and decides to help her with her audition. Norleena is excited about her pop - up store but her plans are shot down by Zul. At the Lims, Bee Li hounds Jay and Diana to have children.

745.title: Episode #1.745
745.plot: Meera's condition continues to improve with therapy, and this gives her hope that she could actually save her marriage. Li Yan wants to bail Chris out but Ben objects to it vehemently. At the hospital, Arjun helps Chloe rehearse for her audition and that accidentally leads to a kiss.

746.title: Episode #1.746
746.plot: Rumours about Chloe and Arjun hooking up spread like wildfire, implicating Gina in the scandal. Li Yan rallies the Tongs to show support for Chris after he gets released on bail, much to Ben's displeasure. Meera finds out that Arjun has been dating Gina.

747.title: Episode #1.747
747.plot: Meera suspects Bee Li is behind those rumours about the Bhaskars and confronts her Felicia's alcoholic addiction starts to affect her performance at work, much to Xue Ling's annoyance. Gina's dating woes continue as she gives Peter Tay and Arjun a piece of her mind and sets the record straight with Ben.

748.title: Episode #1.748
748.plot: Meera and Bhaskar team up to find the culprit behind the online rumours. Peter Tay's appearance at TCH causes a stir and invokes strong reactions from Melissa. Fearful that her alcoholic addiction might be exposed, Felicia falls out with Gina after the latter starts questioning her about her late nights.

749.title: Episode #1.749
749.plot: Meera agrees to meet Bhaskar for lunch, hoping that Bhaskar will patch things up with her. To make amends, Peter Tay returns the gym ownership to Adam with no conditions attached. Meanwhile, Felicia is concerned that Suzanne might sabotage Xue Organics and she takes on the prep work for their meeting with a big investor.

750.title: Episode #1.750
750.plot: Felicia is late for the important meeting with the investor and Xue Ling is livid. Firdaus starts to neglect Pam when he gets busy with work at the gym. Shruti realises that Bhaskar's life is happier without Meera, and begins to question what is best for the family.

751.title: Episode #1.751
751.plot: Felicia rounds up the Tongs to prove to them that Suzanne is involved in Sheila's murder. Kalila makes a new friend, Louise, and she turns out to be a class bully. Norleena apologises to Zul for not following his advice, only to be convinced by Ismail to invest more money in her food business.

752.title: Episode #1.752
752.plot: Melissa gets revenge for Kalila when she starts bullying Louise online. Chris wants to throw a birthday party for Li Yan but Diana thinks he is doing it to alleviate his guilt. Felicia gets drunk after her failed attempt to expose Suzanne and finally decides to join an alcohol treatment programme.

753.title: Episode #1.753
753.plot: Melissa plays along with Kalila's lie and it upsets Xue Ling and Li Yan when they learn she got violent with Kalila. Norleena's pop - up store does great business until an online post reveals something unexpected. Joy continues to sulk in Tanya's presence and this leads Li Yan to give the latter some painful advice.

754.title: Episode #1.754
754.plot: After the disastrous pop - up store project, Norleena makes amends with her customers in order to convince Salmah to invest in her business. Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira become 'famous' online for their funny photos. Meanwhile, Tanya feels overwhelmed as she can't please both Dr Raja and Joy.

755.title: Episode #1.755
755.plot: Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira meet the online news reporter and she wants to interview the both of them for an article. Lathika finally gets a day off to relax, but her friends are busy and she is on her own. Joy tries to rile Tanya by saying that she is considering staying in the U.S. with Jamie but her plan backfires on her.

756.title: Episode #1.756
756.plot: Wati and Fitri feel bad for leaving Lathika out of their outing the day before, and they decide to make it up to her. Ah Biao gets a remuneration from his photos and is happy to contribute towards Chris's legal fees. Meanwhile, Joy is angry about Tanya's revelation regarding her CP.

757.title: Episode #1.757
757.plot: Meera throws a house party as a last - ditch attempt to mend the fence with Bhaskar. Joy assures Tanya she will try to accept Dr Raja but Tanya isn't ready to reunite with him yet. The Tongs are optimistic about Chris's plea bargain, and Ben is glad to see the end of this expensive fiasco.

758.title: Episode #1.758
758.plot: Pam tries to visit Shruti after a while but she gets pushed away again. Bee Li finds out that Wati has been sneaking out to help Lathika with the housework. At the Tongs, Li Yan has a health scare due to stress and Chris feels guilty for being the cause of it.

759.title: Episode #1.759
759.plot: The Tongs are hopeful about negotiating a possible reduced sentence for Chris. Ben feels he is being taken for granted by Li Yan despite his contributions to TCH over the years. Tanya senses that Meera isn't coping well with her separation from Bhaskar, and decides to reach out to her.

760.title: Episode #1.760
760.plot: After learning that Chris is taking the fall for Suzanne, Li Yan tries to convince him to turn Suzanne in. Meanwhile, Firdaus and Pam reach out to Felicia. Feeling overlooked, Ben finds purpose in helping Vanessa with her Life Feed project.

761.title: Episode #1.761
761.plot: Jay and Diana are pressured by Bee Li to go for fertility testing. Gina returns from Bali with a new hot guy. Chris informs his lawyer of his decision to plead guilty, much to Suzanne and Li Yan's dismay.

762.title: Episode #1.762
762.plot: When Jasper reveals his intentions to woo Gina, Lauren urges Peter Tay to fight for Gina's affections. Ismail hires Ben as a consultant for Life Feed's pop - up store. Bee Li is happy to learn that Diana and Jay are going to try for a baby.

763.title: Episode #1.763
763.plot: Diana and Bee Li are no longer at loggerheads over having children, but this means more trouble for Jay. Ali comes to terms with his budding feelings for Salmah. Meantime, Peter Tay finds out about Jasper's secret.

764.title: Episode #1.764
764.plot: Vanessa harbours hopes of getting back together with Ben. Despite the poor performance of her pop - up store, Norleena shows Salmah she still has the support of her customers. Ismail decides to take the next step and asks Salmah out on a date.

765.title: Episode #1.765
765.plot: Ben's rights over Grace are threatened by the appearance of Chen who is prepared to fight for custody. Norleena learns that even Sulaiman no longer believes she can start a business and is crushed. When he finds out that Salmah and Ismail are dating, Ali distances himself from Salmah.

766.title: Episode #1.766
766.plot: Ben comes to Vanessa's rescue at work and is offered a full - time position at Life Feed by Ismail. At TCH, Zara helps Kalila get over a panic attack, while Arjun runs into Gina's new boyfriend, Jasper.

767.title: Episode #1.767
767.plot: Vanessa offers Mark a chance to work on a project but memories of Sheila come back to haunt him. Yasmine finds out Kalila has a crush on Firdaus. Salmah encourages a reluctant Zara to go on a date with Wafiq.

768.title: Episode #1.768
768.plot: Li Yan is upset when a group of reporters show up at TCH, hounding her for updates on Chris. Salmah learns the awful truth about the bruises on Kalila's arm. Meanwhile, a paranoid Suzanne fears that Felicia is on to her.

769.title: Episode #1.769
769.plot: Peter Tay has to deal with the fallout from being seen leaving Chloe's hotel room. Kalila is discharged from the hospital, but Wafiq and Yasmine clash over who should be taking care of her. Norleena is discouraged that her own family doesn't seem to have faith in her business plans.

770.title: Episode #1.770
770.plot: As rumours between Peter Tay and Chloe intensify, Gina steps in to intercede on Chloe's behalf. Ismail accidentally causes a rift between Li Yan and Salmah. Meanwhile, Wafiq prepares to fight for full custody of Kalila.

771.title: Episode #1.771
771.plot: Peter Tay finally confesses his feelings for Gina. Ismail embarrasses Salmah with a major show of affection at both TCH and her workplace. Ah Biao goes all out to win a photo contest, hoping the prize money could help with Chris's legal feed.

772.title: Episode #1.772
772.plot: Arjun cooks up a crazy idea to prove that Chloe's alleged relationship with Peter Tay is a pack of lies. Ah Biao puts some heart-warming family photos on Instagram but it only draws nasty comments about Chris. Ben's plan for a new TCH branch is not working out but he refuses to let this get to him.

773.title: Episode #1.773
773.plot: The social media bashing of Chloe gets worse and she is forced to go with Arjun's plan to pose as a couple. Nevin continues to lie about skipping school and it causes tension between Raja and Tanya. Chris fears Li Yan is cracking under the strain of covering up for Suzanne.

774.title: Episode #1.774
774.plot: Adam decides to share ownership of the shop house as Ben tries to convince everyone to support his plan for TCH 2.0. Seeing Li Yan's recent odd behaviour, Salmah is concerned for her. Meantime, Atiqah is overwhelmed by work and family responsibilities.

775.title: Episode #1.775
775.plot: To get back at Felicia, Suzanne insinuates to Pam that Felicia and Firdaus are more than friends. Wafiq is angered when he learns that Yasmine is trying to influence Kalila to blame herself for the abuse. Ben meets up with businessman Andre Yap to discuss TCH 2.0 but his plan is shot down.

776.title: Episode #1.776
776.plot: Li Yan blames Suzanne for not putting in effort to support Chris and falls out with her. Ismail gets jealous after learning that Salmah is asking Ali to workout with her at the gym. Pam kicks up a fuss over Firdaus spending time with Felicia.

777.title: Episode #1.777
777.plot: Joy calls Nevin out for his attention-seeking behavior after he claims that Atiqah abused him. Ismail is bothered by his genuine feelings towards Salmah. Pam, meanwhile, tells Felicia to leave Firdaus alone.

778.title: Episode #1.778
778.plot: Suzanne tricks Felicia to go to a pub and gets her drunk. A frustrated Atiqah confronts Nevin about the slapping incident. Eddie helps Lathika talk to Bhaskar about her fatigue while Lathika promises to help convince Shruti to see him.

779.title: Episode #1.779
779.plot: Bhaskar and Meera are at a loss for how to connect with Shruti, who continues her refusal to do her rehab exercises. Suspicious of Suzanne's involvement in Felicia's alcohol relapse, Li Yan begins her own investigation into the matter. Mrs Pereira is wary of her students treating her differently after her photos appeared on Ah Biao's Instagram account.

780.title: Episode #1.780
780.plot: Suzanne's ploys are exposed by Li Yan, leading to a huge falling out. Bhaskar tries but fails to bond with Shruti and Arjun. Firdaus and Pam reconcile, but he can't get Felicia out of his mind.

781.title: Episode #1.781
781.plot: As Adam and the rest of the family rallies around Li Yan, Chris wrangles with Suzanne's selfishness. Meanwhile, Shruti finally decides to reach out to Eddie.

782.title: Episode #1.782
782.plot: Chris decides to go back to remand, much to Li Yan's dismay. Meera finds an unlikely friend in Bee Li when the latter is up front with her about moving on from Bhaskar. Ah Biao gets into another online scuffle with an internet troll.

783.title: Episode #1.783
783.plot: Ah Biao goes on a witch hunt after his Instagram account gets hacked. Mark visits Suzanne at the remand centre and engages in a war of words with her. Shruti and Eddie fall out after Shruti thinks Eddie has a hidden agenda for coming over to visit her.

784.title: Episode #1.784
784.plot: A casual conversation with Zul leads Bhaskar to take up MMA at Kickstart, much to everyone's surprise. Li Yan tries to reconcile with Ben but gets a rude awakening. Meantime, Shruti opens up to Lathika about her true feelings for Eddie.

785.title: Episode #1.785
785.plot: Pam visits Firdaus at Kickstart unannounced much to his annoyance. Meera moots the idea of inviting Chloe home for dinner but Arjun shuts her down. Shruti reaches out to Eddie and apologises to him as she continues working hard at her exercises.

786.title: Episode #1.786
786.plot: Arjun and Chloe struggle with their feelings for each other as the truth behind their fake relationship is revealed. Shruti is very much on the ball about her recovery, much to Meera's surprise. Wafiq and Kalila have a misunderstanding over Yasmine.

787.title: Episode #1.787
787.plot: Wafiq is stressed out by the procedures of Kalila's custody battle. Romance may be budding between Arjun and Chloe but they agree to take it slow. Chen has received the results of the paternity test and calls for a truce but Ben is still unsettled.

788.title: Episode #1.788
788.plot: Diana is nervous about getting her fertility results while Jay remains optimistic. Vanessa falls ill and Ben shows his caring side when he nurses her back to health. Firdaus is finding it hard to deal with Pam, causing her to feel insecure about their relationship.

789.title: Episode #1.789
789.plot: Ismail gets angry with Ben for losing an important document and Vanessa steps in to defend Ben. Atiqah wants Ah Biao to take photos of her and Mrs Pereira to promote their school fun fair but the latter refuses to get in the spirit of things. Shruti and Eddie worry that Bhaskar may have found out about their relationship.

790.title: Episode #1.790
790.plot: Li Yan notices that Ben and Vanessa are starting to hit it off. Ali tries to match make Zara and Wafiq, much to Zara's consternation. Ah Biao, meanwhile, makes peace with his online troll.

791.title: Episode #1.791
791.plot: Ismail is upset when Khairul turns down the chance to manage Life Feed again. Ben wants to forget about his impending separation from Vanessa and she readily agrees. Zara is surprised to learn that Kalila appears to have forgiven her mother.

792.title: Episode #1.792
792.plot: Tanya is doubtful of Ben's intentions when Ben and Vanessa decide to renew their wedding vows. Zara is looking for her long-lost mother and Salmah unwittingly informs Ali about it. Suspecting that Diana might have fertility problems, Jay has fears about how she might react.

793.title: Episode #1.793
793.plot: Zara finally gets a reply from her aunt regarding her mother, but it contradicts what Ali told her about the family. Meanwhile, Ben urges Vanessa to find evidence of Chen's abusive behaviour in the past and Vanessa makes a startling discovery.

794.title: Episode #1.794
794.plot: Zara's confrontation with Ali over her aunt's hostile text reply exposes the truth behind her parents' divorce. Diana moves back to Li Yan temporarily to sort out her emotions and get away from Jay. Ben, meantime, is pleased to see the lack of closeness between Grace and Chen.

795.title: Tanglin 795
795.plot: Wafiq reaches out to Ali and persuades him to mend bridges with Zara. Ben's interest is piqued when Andre lets on a short term investment that promises high returns. Eddie has to hide his happiness about being in a relationship with Shruti so his family won't find out.

796.title: Episode #1.796
796.plot: Vanessa and Ben renew their vows despite their disagreement. A get together over dinner at the Rahmans reveals hidden tensions between Ismail and Khairul. Wafiq, meanwhile, is increasingly falling for Zara and she is leaning on him too.

797.title: Episode #1.797
797.plot: Shruti comes to TCH for the first time since her stroke. Jay confides to Xue Ling that Diana is infertile and they can't have kids. Murugan belatedly reveals that he told his mother about Lathika and his intentions to marry her.

798.title: Episode #1.798
798.plot: Eddie gets worried when he sees Li Yan and Bhaskar spending more time together. Jay has a big fight with Diana when he suggests they see a gynaecologist for a second opinion. Zara is worried for Salmah when she learns about Ismail's playboy past.

799.title: Episode #1.799
799.plot: Eddie and Shruti decide to get married before Li Yan and Bhaskar's friendship becomes a full-blown romance. The Lims consider moving out temporarily so that the sewage problem in their house can be fixed. Norleena's baking business gets a huge boost when Chloe makes an online post about it.

800.title: Episode #1.800
800.plot: Unaware about Diana's condition, Bee Li wants her to move back. Seeing Ismail and Salmah together, Khairul wonders if Ismail is truly falling for her. Meanwhile, Eddie and Shruti meet with their parents to discuss their reasons for marriage.

801.title: Episode #1.801
801.plot: Joy and Nevin embark on a mission to get Tanya and Raja married and they rope in Bhaskar and Li Yan for help. Bee Li hears of Mdm Chan's success with her golden pig ornament and decides to try it on Diana. Lathika gets upset with Murugan when he assumes that she is getting married to him.

802.title: Episode #1.802
802.plot: Wati and Fitri take it upon themselves to help the clueless Murugan woo Lathika. Raja and Tanya take a big step in their relationship by booking their ROM date. Yasmine gives up primary custody of Kalila in order to seek medical help.

803.title: Episode 803
803.plot: Bee Li is in denial about Diana's premature ovarian failure diagnosis. Murugan plans a memorable surprise for Lathika with the help of Wati and Fitri. Li Yan picks up on Ismail's suspicious behaviour, and worries for Salmah.

804.title: Episode 804
804.plot: Salmah begins to get the sense that Li Yan isn't entirely supportive of her relationship with Ismail. Bee Li tries to come to terms with the fact that Jay and Diana will never be able to have children. Lathika struggles when faced with telling the Bhaskars about her plan to move back to India.

805.title: Episode 805
805.plot: Andre introduces Ben to a business contact who makes an enticing offer he cannot refuse. Atiqah is still stressed out by Indah's inability to manage the household, but Zul senses there might be more to that. Li Yan's suspicions of Ismail grow and that threatens to create a rift between Salmah and her.

806.title: Episode #1.806
806.plot: Mrs Pereira reports Atiqah to the school principal after hearing her confession regarding Nevin. Khairul starts to investigate Ismail's dealings with Scott. Feeling cocky after signing the contract with The Fat Ayam, Ben makes a pass at Gina.

807.title: Episode #1.807
807.plot: Ben is forced to tell his family about The Fat Ayam investment after Vanessa calls him out on it. Arjun contemplates asking Chloe to accompany him to the medical award ceremony. Ismail, meanwhile, instructs Scott to call off the con job on Salmah.

808.title: Episode #1.808
808.plot: Bhaskar, feeling helpless over Shruti's relationship with Eddie, confides in Raja. Ismail explains himself to Khairul and opens up about his true intentions. Chloe shows up at the award ceremony and causes tension between Arjun and her.

809.title: Episode #1.809
809.plot: Ah Biao attempts to help Mrs Pereira and Atiqah reconcile, but Mrs Pereira is adamant on her stance. Bhaskar and Li Yan have difficulties coming to terms with Shruti and Eddie's marriage. Meantime, Khairul tries to tell Salmah the truth about Ismail.

810.title: Episode #1.810
810.plot: Eddie's resentment for Bhaskar grows when Bhaskar makes Shruti feel insecure about their relationship. Unable to tell his family about the money he lost, Ben decides to do something drastic. Mrs Pereira's friendship with Atiqah takes another hit when she fails to turn up for an agreed meeting.

811.title: Episode #1.811
811.plot: Salmah tries to cope with losing not just the money, but Ismail too. Yasmine discovers there is chemistry between Zara and Wafiq, and encourages Wafiq to go for it. The Lims decide to sell the condo after learning that they will need to incur more repair cost.

812.title: Episode #1.812
812.plot: Ben finally admits to the Tongs that he lost all the money. In the presence of Kalila, Zara and Wafiq let slip that they went on a date. Eddie and Shruti plan a short trip together after Bhaskar forbids Eddie from coming over.

813.title: Episode #1.813
813.plot: Bhaskar and Li Yan panic when they think that Eddie and Shruti have eloped. Zul starts a petition to prevent Atiqah from getting the sack. Meanwhile, Ben is distraught when the entire Tong family gives him the cold shoulder.

814.title: Episode #1.814
814.plot: Bee Li and Kwong San get worried when Diana takes on extra jobs to help pay off the TCH mortgage loan. Bhaskar finally confesses his feelings for Li Yan. Atiqah gets off on a relatively light punishment for the slapping incident and thinks it was Mrs Pereira who helped her.

815.title: Episode #1.815
815.plot: With Ah Biao and Mrs Pereira's prodding, Atiqah begins to see how Zul can be a positive force in her life. Norleena is discouraged when she meets her investor and can't quite keep up with the business talk. Bhaskar, Meera and Li Yan give their blessings for Eddie and Shruti to get engaged.

816.title: Episode #1.816
816.plot: Norleena has a serious case of nerves at a magazine interview and photoshoot. Joy has lots of ideas for Tanya and Raja's ROM ceremony. Li Yan makes a decision that may drastically alter the fate of TCH.

817.title: Episode #1.817
817.plot: Tanya and Raja finally tie the knot. Vanessa tries to encourage Ben to start thinking of a life beyond TCH. Khairul tells Norleena to consider going into business with Jay as they seem to connect very well.

818.title: Episode #1.818
818.plot: Bee Li has a growing suspicion that Kwong San is hiding a big secret from her. Lathika chances upon the letter for her contract renewal and feels guilty she hasn't told the Bhaskars about her plans to leave. Meanwhile, Atiqah and Zul's relationship appears to have some progress.

819.title: Episode #1.819
819.plot: Chris is shocked when Suzanne got the lawyer to serve him divorce papers. Arjun learns that Chloe wanted to help him out at his award ceremony and wants to return the favour for her red carpet event. Pam thinks Firdaus is trying to push her away when he encourages her to go for the overseas work-study programme.

820.title: Episode #1.820
820.plot: Chris is a bundle of nerves as Li Yan and him prepare to head to court for Suzanne's sentencing. With her work permit cancelled, Lathika feels awkward living with the Bhaskars as their guest and not their helper. Wafiq finds himself battling insecurities when he thinks that Khairul is trying to get close to Zara.

821.title: Episode #1.821
821.plot: Eddie and Shruti finally get engaged. Khairul reveals to Salmah his plans to build Life Feed up again. Bhaskar and Li Yan reconcile and they decide to stay as friends.

822.title: Episode #1.822
822.plot: Eddie is grateful to Kwong San for his help and advice when Shruti was in hospital. Atiqah plucks up the courage to ask Zul out on an official date while Mark and Pam finally bury the hatchet.

823.title: Episode 823 Finale
823.plot: Everyone is on edge as they prepare for Chris's day in court. Li Yan mulls over Wai Meng's suggestion to move back to Hong Kong with him. Meanwhile, Salmah has a big announcement that will eventually take the whole Tanglin community by storm.

824.title: Episode 824 Tanglin Special
824.plot: Join us for a very special Tanglin show as we take a look back on the past three and a half years and celebrate the milestone achievement of reaching 823 episodes. Members of the Tanglin cast reunite to meet their fans, recall favourite moments, and even let you in on a few secrets . Our Tanglin fans have the final say, as we take a look at the nominees and winners of our social media polls.

imdb.plot outline: Tanglin is a daily drama that centers on the lives of multiracial and multi-generational families - mainly the Tongs, Bhaskars, Rahmans and Lims - residents of a middle income neighborhood, in the Holland Village, Tanglin, Commonwealth area; their lives reflect the joys, trials and tribulations of everyday Singaporeans.
imdb.title: Tanglin
plot: _Tanglin_ (qv) is a daily drama that centers on the lives of multiracial and multi-generational families - mainly the Tongs, Bhaskars, Rahmans and Lims - residents of a middle income neighborhood, in the Holland Village, _Tanglin_ (qv), Commonwealth area; their lives reflect the joys, trials and tribulations of everyday Singaporeans.
